campaign.story:
Could you help us hit $100K!?!
We did not think it was possible to get this far on kickstarter! If we can hit our stretch goal of 100K, we will be able to purchase our primary automation station outright! That is the first step to millions of pods.
We aim to take our technology across the planet and if we can purchase key equipment now… there's nothing stopping us.
For every dollar you pledge, we pledge a tree!
Featured on BackerLand



Our project
We are a Canadian drone reforestation company that modifies drones to fire rapidly germinating tree seeds into the soil. We merge technology, software and ecological science to surpass traditional tree-planting efforts and rapidly accelerate global reforestation efforts. Help us with our ambitious goal of planting 1 billion trees by 2028.
We need your help!
We’ve now got a proof of concept and we’re aiming big!  For every dollar you pledge, we pledge a tree.  
Each of our pods contain at least three pre-germinated seeds, mycorrhizae, fertilizers, and of course...our secret sauce. We aim for an average of eight different species to ensure we build healthy ecosystems. Not monocultures.


Make an Impact by Supporting Us! 
By supporting our project, you’re providing the crucial funds needed to take this to a truly global scale and reach our goal of 1 billion trees planted by 2028! From Canada’s boreal forests to the tropics of Sumatra, we want to make an impact and rebuild degraded ecosystems on every corner of the earth. Forests don’t just pull CO2 from the atmosphere. They provide homes and food for millions of species, from insects to elephants, they bring more rainfall and capture the rain, cooling the air and stabilizing the climate. They are the livelihoods and source of income for all the communities living off the forests.
For every dollar that you pledge, we pledge a tree!
Interested in offsetting your carbon emissions? The average North American person has an annual carbon footprint of 20 metric tons. Offset this by planting 275 trees! 
Or calculate your carbon footprint on our calculator
The average North American household emits 61 tons per year. Offset your family’s emissions by planting 650 trees!  
Or calculate your family's footprint 

 Be sure to follow us on social media 


Our core values
Impact: We started flash forest with the goal of offsetting carbon emissions enough to have a significant and measurable impact on climate change within the next decade.
Inclusivity: We want everyone to have a way of personally contributing to a large-scale environmental solution through an organization they can trust.
Quality: We work closely with botanists and forestry experts, and use multispectral mapping UAV technology to select ideal planting sites and provide valuable follow up data on ecosystem health.
Cooperation: We are committed to partnering with local groups, agencies, scientists, and individuals of all types to share knowledge and resources for best reforestation solutions.
FAQ:
How do guarantee your trees will grow?
Before we plant our pods, we pre-germinate the seeds inside using our own “secret sauce”. This ensures that the seeds have already sprouted before they’re even in the ground and that they have a strong rooting system when they grow. Not only that, but after we plant them we follow up with our spraying drone to remove competition and provide nitrogen and other nutrients for the best chance of success. We continuously monitor our seedlings with the mapping drone to make sure they’re healthy.
How do you plant the trees?
We plant our seed pods, using a heavy-lift drone that’s been customized with a pneumatic firing device to insert the pods into the soil at the appropriate depth.
Tree planting companies use seedlings. Why would they use seed pods instead of seedlings if it takes longer to grow?
Planting pods has several advantages over seedlings.
1) Drones allow us to plant pods 10X faster per drone than seedlings can be planted.
2) Our seed pods contain 3 pre-germinated tree seeds, mycorrhiza, nutrients and other supportive species for the area.
3) Pods are much less energy/ water intensive to produce and have a lower environmental impact.
4) Pods can be created in mass within a month, whereas seedlings take 1 to 2 years of intensive care in a nursery before they can be planted. This allows us to plant rapidly and at 20% the cost of a seedling.
Are you qualified?
Yes. Three of our core members have backgrounds in science and engineering. Additionally, we’re working closely with scientists with PhD's in botany, seed genetics, and forestry specialists on every job. We are fully certified and licensed for UAV operation in Canada.
What tree species do you plant?
This year we planted eight deciduous and coniferous species local to Southern Ontario. We can easily fill our pods with seeds of virtually any tree species (except for acorns and a few of the larger exceptions). If interested, we can also plant any flora that’s appropriate for an ecosystem in it’s successional period.    
 In your video you talk about planting for full eco-system recovery, how are you doing this?
We know that planting a single tree species will not restore an ecosystem to its natural state nor will it guarantee a healthy forest. That’s why we develop pods that capture the relevant tree seeds, mycorrhiza, nutrients, and soil properties for the target area. Seeds from local sources are usually the best adapted to the target ecosystem but even that isn’t always the case. Climate change has rapidly changed ecosystems and sometimes seeds from lower latitudes are actually more likely to survive in warming climates. We are building a team of experts in restoration ecology to ensure that science underpins all of our efforts and captures nature’s nuances.
Do you work with companies that are interested in planting only one or two types of trees?
While our focus is on full-eco system recovery, we can work with others, including oil and timber companies, who prioritize a select few tree species. However, we will always push to ensure our seedlings have the best chance of success and will disclose what the ecosystem's needs are to ensure this.
Where do you operate?
So far we’ve planted in southern Ontario. However, we are in talks for potential work in Alberta and Brazil (Atlantic Forest). Our sights are set internationally and we are actively working to scale this globally.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Reforestation is an extremely nuanced field and in order for us to bring this technology across international borders we need funding..and we need it quick. We have an immediate need to purchase equipment that will allow us to produce millions of seed pods. Additionally, we require access to the best experts available in botany, ecology, seed genetics, engineering and automation. We have overcome every challenge we have faced up until this stage and we know what is needed next. By sponsoring our company, you help us take our technology to the Pacific Forests of Canada, the Amazon Rainforests of Brazil and, ultimately, the globe.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: 2021 Update on Flash Forest for our Early Backers!
updates.update_content:
Hello Kickstarter!
It has been a long time since we connected. We'd like to begin by firstly expressing our gratitude for this incredible community who supported us when we needed it most. You have helped us grow and get to the stage where we have now 20 employees working full-time on our mission. It has been a very busy six months, and we apologize to anyone that messaged us without a response. Our small but mighty team is so focused on the tech that it means some emails may have been missed. That being said, we are incredibly grateful for the support and we're so excited to show you what we've been working on since our last update!

updates.update_userinfo: British Columbia + Sustainable Development Technology Canada
updates.update_content:
Hi backers!
It’s been a busy few weeks here at Flash Forest.
The team just returned from a trip across the country where we successfully completed three pilot planting operations over the past few weeks!

Hello friends!
We wanted to give an update to our community of supporters on the progress we’ve made over the past few weeks and months.
Welcome to the team!
It was only five-short-months ago when our team was five-people-strong. Since then, we’ve more than doubled! Our Engineering capacity quadrupled, our innovation and business development efforts have scaled up AND, most excitingly, we have welcomed four of the brightest minds UBC’s co-op program has to offer. We are thrilled to welcome students with backgrounds in physics, cognitive systems, and electrical/mechanical/civil engineering to the team. They will be joining us for the summer and are already working on a number of innovative projects to scale up our engineering efforts in many capacities. To say this company has attracted individuals with compassion, kindness, curiosity and smarts would be an understatement. We couldn’t be more proud of the calibre of people we get to work with every day.

Wow. We cannot thank you enough! This has been the busiest month of our lives and, undoubtedly, the most important. Through your incredibly generous support, we were able to raise over $108, 000, which is more than 1000% our original target. As the Greek Fabulist, Aesop, said "No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted." We value every single dollar that was pledged and are committed to working tirelessly on this mission. You are all a part of our team now and we look forward to working with you over the coming years.

from the last 45 days

12 hours left on Kickstarter! Last chance to contribute! 
We'll plant a tree for every dollar you pledge.
A massive thanks for helping us get to this final point! Let's do this!

We’re in the home stretch! We have 3 days left in our Kickstarter campaign,  with the final (stretch) goal of $100k in our sights. 
Please continue to share and spread the word! 
We've been meeting with experts in engineering, forestry, soil ecology and been pulling in the best the minds for the job.

updates.update_userinfo: Global Support for the New Year! Brut Mag & NOW THIS
updates.update_content:
This has been an incredible month for our team, we could not have asked for the exposure, coverage, and international support! 
The best outcome of this increased coverage, is that we've got multiple pilots planned for spring 2020 in BC and Ontario! We've also got volunteers and offers of support from across the world - now meeting local experts in botany, engineering, and forestry. This backing is fuel for our project! We are planning to plant 150 000 pods this year and the $90,000 we raised on kickstarter will help tremendously with that. If you can sharing and pledging we promise every dollar raised goes into trees! It's now our final 5 day stretch!

updates.update_userinfo: 80K reached + Flash Forest on the Morning Show + Calling All Volunteers
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!
Wow Wow Wow. We’ve reached 80K! This support from the public has been astonishing. We are so much closer to new drones and our pod automation machine! 
We're onto the last 10 days! With 100K we can purchase our automation machine outright, please share! Or pledge one more tree! Every bit helps.

updates.update_userinfo: Happy New Year + Big News Update + Boxing Week Special Coming to an End
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!
2019 has been a pivotal year for all of us. With Flash Forest transforming from conception to reality, to world-wide coverage and support coming from every corner of the globe. Thank you so so much for all of you who’ve contributed to our campaign! This Kickstarter is paramount in our ability to truly scale this company next year and give us the resources to put our dream to action without the financial setbacks that so many innovative startups face.

Thank you! From the Flash Forest team.

comments.content: I would like to see the trees grow, can't you post some photos? Thank you
But this is no excuse to not provide updates here at kickstarter to your investors!
Hello @Flash Forest, please provide us an update! Even if you stopped the project, please keep us in the loop.
An update would be appreciated
Shirt received (Oregon) Thank you. I concur a project update on the tree planting would be nice.

hi, is there an update on how the project stands today? are there any trees planted yet or where you able to purchase the necessary equipment? I think a general update would be very nice to see some results! :)
And are there male and female variants to shirts and jackets?
Are there any shirt sizing charts available?

Keep up the great work!
Would love to support more but no shipping to Europe? :’(
I could still make a contribution to your initiative, but first I would like to see the results. Good work. Fabio from Italy
Jacqui & Phil
Alex.
Happy to back a project practically in my own backyard (I live in Central Ontario)...here's a dollar to plant a tree for me :)
Do you guys measure of 100 planted trees, how many trees actually sprout and surive? or out of 100 drone planted trees how many turn into real trees?
Please keep us updated.
Thank you for your time and best of luck with the project!

hey Flash Forest - relevant discussion happening on Reddit you may want to get in on to help drum up some interest: https://www.reddit.com/r/Futurology/comments/ekt4bc/drone_technology_enables_rapid_planting_of_trees/
Just wondering if a combination of different species of trees would work better? symbiotic relationships to encourage growth and lessen pest issues?

Regarding donor certificates...I highly recommend these be in digital form only. After all, what are we trying to accomplish? I have to believe that anyone supporting this project not only wants to increase plantings, but also reduce consumption.
And that more or less makes it a fraud. The promise of one planted tree per pledges dollar is a pure promotion lie I guess :-(
I like the project really much. I pledged a custom amount, but I really hope you're going plant a tree per dollar on the "no reward" level nevertheless. :-)

Have your botanists, soil or forestry experts considered the use of E.M. (Effective Microorganisms) in your spray drones (as a means to increase germination rates, promote more resilient seedlings and increase nutrient uptake for faster growing seedlings)? I have found that using EM as either a foliar spray and/or a microbial innoculant (for soil conditioning) greatly improves the success rate of my new plantings and increases over all vigor of seedlings significantly.
And find video footage of Ireland and get feedback from Irish and English scientists.

campaign.story:
Let us present the oWinder, a watch winder designed to keep your watch fully wound, eliminating the need for manual rewinding and resetting.
     The oWinder has several unique features, which differentiates it from competitive watch winding products
Gyroscopic movement
 Counts every turn it makes 
Simple and universal watch placement
Very quiet operation
 Protects your watch 
 Usb power supply 
 This picture shows an oWinder prototype
Foreword
  Mechanical wrist watches are powered by spring drives. The mainspring stores sufficient energy to power the watch and keep perfect time. However, when unworn, after about 48 hours the mainspring fully unwinds and the watch stops. 
 This image shows how the mainspring powers the basic functions in a mechanical watch.
   More sophisticated watches also display the month, year, leap-year, lunar phase ... Each additional feature uses up some spring power.  Such watches, when fully unwound, must be reset in so that they can be worn. Having to reset the time, date and a day can be annoying.
 KEY FEATURES
GYROSCOPIC MOVEMENT - Excellent care for your watch mechanism 
    It makes that oil within the movement is dispersed to every corner, which is good for lifespan of your timepiece. To keep your watch running silently, every moving part has to be lubricated to lower the friction between moving parts.
SILENT OPERATION - You won't hear it running 
    This picture shows the sound measurement in decibels (unit for sound).  oWinder runs silently so it will not disturb you while working or sleeping. We put a lot of work into making it silent!
360° DISPLAY - Admire your favorite watch 
    While winding, oWinder makes full cycles, so you can admire your timepiece in all of its beauty.
Mount - Safe & easy to use
    The mount is designed in such a way so as to protect your watch when taking it on and off. It fits almost every watch( see the size table )
High quality materials - in-house manufacturing for the highest quality 
    Every part is made from quality materials to best suit its needs. We did not compromise quality for the price. 
Every oWinder has 1 year warranty.
Motion  - Safety first 
    Don't worry about damaging the oWinder. If anyone or anything stops the oWinder while winding, it will stop and continue winding after releasing.
Winding program - adjustable turns for your timepiece
    You can manually select between different turns per day. You have a choice of clockwise, counter-clockwise or alternate rotation. We will provide you with all of the information you need to. If second stretch goal is achieved you will have an option to control winding with a mobile app.
Power plug - compatible with any USB
   You can power an oWinder with any micro USB cord. If the first stretch goal is achieved you will use the same plug for battery charging.
COLORS
   You will have an option to select different color combinations after the campaign ends. The base stand is available in black, green, blue and white, while the gyroscopic mechanism is available in black and silver. 
One more base stand color will be chosen by our backers and will be available only on Kickstarter. 
 Base colors: black, green, blue, white
 Gyroscopic mechanism colors: black, silver
 STRETCH GOALS 
ADD-ON
How does an ADD-ON work?
   You add one or more following items on top of your current pledge:
1 more oWinder - $280
Glass cover - $60
How do i make it work?
Your Reward price + Add-On price = Total pledge
Here are the steps:
1. You back the project by choosing a reward. In this way you become a backer.
2. Once you decided what to add, you go to the campaign page and you find the Manage your Pledge button. It is the first thing you see under the kickstarter logo on top right of page
3. You do a simple sum and you add the amount of your addons.
 SIMPLE DEMONSTRATION
PLAY

    This video shows how to select a winding program, how to power the watch winder and how hand protection mechanism works.
    This picture shows how winding works on the oWinder.
Size chart
   The mount is universal and can fit almost every watch. If you have a watch which is outside of the mount’s range, we will design a special mount for you free of charge.
Product dimension
 Prototype board
 This picture shows a direct driven stepper motor, driven by arduino.
Winding specifications
 If more than 1 program is selected, the last one will prevail.
SHIPPING
   We will ship worldwide to your door. Shipping costs are included in the price. Please note that some duties, handling fees or taxes may appear in some countries.
 TIMELINE  
    We cannot guarantee the exact delivery date but we will do our best to get your oWinder to you as soon as possible. Various factors that may have an effect on delivery schedule include production volume and the shipping partner’s schedule.
 THANK YOU
   We believe there is a better way to wind our watches. A more sophisticated and accurate way, where watches are maintained in a way that preserves their full quality for many generations after. 
We're obsessively passionate about watch mechanisms. Our goal is to help people take care of their watch properly and preserve them for the next generations.
We have created oWinder as answer to expensive gyro winders which costs more than $1500+. We challenged them by creating silent and universal winder which will last for a lifetime. 
The idea came from a 3D printing community where similar winders were made. The problem of the concept was not lasting design, cheap electronics and geared motors, which over time become noisy. And besides, a precious timepiece doesn't look good on a cheap plastic winder.
With your support, we hope we can bring our vision to the world.
Thank you!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Please be aware that owinder is a product in the prototype stage. Some changes may occur on the design but with no impact to functionality or visual appearance once manufactured it. Stretch goals - battery pack and mobile app have not been developed yet and will only be with sufficient support. Please note that there may be shipping delays. 
 We believe communication is crucial when it comes to building trust between backers and creators. We will continually update you of our progress, and you can reach us at any time. We will endeavor to be helpful and transparent at all times. Risk is always present, but we will update you if there is any possibility of delay and will keep in touch until you receive your owinder. 
Feel free to connect with us any time !
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
LayOn is a multifunctional travel accessory designed for quality rest and sleep on the go.
LayOn 2-in-1 travel pad is a product offering a pillow and an air pad in one product. Thanks to its aerodynamic shape, the air pad is quick and easy to inflate without pumps or other specialized equipment.
Practical to use in different situations.
Travelers know it can be tough to get sleep in airports; on airplanes, ferries, cars, or buses; at the office; or even outdoors. The LayOn air pad makes it easy to get some sleep in any situation. You’ll be able to take the rest you need to make sure you’ll be ready for your travel adventures.
From airports to cars, from inside to the great outdoors. 
LayOn is a travel accessory for the best sleeping support in any position, whether sitting or lying down. LayOn is the first and only travel aid to offer an air pad and a travel pillow in one product
The air pad is located inside the pillow and is accessible by opening the zipper. Inflating the air pad is also quick and easy. Simply open the gap, blow, close the gap and push on the ''balloon'' to move the air forward into the pad. Inflating the pad takes about ten blows. Finally, simply fold the bend up to the line on the pad. If you are able to fold it past the line, your air pad needs more air. If you can’t reach the line,  your air pad has too much air and you need to release some.
The pillow is inflated by blowing into the valve with just two breaths. The valve is hidden under the face-side cover gap and is easily accessible.
Air pad and travel pillow in one product.
Choose your own way of comfort.
Inflation is easy due to Patented Technology and an aerodynamic design. Just open the gap, blow inside, close it and push the ''balloon'' - the air is going to move into the pad. With a few repeats, it will be full.
Air pad
Open > blow > close > push > repeat > fold up to the line
Pillow
Inflate the pillow with two breaths.
Adjustable support
Because of the inner air pad, the pillow gives way better neck support than any other inflatable pillow. The added adjustable rope lock will keep the pillow in its place to provide excellent support and comfort wherever you may need it. 
The only air pad that is airline friendly and does not require you paying an extra fee.
Because of its smart packaging and travel pillow shape, LayOn 2 in 1 travel pad is the first air pad you can take on the plane with you and your carry-on luggage. It doesn't need to be stored in the luggage.
Above, see the size of the 2 in 1 air pad compared to some everyday items. The air pad is nearly as small as a 0,5L bottle.
The soft feel of the pillow is provided by very light and natural Italian fabric viscose. The air pad hiding inside the pillow is made of waterproof and airtight high-quality 40D nylon. Finally, the comfort insert within the pillow consists of Polyvinyl.
The fabric has the certificate SGS.
LayOn pillow is made of only 3 components, which makes it easy to clean.
The cover of the pillow is machine washable and the inflatable components can easily be wiped clean.
LayOn is made of durable nylon that can also be used on rough outdoor surfaces, as long as the user makes sure there are no sharp objects under the air pad. The product serves its purpose in spring, summer, and autumn.
LayOn is made of durable nylon that can also be used on rough outdoor surfaces, as long as the user makes sure there are no sharp objects under the air pad. The product serves its purpose in spring, summer, and autumn.
Support up to 180kg.
*shipping is not included 
 How to back this campaign: 
1. Click "Back This Project" & select the reward level. Each backer may only make one pledge.
2. After the campaign is finished you will get to select your color and submit your shipping information at the very end of this campaign.
Compare LayOn travel pad to other alternatives:
Compare the price:
On the left side: alternatives; sleeping pad, travel pillow and the sack pump; total $144 On the right side: LayOn 2 in 1 travel pad; total $120. We offer you a special Kickstarter price > check the rewards.
The LayOn 2 in 1 travel pad is one size product that has an adjustable high of neck support. Weight: 0,76 kg / 24.6 oz                                                                                              
The air pad is only available in navy blue while the pillow cover comes in 4 colors. Thanks to your voting we add a new color Royal Blue!
Select the color after the campaign
Take a nap, anytime, anywhere!
We designed the 2-in-1 LayOn air pad because we believe an opportunity to rest is very important while traveling. Our mission is to deliver travelers with the best sleeping support for their traveling.
The person that gave birth to LayOn is Urša, a designer, a traveler, and an extremely active person - who does not last long in one place. Instead, Urša enjoys vibrant work with plenty of opportunities to make new contacts and meet new people. Just five years ago, Urša was a handball player and saw her future in sports: the most traveling she did was from gym to gym. However, a knee injury ended her sports career in an instant. She then re-discovered her passion for traveling and exploring foreign places: which had always been her greatest wish and she wanted to travel to as many destinations as possible. Now she works with a great team that mostly consists of family and friends. The reason behind LayOn is innovation and the belief that traveling is important for the spirit of the human being - but so is sleeping. The vision is to make the traveler's life a little easier and build a trusted brand.
Urša remembers: "My whole design career started by designing wrapping paper for flowers! I then took the challenge of sewing my own suitcases - and here we are today. I am incredibly proud for my team and me to finally present you with a completely fresh start-up product: LayOn travel pad that provides a solution to a frequent traveling problem - no place to lie down at airports and the limited amount of free passengers' luggage."
"I tackled some frequent traveling problems in my dissertation and from there, things evolved naturally. One day me and my friend brought the sewing machine and the material home and started to play around with ideas."
"It was so much fun! We stayed up late, started designing a suitcase and at some point, we knew this was it."
"Traveling has always been my inspiration. That's why I love LayOn travel pad so much - it is a part of my life."
"It all started with the desire to make a useful product that would solve our frequent traveling problems - but we soon found out it solves the problem of many other travelers."
We started developing our first product in 2017. The first prototype looked very different and came in the shape of a suitcase. We started playing around with the basic forms at first and only started thinking about the design later since we needed to learn about the materials and the technology available first. The second step was then to adjust the design to be functional and practical.
Step one of developing the product was simply taking the materials and sticking them together with tape to imitate the welds. In step two, we used airtight fabric and bound it with iron. In step three, we already had the first samples and contacted a company that helped us realize some of our ideas by using a high-frequency machine. The final step - developing our product’s aerodynamic shape  - followed soon after.
Product development
From the very beginning, we wanted to make sure that LayOn 2 in 1 travel pad was going to be user-friendly. To ensure that, we studied other travel gadgets and spoke to future customers. Nonetheless, the early stages of developing the product involved quite a few technical challenges.
Design & prototype
We wanted to design a product that was practical and let that lead us in all stages. The tools we used evolved as the prototypes evolved - from the first tools like a sewing machine and iron that we found at home all the way to a high-frequency machine.
Mass production
We already accomplish the prototyping phase and start mass production. The mass production of the product is spread internationally: the Italian fabric sewed by the Slovenian company. The pattern of the pad is done by the Chinese manufacturer and the most important part will be made by our team. 
Delivery
The first 900 LayOn 2 in 1 travel pads will be shipped on March/April 2020 and the next round will be delivered in Jun 2020.
--------------------------- Shipping ----------------------------
*Shipping will be charged after the campaign.
*Shipping fees DO NOT count toward customs fees. Here is a shipping calculator for you to understand what you will be paying your government to import this product.    Simply Duty calculator (click here).
Thank you for believing in us and your support.
 Shere LayOn with your travel buddies:
Collaborators
This project is promoted by Funded Today.
_______________________________________________________________
Video and photos
Video and photos were made with a functional prototype that was black and green color because the manufacturer didn't have the required color navy blue in stock. The final air pads will be in navy blue. The size of prototypes is size Small 165 cm and the final products will be in size of 188 cm. 
_______________________________________________________________
Return Policy
We only used quality materials to ensure years of use. We will make a 24 hours quality check for each if it. 
The product will be available after the Kickstarter campaign.  
We’re passionate about creating amazing products and Kickstarter is a way for us to launch our brand. As you've read, Kickstarter isn't a store and rewards are thanks for supporting the project which is why we cannot offer refunds or returns. Your pledge means so much and we take it very seriously. We will do anything we can to make sure that this exchange leaves with good vibes for everyone.
Need further help? Reach out to us at info@layon.eu.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our manufacturers are spread worldwide included Europe and Asia. 
We've made a lot of prototypes to make sure that we can guarantee you high-quality standards and we also have hired an experienced manufacturing team to ensure Asia quality and to keep us on our timeline. 
We will do anything to reduce the chance of errors.
We have produced and tested the prototypes; however, when we start with the serial production, we might find unexpected issues or other drawbacks. We promise to be open and transparent in our communications regarding timing and design changes. About any design change that might happen, you will be informed.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Dear LayOn family,
We hope that you and your family are safe and well. We are reaching out in solidarity with you all as we all work together to get through this difficult time. This is not an easy time for any of us adjusting to new and unexpected challenges.
Much like yourselves, we are closely following the impact of the Coronavirus (COVID-19). At LayOn we have changed the way we work to adhere to government and official health guidelines.

updates.update_userinfo: Delivery update and COVID-19 update, stay safe everyone!
updates.update_content:
Hey LayOn family,
Thank you for your patience. We are happy to announce the official Shop Opening: www.layon.eu

Hey backers,
We want to thank you for your support, but sadly we didn't reach our goal on Kickstarter.
However, thanks to your interest we will be able to continue with our project.

Hey bakers,
We've hit 100 bakers. Thanks for your trust and for believing in our product. That motivated us to continue and bring this project alive, even tho the Kickstarter project won't be successfully finished. We decided to make a special offer to everyone that supported us on Kickstarter.

campaign.story:
Welcome to Lombok - the Island of vivid colorful sunsets, soft sandy beaches, clear crystal waters and beautiful highland areas. Lombok is still unspoiled, abundant with unique culture and aromatic spicy food. Covered with thousands of coconut palm trees dancing in the wind and whispering incredible stories. And this all for us to experience, admire and treasure.
 In August 2018, strong earthquakes hit the Lombok Island. Many people where killed, thousands of them injured, more than half of the million citizens lost their households, workplaces, shelters. People started to restructure their lives focusing on what is the most important for the future of their families and the Island. 
 Story of COCONESIA starts long before it happened.  Danica, Marta and Pak Raden were helping local community in various ways. And one day our paths crossed.
We spend time talking about Lombok and its post earthquakes future. We become fully aware that only coconut trees plantations stood up to the forces of nature. We realized how important the coconut palm trees can be for the community and the Island itself. We decided to join forces and started working on a project that combines the passion of creation and desire to give back and help local community. 
 Our main goal is to restore a production of coconut products.
In 2016 Pak Raden gathered women from his village (Sokong, North Lombok) and they started a production of organic virgin coconut oil (vco). This product helped increase local economy in many ways. Their product received all the necessary certificates confirming its high quality and nutritional values. 
 The 2018 earthquake that struck North Lombok enormously effected the local community by destroying their workshops, machines and tools. Therefore, it was impossible to conquer the local market and develop sales of virgin coconut oil and other coconut products.
COCONESIA project has only one goal – to fully restore and upgrade production of virgin coconut oil and additional coconut products. We want to achieve it by buying necessary machines and rebuilding community workshops where all the manufacturing can take place again. Pak Raden with his female co-workers started the production already but it doesn’t have a chance to be fully operational without help from you.
 To make COCONESIA products we use North Lombok palm trees and their fruits. We want you to feel personally connected to our project. We give you a chance of owning your own Indonesian palm tree. By adopting it you will receive a personalised certificate and coconut products made directly from YOUR own tree.      
 By being a part of this process you are not only supporting our project but also saving our planet. Our production is based on zero waste philosophy and we are making our products using and recycling 100% of coconut palm tree and its fruits.
 All of the products are 100% handmade from the Sokong coconut plantation. They are handmade by local women who share their knowledge and recipes with younger generations. Coconesia’s products are natural, eco friendly, organic and bio. Food products like oil, sugar, shredded coconut are made by using traditional methods and recipes. As we mentioned our project is based on zero waste principals. Brushes produced by us are made of coconut fiber, bowls from coconut shells and food products from its pulp. To make the cutlery, we use old coconut wood from the palm trees which does not grow fruits anymore. By doing all of that we reuse palm trees so you can fully enjoy natural, exotic and organic products.
Look who is talking already about our project, recognizing true values in its products, mission and goals that we stand for. COCONESIA is a staple of better tomorrow for many inhabitants of the Island of Lombok and you can be a part of the movement
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Right now we need your help raising the funds to restore a production of coconut products. The funds raised by this campaign will be used to purchase technology, advanced tools and building a new community workshop, which was destroyed during 2018 earthquakes. 
Any additional funds will be used to build showroom and its interior. 
One of the risks that we can’t control is worldwide delivering services. All the products will have attached special phyto-sanitary certificate issued by Indonesian Post Office. The quarantine restrictions for goods are different in each country so we can’t predict the process of approval and final delivery. 
Our greatest challenge now is to meet the production quantities, reflected by our Kickstarter campaign’s goal.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Bixie balance bike is an all-natural design and sustainable solution to learn cycling. The balance bike looks like a real bicycle because kids want to look like their parents. Besides its great design, with the use of natural materials for its construction, the product improves environmental issues. The product is made for children from 1.5 to 4 years of age.
Dear Bixie supporters!
Thank you again for the support and for believing in our product.
We spent some time in the park having our product tested by our most important clients, children, who immediately fell in love with their new balance Bike.
Check out our short video and support our project!
PLAY



Beechwood
The beechwood is light and has excellent properties as construction wood for a bicycle. It is flexible, hard, but easy to process.
Bixie is made of European beechwood, and most of it comes from Slovenia. 60% of Slovenia is covered with forest, with beech as the most common tree. Wood is a renewable natural material, and that makes our balance bike eco-friendly, light and sustainable.
Natural Design
Bixie has a unique wooden frame made of natural solid beech wood. During the manufacturing process, we used as little wood as possible and just a small amount of glue. Bixie has a minimalistic design, unloaded from any unnecessary parts. Just like with everything else on the bike, we thought of natural wood finish made of natural wax & oils, which is entirely safe for children to lick. This natural cover is so safe it can be even used for wooden cups or woodcut boards.
Adjustable saddle height
Bixie has adjustable saddle height and has a unique seat clamp solution not seen anywhere else.
Open Seat Clamp
Like Fixie but Bixie
As the fixie is the oldest and purest version of a bicycle, requiring less effort to ride it than any other bike, can you imagine a wooden and kids-version of the fixie?! Bixie is made to look like a grown-up’s bike, yet it exhibits playfulness in its rounded design.
It is a smaller, simpler, and eco-version of the fixie bike that children will ride when they grow over Bixie.
Just 20km (12miles) away from our company is location of the oldest wooden wheel found on Earth
Short story
Andrej Kregar got the idea of creating a wooden balance bike when his daughter celebrated her 1st birthday. As she was going to use a balance bike soon, Andrej realized he could make one rather than buy it. He listened to his daughter’s wish to have a balance bike that looks like a real bike because children want to have copies of the things their parents have.
Trained as an architect and an industrial designer, he decided to design and develop a sustainable, natural and plastic-free bicycle for his child to grow with it. The designing process of Bixie was bumpy but fulfilling, to make something enjoyed by children, liked by parents and harmless to the environment and society. 83% of Bixie is locally sourced and locally made.
Lastly, Andrej and his team insisted on using wood since it is an extremely durable material and a valuable part of our heritage. The oldest wooden wheel in the world, the Ljubljana Marshes Wheel, was found only a few kilometers away from their studio. It is over 5000 years old and this whole time was buried in mud. Maybe the same thing will happen with our product, and hopefully, even after 5000 years, it will still be used by children.

 Product development

Healthy & eco-friendly product
Bixie is made by natural solid wood with the least amount of glue and wood. Glue does not have any harmful ingredients like the Formaldehyde. Formaldehyde is often present in plywood products, like in the plywood balance bikes. Unlike plywood balance bikes, our product is completely Formaldehyde free.
Children's Balance
Children who improve their balance at a young age have better coordination when they grow up. It is the foundation for a healthy life filled with movement. Learning to keep balance is a significant part of children’s development, not just in sports, but also in other activities. Kids who use a balance bike are confident enough to move quickly and explore the environment by themselves.

With Bixie balance bike children learn to ride pedal bikes faster
Our balance bike is the right choice for your children. Unlike tricycles and training wheels, it is light and easy to ride, kids can move quickly and safely over uneven surfaces, providing them with much fun and independent riding before the time comes for pedal bikes. After having experience with the Bixie balance bike, kids will learn to ride pedal bikes in no time.

Keyring
Original Bixie balance bike

Unique Bixie with your child's name



Help us bring this project to life! Make Bixie available to every child and help them be healthy and become environmentally aware adults by contributing to our Kickstarter campaign!
Sure, Bixie will make a significant difference and improvement in the childhood of your toddlers, and we have the workforce to make it happen, but if anything comes along the way, be the first to know. Thank you for your support!
Bixie Team
Throughout the development phase, Bixie's innovative baby carriage "carried" 6 people with the desire for a genuine childish smile and preservation of the environment for the next generations, which is our main concern and task. Our creative team of designers, marketing strategists, carpenters and economists is based in Ljubljana, Slovenia.
Each of the stakeholders of the process is qualified theoretically and practically for its work, and each one of them and the founder contributes essential ideas to make Bixie the most attractive, durable and useful balance bicycle on the market. Our goal is to create something beautiful, long-lasting, environmentally friendly, and, most importantly, safe.


I, (Andrej Kregar, founder) am thankful to all the people that helped me make Bixie a reality. Last year we worked on a prototype assembly, and now thanks to Peter and Murksli Custom Boards we made that prototype a reality. After that, the project began to grow like crazy, and the team that helped me was getting bigger and bigger. So, it is time to thank all of you for the support and even the smallest contribution to the project! I really appreciated it! Thank you Žiga Komperšek, Peter Vidmar, Blaže Ivanoski, Ambrož Močnik, Marko Bokan, Aleksandra Raspashkovska, Neza Presicek, Bor Jarh, Lovro Presicek, Žiga Četrtič, Ljiljana Janković, and to my Katja Istenič for making all the right decisions and getting us closer to realization.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are fully committed to this project. It might take us longer than we initially expect, but we are sure to bring this project to life. We already have 500 balance bike wheels in our storage, so production will start even if our campaign fails. You can count on us to build & deliver what we promised and to be transparent of our progress.

Development Process
We have produced and tested the prototypes; however, when we start with the serial production, we might find unexpected issues or other drawbacks. We promise to be open and transparent in our communications regarding timing and design changes. About any design change that might happen, you will be informed.

Mass Production
Manufacturing a product like Bixie is complex. We found local manufacturers who will make the parts and tools, so we think that the process should run smoothly. Fortunately, we make the pieces locally, so we do not expect more significant delays when manufacturing process starts. We already have considerable experience in product development and manufacturing process, so we don't expect any significant setbacks here. Nevertheless, we can't plan everything. If the funding of our campaign is successful, we are strongly determined to ensure that everything goes according to our plan.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
Correctly designed and built wood structures are very durable. Our wooden balance bike Bixie is made from beech wood, which means that the products made of Beech can take a lot of pressure over time. The hard surfaces of beech wood products will resist gouging and chipping better than some other woods. Maximizing the life of our product Bixie will be assured by wax & oils cover for wood frame which protects the wood from weather and moisture impacts.
Reusability and recyclability
Product and its packaging are all-natural and they can be easily recycled or reused. Bixie is made of wood which is one of the most sustainable materials because it holds CO2. Usual artificial materials cause an increase of CO2 emissions, but wood can even decrease CO2 emissions. Wood can be reused in many ways. 
We use a small amount of steel which can be recycled and just 2 grams of plastic. Plastic is used for only one inevitable part on the whole bike and that is valve caps and even those caps can be reused on other bikes or recycled.
Sustainable materials
Bixie is made from wood that is one of the most sustainable natural materials that reduces CO2 footprint. Wood is locally harvested and processed. The process is clean and does not make or use any hazardous materials or products. We covered grips and saddle with natural leather. We believe leather as a by-product of the meat industry is a sustainable product. Definitely locally made leather is more sustainable than using artificial leather or plastic.
Environmentally friendly factories
Our production process mostly consists of cutting wood where no harmful parts are made. Even glues that we use are not harmful to workers nor the environment. We are committed to use local factories and raw materials as much as possible to minimize transportation. We already have a committed partner in Kamnik, Slovenia to make this project a reality. Just 20 km away from our design studio.

updates.update_content: Even though we were well prepared and have all the materials in our warehouse we expect a delay due to delays in cardboard packaging delivery. Due to the coronavirus crisis, our order of cardboard packaging for Bixie is delayed till the 20th of April. Cardboard packaging industry has government instruction to supply medical and food industry with priority so we are pushed to the middle of April. We are a bit late with other parts too, but in usual circumstances, we would manage them in time (or minimal delay). We are sorry for the delay of your anticipated Bixie.

comments.content: Of course, being a wooden thing, there are already clear marks and bumps from clashes with the ground and other hard objects on its way :)

Andrej- It’s October 22, and I patiently await this lovely wooden balance bike... It’s been over a month since it was to be “shipped on Friday”, and I am concerned. Did you send any others to North America? Will you please look into it? Thank you.

Thank you. I was a little concerned that perhaps it was lost/delayed in transit with the pandemic and our domestic debacle with our federal government’s intentional mismanagement of the USPS. I hope you are all doing well and staying healthy.
Cool that’s great news!! Good times ahead 😁
What is missing now are some accessories like bell and such.
We need tracking numbers so we know when to expect the delivery.
Gentlemen, providing us no information about the latest delays and issues is the worst thing you can do.
Thanks.
I already imagine how people ask me where is this balance bike from, and I say "Go checkout Bixie and you won't be disappointed!"
Oh I just saw there are no pedals, nevermind my question about the training wheels then ;-)
Otherwise can't really be used as a first bike :(

campaign.story:
FEATURED IN 
WHAT IS ELK?
Elk is a development board for the blockchain and the decentralized web. It combines the simplicity of Arduino along with native support for decentralized networks. With only a few lines of code you can build IoT that interfaces with Ethereum, IPFS, Whisper, and more! 
Elk empowers developers to build what we call “Decent IoT”.
Elk includes a powerful processor to connect directly to decentralized networks with no intermediaries. It is plug-and-play just like an Arduino, includes an Arduino compatible SDK, and a mobile app that allows you to communicate with your hardware privately through decentralized technologies.
When building IoT projects with Elk, you're speaking the language of the decentralized web. Here's a quick look at what our SDK offers:
SAY HELLO TO "DECENT IOT" 👋
The potential for blockchain and decentralization extends far beyond the hype. Decentralization allows us to build IoT that is far more private, far more secure, and far more capable. We call it “Decent IoT”, and that’s what we are set out to introduce with Elk.
I. CENTRALIZED IOT (CURRENT ARCHITECTURE)
Current IoT architecture relies on centralized cloud providers for communication and data storage. This, by necessity, means that a cloud provider (and whomever hacks it):
Has control of your device
Can deny you access to your device
Can breach your privacy and track your metadata

II. DECENTRALIZED ("DECENT") IOT
The new decentralized web enables a completely new paradigm for IoT. Instead of communicating via a cloud provider, all communications are run privately through a decentralized network, and sensors' data can be logged on to IPFS instead of a central server.
Decent IoT is a paradigm that:
Gives you complete privacy, including metadata
Puts you, and only you, in control of your devices
Enables entirely new use-cases: payments, oracles, selling data, and more!

DECENT IOT PROJECTS YOU CAN BUILD WITH ELK
I. IOT WITH TRUE CONTROL AND TRUE PRIVACY
Build IoT that is completely private and gives you, and only you, control of your devices. With just a few lines of code you can built IoT that relies entirely on decentralized networks for communication and for data storage using Ethereum’s Whisper protocol, IPFS, and the Elk app.
Build a decentralized home automation system: a decentralized door lock, decentralized smart lights, or even a decentralized thermostat.
A decentralized smart door lock that you can control remotely with no intermediary cloud provider
II. IOT THAT ACCEPTS PAYMENTS
Despite the hype, crypto-currencies are here to stay and they are the easiest to integrate with IoT. While currencies like Bitcoin are used as a store of value, other cryptocurrencies are stable and can be used in payments with low transaction fees, such as DAI.
With only a few lines of code, program devices that accept crypto-currencies like Ethereum and ERC-20 tokens. Execute smart contracts, listen to events on the blockchain, and more!  
Build an electric outlet or a charging station that you can rent using crypto
A coffee machine that brews coffee in exchange for cryptocurrency
III. IOT THAT MOTIVATES YOU
Build devices that motivate you to do your workouts, wake up early, or water your plants. The possibilities are truly endless.
Lock your money into a punching bag and only get it back when you finish your workout
An alarm clock that charges you if you don't wake up on time
IV. AND MORE!
Blockchain integration with hardware devices paves the way for new applications. Sensors can be used as an oracle to the blockchain to trigger a smart contract action, you can use programmable money to rent assets and govern your devices, or even sell your sensors' data in an open marketplace without a third party.  
With decentralized IOT you can sell your data, like your car's data, in an online marketplace
Take the adrenaline in basketball to a whole new level with hoops you can bet against
A CLOSER LOOK AT ELK
I. "HELLO WORLD": CONTROLLING A LED WITH DECENTRALIZED TECHNOLOGIES
With just 15 lines of code, you can create your very first Decent IoT project! The following tutorial shows how you can get started using Elk and how to control the built-in LED on the board remotely using your phone and the magic of decentralized networks. 
Full sketch for remotely controlling the built-in LED using Whisper and the Elk app.
II. LET'S TALK PAYMENTS: BUZZ WHEN YOU RECEIVE ETHER!
It's hard to talk about decentralization without talking about payments. Again, with a very simple circuit and a few lines of code, this tutorial will show you how to build a buzzer that buzzes whenever a payment is made from/to your account.
A circuit that buzzes when an account sends/receives Ether
The full sketch for the above circuit
WHY ELK?
I. A 10X BETTER UX 
Elk offers a plug-and-play experience, just like an Arduino. You won’t need to deal with wallet and keys management, fuss over setting up nodes, tune their parameters to run well on an embedded device, handle crashes, etc. Elk "just works", so you can focus on building cool applications and not on the overheads when exploring decentralization.
Additionally, we extended Ethereum’s Whisper protocol and built the Elk mobile app, an app that makes it trivial for you to interact with your hardware remotely and privately via Whisper through any mobile device.
Using the Elk app, you can communicate and send commands remotely to your boards using Ethereum's Whisper network
The Elk protocol is a thin-wrapper around Whisper. With one line of code you can generate a UI in the Elk app for controlling your devices. No mobile development required. Now isn't that "decent"? ;)
II. BLOCKCHAIN AGNOSTIC
While our SDK ships with support for a number of decentralized networks, Elk is designed from the ground up to be blockchain agnostic and support for more platforms will continually be added by us and the community (psst: Elk is 100% open-source).
III. TRUE DECENTRALIZATION 
By default and when possible, Elk runs a light node and communicates directly with blockchain networks and not through a hosted service. Elk pushes decentralization all the way to the edge!

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
GENERAL SPECS
Easy to use and extensible SDK for Ethereum, Whisper, IPFS, Status, and more on the way.
A mobile app to easily control your hardware via Whisper
Arduino Compatible
Breadboard Compatible
100% open-source (hardware and software)
HARDWARE SPECS
Dual inline breadboard compatible hardware board (55mm x 25.5mm)
Quad Core 1Ghz Linux SoC (H3 from Allwinner) with 512MB of DDR3 RAM
8GB mass storage eMMC persistant storage
100Mhz 32-bit microcontroller (STM32f411 from STM)
2.4Ghz WiFi module with an integrated antenna
RGB LED
2 push-buttons
Exposed IOs (all are 3.3V but 5V tolerant):
28 Digital
10 Analog
2 UART
3 I2C
3 SPI
21 PWM
How Elk works internally
EARLY PROTOTYPES
I. FEBRUARY 2018: INITIAL PROTOTYPE AT ETHDENVER
We implemented the above prototype over three days at the ETHDenver hackathon. We used a NanoPi Duo as the microprocessor and an ESP8266 as the programmable microcontroller.
II. JUNE 2018: MORE COMPACT
A double sided PCB daughter board for PocketBeagle. We used an ESP32 module as the programmable microcontroller as well as a USB A port for WiFi connectivity.
III. OCTOBER 2018: OUR FIRST HOMEGROWN
Our first homegrown hardware design with the breadboard-compatible form factor we envisioned. It consists of a single core 1-Ghz microprocessor from TI with 512MB of ram (OSD3358-SM SoM from Octavo Systems), a 120Mhz micro-controller from ST (STM32F205), a compact WiFi 2.4Ghz WiFi module, a microSD card connector, an RGB LED, a USB port and a couple of buttons and a user-controlled LED. We only used SMD components for this one in order to get to that compact and small design.
IV. JUNE 2019: NEW DESIGN + HIGHER SPECS 
Our second homegrown high speed hardware using an 8-layer compact PCB. We completely redesigned the board from the ground up. We bumped up the specs to a 1Ghz Quad Core microprocessor (Allwinner H3) and utilized a smaller yet powerful 100Mhz micro-controller from ST (STM32F411). 

REWARDS
Feel free to add any of the below items to your rewards and we will ship them with your original reward.

TIMELINE 
TEAM 
OUR FRIENDS FROM THE DECENTRALIZED WORLD 
 Consensys Academy: New to blockchain? No problem! We’ve teamed up with ConsenSys Academy to include their blockchain training along with our Learner and Educator Kits!
 Streamr: Elk allows you to own your sensors’ data and sell them through Streamr’s open marketplace.
 Gitcoin: Elk is a great start to learn blockchain development and potentially earn money through Gitcoin’s open source bounties.
 Metamask: MetaMask is the go-to account management platform for the Ethereum Blockchain on desktop and now on mobile. MetaMask is a bridge that allows you to visit the distributed web of tomorrow in your browser today.
STORY
Our story begins in 2013 when we started 1Sheeld, a hardware board that turns your smartphone into 40+ Arduino shields. Since its inception, 1Sheeld has powered tens of thousands of makers in 120+ countries.
1Sheeld's Kickstarter Campaign from 2013
We’ve been following blockchain tech for years, and as we began exploring it in our spare time, we saw how decentralization allows us to build IoT that is far more private, far more secure, and far more capable.
Having said that, blockchain development is subpar, let alone blockchain development for embedded devices. While building prototypes of blockchain-connected devices, we had to acquire significant knowledge across multiple disciplines like networking, cryptography, security, OS administration and bare metal embedded development just to get started. This is a showstopper for newcomers, designers or prototypers who will develop the products of tomorrow.
At the ETHDenver Hackathon in 2018, we built a prototype of a development board that offers the simplicity of Arduino for building blockchain-connected devices. We ended up winning first place, and the Elk project was born. 
INVESTORS 
Our team is backed by venture capitals and angel investors: Tachyon - accelerator by Consensys ventures, Endure capital, 500 startups, Flat6labs, as well as angel investors like Karim Hussein, Con O'donnell, and Khaled Alashmouny.
Our technical advisor Sherif Eid helps us with hardware and software designs.
ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS
We'd like to thank Amir Hedayah for producing and editing our video. Thanks to M Omar, Ali, Zooka, Rady, Shady, Hany & Ramy for making the video happen. Thanks to TIEC for providing us the space to shoot our video, with special thanks to Lamiaa, A Adel, A Awad & M Sherif for facilitating. Thanks to our investors & mentors Tarek Fahim, Con O'Donnell, Waleed Khalil, Sharif Al Badawi, Hassan Haider, Ibrahim, Dina El Sehnoufy, Hany El Sonbaty, Ahmed Alfi,  Ramez Mohamed, Karim Hussein, Sherif Eid, Khaled Alashmouny and Omar Mehilba.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are a few challenges with this campaign: Manufacturing with high-quality components is always a challenge, testing all aspects of the product (SW & HW), and of course shipping on time. 
We have been working with manufacturers in China for the past 7 years and passed through many production batches within our previous company. 
We are designing a testing jig to test the firmware, the Elk agent, and the wifi connectivity on the board to ensure the board has no defects before shipping.
We put a realistic timeline with some buffers to ensure our manufacturing timeline is on schedule and we ship on time as we did in our previous Kickstarter.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
It is with a heavy heart that we inform you that we will be cancelling Elk’s Kickstarter campaign. We thank you all for your generous support, trust, and enthusiasm throughout our journey in bringing forth our vision of decentralized IoT, or as we like to call it, “Decent” IoT.
Elk was born out of enthusiasm to explore the potential of the blockchain in the physical world. We wanted to empower developers to explore and tinker with the potential of blockchain on hardware devices, as well as work with enterprises to help them explore how blockchain can help them tackle their IoT challenges.
We're super excited to share with you that Elk is now fully funded - in 30 hours and 30 minutes! Thank you thank you thank you for your generous and incredible support.

campaign.story:
Designed to help you achieve perfect sitting posture at all times.
When you use Infinity PAD, you will always be sure that you are sitting with the right posture.


Carefully researched and developed, Infinity PAD represents the culmination of a great deal of science and engineering. We have created this product to help you achieve perfect posture – all from the comfort of your seat.
Poor posture is something that we fall into over time, often when we are still very young. As we become used to sitting in the wrong posture, the muscles that determine our posture weaken over time, leaving us without the means to correct ourselves naturally. This is why so many people have to go through physical therapy as adults.
Again, Infinity PAD is the solution. It's simple, it's smart, and it's effective.
If your job requires you to sit at a desk, you haveto put some thought into your posture. Eight hours doing the same thing is always going to shape you, and when it comes to your seated posture, you need to know that you are shaping yourself positively.
Infinity PAD is a tool that you can use to give yourself a positive posture boost in the long term, encouraging and facilitating proper sitting habits. This product will train you to sit in a way that is conducive to good health!
By tilting your pelvis forward, Infinity PAD creates a healthy S-curve on your spine. Because the body's natural reaction to the balance point is to sit with your head up, your shoulders back, and your chest out, perfectly healthy posture that puts no unnecessary stress on your joints and muscles.


Whatever you are doing, you can benefit from using Infinity PAD. Simply set it up on whatever chair you are using and take a seat while you:
The more you use Infinity PAD, the more you will get out of it. Coming ready-to-use right out of the box, this lightweight piece of equipment requires no assembly either, so you can get to work on your perfect posture immediately. Turn any seat into a healthy seat!

Right now, we have come to you, Kickstarter, in order to raise the funds that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute Infinity PAD on a large scale. Our funding goal through this campaign is $2,500, and every dollar that we raise brings us a step closer to reaching that goal. To say thanks to all our contributors, we are offering significant discounts on Infinity PAD exclusively through this campaign.
There is already significant buzz surrounding Infinity PAD, and we could not be more excited to bring it to market. We know, however, that significant challenges will present themselves as we expand production and work to bring this product to a wider audience. Whatever challenges arise, we will figure out a solution, pushing forward to make this product into a reality. We will do anything it takes to get people sitting on Infinity PAD soon!

Beyond making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for Infinity PAD by telling all your friends and family about it. Let everyone you know on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter in on this posture-perfection invention.
We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for your time.

campaign.story:
How often do you stand in front of the dried-up remains of your plants and wonder what went wrong? Too much water? Too little? Boozy nights have them frazzled? 
Just like us humans, plants are living and sentient beings. It can be hard to understand exactly what they need and to decrypt all those silent messages they send us. The key to helping our plants survive and thrive without speaking the same language? It’s all about finding smarter, deeper ways to connect. This is why we developed the FYTA Beam.
The FYTA Beam is a small sensor that connects your plants with your smartphone so you know when they need more water, fertilizer, or a different ambience. 
 As seen in
How does the FYTA Beam work?
The FYTA Beam measures critical factors for a plant’s wellbeing, including 
soil moisture
nutrition levels
light intensity and 
temperature. 
Just insert it into the soil next to your plant and install the FYTA app – intelligent insights will be sent your way instantly via Bluetooth.
The FYTA Beam will seamlessly monitor the plant’s living conditions to ensure that it stays within the correct limits for the type of plant that you have. And when it’s time for action, you’ll get a simple notification on you App. No more guess work, lots more “it works!”.
If you have several plants, you can connect several FYTA Beams via Bluetooth with each other to create a network of up to 100m transmission range.
The FYTA Beam: better than smart
We couldn’t find a smart sensor that worked the way we wanted it to. Many existing sensors only measure one or two important parameters, have little design functionality, or are so badly designed that they look like they crash-landed from Planet Fugly.


We wanted to do a better job. This is what makes our FYTA Beam different from other plant sensors:
 Discrete: The FYTA Beam is small and has a reflective glass casing. It almost disappears in your planter.
 Eco-friendly: It’s powered by a built-in solar cell that extends the life of the CR battery every day. All components are detachable so they can be recycled separately. 
 Accurate: It measures voltage across the entire length of its stainless-steel probes. This way it collects more data and calculates highly reliable values.
 Adjustable: Have large plants? No problem. The probes are detachable and will be available in different lengths. 
 Customizable: Fancy a different feel? There will be different casing colors and designs available soon. 
 Good value: Did you know that many of our houseplants could easily outlast us if they received proper care? The FYTA Beam probably costs as little as your phone case  -  and is packed with really smart technology that will make your plants last longer.  



 In short, the FYTA Beam is customizable and designed from recyclable materials. It’s intelligent. It’s built to last.
 The FYTA App: more than a messenger 
The FYTA App does more than just check on your plants and nudge you in the right direction – it digs up a whole host of smart insights to help your relationship flourish in new ways:
 Plant identification: Do you know what plants you actually have? No? Well, the app is here to help you identify them!
 The FYTA plant library: Our plant library  includes plant care instructions for all common houseplants. It keeps all plant information handy and in one place. Simple.
 Virtual Garden: Create personal profiles for your plants and organize them in a virtual garden. Perfect if you have many to look after!
 Customized notifications: Let your plants nudge you whenever they need something or simply choose how often you’d like to hear from your plants. 
 Tutorials: Enjoy fun tutorials that show you how to take better care of your plants. You’ll even learn how to make plant babies. Yes, you read that right. 
All of these features come together to help you do one spectacular thing: better understand your plants and eventually connect with them device-free. 
The FYTA Base: check on your plants while you’re away
Leaving your beloved plants behind? Don’t fret. With the FYTA Base, it’s easy to check in on them while you’re away and share care instructions with a friend or neighbor, for instance via email.
The FYTA Base is a WiFi hub that 
connects all of your FYTA Beams to your home WiFi network, extending their range way further. 
helps you manage multiple sensors with greater ease and security. 
constantly monitors all FYTA Beams and uploads data to a secure cloud, allowing you to access critical insights whenever, wherever. 
 provides better notification and sharing options  through the FYTA App. 


Prototyping
We’ve been working for over 12 months on creating the FYTA eco-system: The FYTA Beam, The FYTA Base, the App and the cloud back-end. 
Developing the FYTA Beam was fun but challenging. A few things were straight-forward such as building  an NTC-Thermistor into the microcontroller to measure temperature. In order to measure light intensity, we chose to use the current generated by a solar cell instead a  photoiode ( which is commonly used). This  approach helps to to prolong battery life. The most challenging part was to develop a capacitive soil moisture sensor which also measures the salinity of the soil. Finally, we had to figure out how to have the sensors interact in a Bluetooth Mesh Network. 
Over time we built several generations of sensors to test different aspects of the electronics and the Bluetooth communication. The following picture shows several of our prototypes: 
Eventually, over the course of months and three generations of prototypes, the FYTA Beam became what it is today. In this video, our engineer Jacob is demonstrating the basic functionality of the sensor within a Mesh network with the help of a third party Bluetooth application. 
PLAY

Another important part of the process was the parameter calibration which we did with the help of a solar simulator (for light intensity). To calibrate the soil parameter, we used an array of soil samples with fixed values for moisture and salinity to derive the interdependency of both parameters. Finally, we compared our results with measurements taken with highly sensitive, professional measurement devices. 
Current Status and Next Steps
Hardware development and programming is now complete. We have visited several manufactures in China and entered into an early stage cooperation with an experienced high-quality producer. 
We have a demo version of the App and are now working on connecting the devices to the FYTA App and FYTA server (about 50% done).  Here is a sneak peek of our App:
PLAY

Click here to open an interactive demo reel of the FYTA App

We are aiming at completing this stage by July to have sufficient time for further testing and calibrations before we order the first batch of products.
Why Kickstarter?
We have sufficient funds to complete the development process of the FYTA Beam. With your help we will
· finance the tools required for mass production with our manufacturing partner 
· run a test production of the alpha units 
· improve the FYTA Beam eco-system with the help of your feedback.
· connect people to plants all over the world!
Stretch Goals
We’d love to offer casings and probes to customize or personalize the Beam. However, we will only be able to produce probes in different lengths or casings in different designs if we collect sufficient funds to pre-finance the production of a larger lot. Those are our stretch goals:

Future plans include the development of different App versions (e.g. for children and offices) as well as the integration with Smart Home Systems. 

Rewards
Our reward tiers include the following products:
The FYTA Beam System
The FYTA Beam System consists of the FYTA Beam, the FYTA App and the optional FYTA Base. Our rewards include single Beams, as well as three different bundles (Plant Lover, Plant Addict, and Plant Nerd) to meet different needs.
Soil pH Test Kit
Plants need to sit in the right potting mix to to grow and thrive. If your plants sits in wrong or poor quality soil, even the most accurate measurements and best care schedule won't prevent your plant from stunting. This pH test kit will help you to determine whether your plant needs different soil. The FYTA App will lead you through the process and advise you.
The STATEMENT TOTE 
Profess your plant love to the world and make new friends with this awesome screen-printed statement tote bag (100% cotton). Trust us, plant people are the best! 

Our Team
Berlin-based, but with an otherworldly vision. We are FYTA, and we develop inventive, intuitive and cool products for a new generation of indoor gardeners.
FYTA was founded in 2018 by Claudia Nassif and Sylvie Basler. We are two passionate plant lovers who failed to find the products and insights we needed to create our own urban jungles at home. So we decided to develop them ourselves, for us and others who may struggle to keep these wondrous green creatures alive and happy.

Before embarking on this journey, Claudia and Sylvie held executive positions in large international companies. Together, they combine over forty years of experience in finance, management, product development, branding and design. Their work today is supported by an international team of plant scientists, developers, designers and creatives. 
Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The FYTA Beam will be built by our experienced manufacturing partner. With production facilities in Shenzhen, China, they understand every step from design to direct fullfilment and is the partner of several IoT companies.

Throughout the development process, we have been in very close contact with our engineers and programmers. All along, we have been supported by Dr. Oliver Lang of SONNENREPUBLIK - a true Design-For-Manufacture veteran - who has been working with us for over a year.

Our next step is to build the tools by mid-2019, get the final assembly line going, install testing equipment and do two more builds for stress testing before beginning production. We are very confident that the hardware will satisfy our high-quality standards. 

What most certainly will require several rounds of adjustment is the user experience with the FYTA App. We will have user groups with different needs who are probably best served with different App versions – offices for instance, or kids. However, we would need more resources and time to contextualize and meet all of these needs. 

We are confident that we can manage the above mentioned risks and that we can deliver. We have the right talent and resources in place to meet our deadlines and get the FYTA Beam to you in time. With the help of your feedback, we will adjust and iterate the FYTA App to make sure that it will serve your needs.

Of course, we will be keeping our supporters in the loop and inform you of the progress. Join us on our journey!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
campaign.env:
Environmental commitments
Visit our Environmental Resources Center to learn how Kickstarter encourages sustainable practices.
Long-lasting design
We used durable materials like borosilicate glass and stainless steel to maximize the lifetime oft he FYTA Beam. Several parts, such as the soil probes and the casings, can be detached and replaced.
Reusability and recyclability
Many parts such as the glass casing and the steel probes can be detached and recycelt separately. We intent to minimize the use of plastic for packaging and are planning to maximize the use biodegradable materials.
Sustainable materials
We have consciously minimized the use of plastic in the product design of the FYTA Beam and used durable materials such as borosilicate glass and stainless steel. In addition, we build in a solar cell which powers the FYTA Beam jointly with the Lithium coin battery. This reduces the need for battery replacement.
