comments.content: Yes! This is by far the longest running Kickstarter Campaign I have ever been part of. After half the time others have thrown the towel or delivered trash. So, yes, thank you and keep going!
I think the new design is great and I'm looking forward to finally holding it in my hands! I am looking forward to the FYTA Beam! Kind regards Erwin
Still waiting enthusiastically.
Hey, we will be showing the new design next week. It's pretty amazing. Thanks so much for being so patient. :)
How can i proceed with my refund request? This is no longer Ok...
I unfortunately would like to be refunded please. You haven't updated since October. I understand that the world is battling a virus but updates would've kept me on board.

I have just put in my refund request, I would continue backing this project but unfortunately the updates are too far between and no major updates come from those updates. It is disappointing as I was really excited for this project but after the failure of the delivery timeline and the drop out of the updates.
Wie läuft es bei euch so? Wir haben alle schon länger nichts mehr gehört und ich freue mich eigentlich immernoch auf euer Produkt. :)
I have already requested refund and there's no response.
This project is clearly dead. I request a refund
I am requesting for a refund. Thanks

Hey team! A few comments down you mentioned the next batch of payment returns would be due the 25th. I filled in the refund application form at the end of October and still no refund. Please let me know when I can expect the money back...
Sure - thanks! Will do that. Can you give me an email address or something, so I can send it to you?
hang in there - I'm excited to get my fytabeam, even if it takes a while longer! :-)

I start being sick of these kickstarter projects that never seem to get sent, no updates, then a year later we hear there's not enough money to carry on.... I still haven't received anything or seen any updates for a long time, whats going on?
Any update? Last time I have read anything was July? Could we get a commitment that your team will update us at least monthly? Even if it’s no news, contact with the backers would be great.
Also wondering how progress is going.
Hallo, how are things going on - will we see a product one day? Regards
HH
Thank you
Any further news?
Not all wishes come true but we can always hope. I wish you guys the best of luck for this awesome product, hopefully it'll come to fruition, as I'll be then here packing you guys up.
Cloud you please update on the progress.
Update please
When does shipping start?
Any news? I'm still super excited to get my hands on the FYTA beam. Are we still looking at July for delivery or what's the status?
#417 here. When can I expect my FYTA Beams to be delivered? Thanks
Hi, could you please provide some information on shipping for backer 514. Has it been shipped or is there still a chance to change the shipping address?
Hi, Not yet delivered, Kindly update me the status.
Hallo, still waiting for ... what?
Patty

Super excited to get the FYTA Beam for my wife she has been getting in to gardening more and more over the past year. I'm glad to be patient for this, I know there has been plenty of road blocks! Regardless, my wife and I are moving soon and the address I put on the survey won't work now, is there a way I could change the delivery address??
Thank you for the response and update. It is much appreciated.
.. hallo, any idea of the (new) time table - for Europe?
Im not panicking, this is common when backing tiny tech like this. But I would also like an update. Are you still on track for delivery March/April?
Have we done our money? Doesnt look good. I will be pleasantly surprised if this ever arrives. Have a bad feeling.
A Status update would be highly appreciated at this stage...
Any updates??
Hallo, when you are going to deliver to Europe?
Got it. Thks
Hope it’s going well and sending plant 🌱 good vibes
FYTA, just what does this thing measure? The campaign said it tested a bunch of things, not just a gloried pH meter.
Excellent looking forward to receiving these
Thanks looks like I need longer probes:), is the battery usage per probe tracked via app and how long do the beams stay powered before needing to have battery replaced/charged?
Is the beam for indoor and outdoor use? What are the limitations?

Also pity the different probe length stretch goal wasn’t achieved. Any plans to add this opiton for a little extra cost if backers wish to pay extra? Would the extra length improve the data recorded by the beam or is it just to anchor the beam better in the soil

Yes It is clear. So you could use it for plants under a veranda but when winter comes they have to go indoor. I understand. Still for people like my wife without green thumbs the inside plants will not get too much or too little water. That is one of the purposes of the fyta beam. I am very happy the project can continue

Hi fyta congrats on goal just small remark I am from Europe (Netherlands) and you state just a drizzle and some rain but lately we have hail and a lot of rain how will the sensor react in winter temperature and a lot of rain

Love love love your product concept! However, most of my plants are outdoors, which is the real problem for me - if I don't get outside to look at them I don't know how well they are doing. If you ever make them truly waterproof I'd happily buy 2 dozen! Keep at it!!
Really do love the concept, and I think the sensor design is simply elegant, plus the mesh networking is just excellent. Hats off to you for a startup!!
Good luck on the last few days of the campaign!
I really want this to succeed!
I understand one beam can be used up to 4 plants. Since I ordered the 3x Beams pledge, will I able to give one beam to a friend who can download the app separately for her plants?
Thanks!
How many test do the Soil pH Test Kit last?
Are they rain prof? My thought is that my strawberry patch could use some help - would I be able to put a Beam out there to help med along?
the little physicist :-)
I am wondering whether it will be possible to connect to two base stations. I'm considering getting two sets. One for home, one for the office.
Thnx. Sounds good :)

campaign.story:
Combining public art and environmental preservation, The Open Orchard will be a vast new artwork by Sam Van Aken on Governors Island in NYC. 
It will take the form of an orchard of 50 fruit trees, each containing multiple varieties of peaches, plums, apricots, cherries and apples. These varieties were once common in the NYC region and important to its history as an agricultural center but have completely disappeared due to climate change, the industrialization of agriculture and rise of monocultures (growing just a single crop or plant species, increasing the risk it could be completely wiped out by disease).
The Open Orchard brings these native varieties back to life as living trees and shares them with the public, giving everyone a chance to see and taste fruits that haven’t existed for hundreds of years, and preserving them for future generations.
A visible fixture in one of NYC’s most beloved public spaces, The Open Orchard will be a lasting, living portrait of our agricultural past and an urgent reminder of what has been lost. With your help, we can grow an orchard, an artwork and a community — and literally bring this project to life. 
Sam has created trees containing up to 40 different types of fruit in sites across the country. This would be his first orchard, with 50 hybrid trees containing hundreds of different varieties.
Why is this important? 
The Open Orchard goes far beyond being a beautiful (and delicious) resource for NYC. It’s also a gene bank and living archive that works to safeguard biodiversity by preserving hundreds of unique fruit varieties that have otherwise vanished. And this is of critical importance to securing the future of our food supplies and shared environment.
A century ago, the U.S. had over 3,000 distinct varieties of peaches; now that number is under 100. With this staggering loss of biodiversity, we risk losing entire categories of crops and plants, since monocultures are more susceptible to being wiped out by disease. The Open Orchard will keep disease-free, heirloom varieties alive and in the public realm, so they could one day be reintroduced on a larger scale.
Starting this summer, you will be able to engage with the project and these pressing issues through a series of public programs, including tree-grafting workshops, fruit tastings, botanical drawing lessons and blossom tours on Governors Island.
In these ways, The Open Orchard will serve as a model for how to make our agricultural practices more resilient, sustainable and democratic — indeed, more open — a model that could be applied in other places and communities around the globe.
The grafted trees will have multiple fruits growing on their branches, preserving hundreds of varieties in just 50 trees.
How will the orchard work?
To create the orchard, Sam will use an ancient process called “grafting” to combine branches from different tree species onto a single rootstock. Since the seed of a fruit tree is a genetic variant (not an exact copy), grafting is the only way to preserve a specific species for the future.
Approximately 200 of these hybrid trees are currently growing in a nursery on Governors Island; with your help, 50 of those trees can be planted as a permanent orchard on the Island. The remaining 150 trees will be given away to community gardens and organizations in all five boroughs, allowing even more communities to engage in the project as it puts down roots across the city. 
Artist's diagram showing the multiple grafts on a single tree
Baby trees growing in a nursery
About the artist
Sam Van Aken combines new technologies with traditional modes of art-making to create projects that cross boundaries and engage public spaces. His work has been exhibited nationally and internationally, receiving numerous honors including a Joan Mitchell Award, an International Association of Art Critics Award and a Creative Capital Grant. He is currently the Graduate Program Coordinator for the School of Art at Syracuse University. In 2019, his work will be featured in the Cooper Hewitt Design Triennial.
Sam Van Aken
About Governors Island  
Governors Island is a 172-acre island in the heart of New York Harbor nestled between Lower Manhattan and the Brooklyn waterfront. A former military installation closed to the public for nearly two centuries, the Island has been transformed over the last decade into popular seasonal destination open to the public May 1–October 31. An award-winning new park engineered for climate resilience is complemented by dozens of unique historic buildings, educational and cultural facilities, a rich arts and culture program and a 22-acre National Monument managed by the National Park Service. 
Since opening to the public in 2005, Governors Island has played a unique role in New York City’s cultural landscape, providing a one-of-a-kind platform for artists, cultural organizations and educators to create groundbreaking and experiential programming free and open to the public. Public art commissions have strengthened the Island’s capacity to connect groundbreaking contemporary artworks in an accessible, natural environment to an ever-growing audience. 
Governors Island at sunset
What will your contribution support? 
Your contributions will go directly toward growing the trees in the nursery and planting them on the Island to create The Open Orchard, as well as their ongoing care. In addition, funds from the campaign and elsewhere will be used to support free, public programming, including grafting workshops, fruit tastings and culinary events.
Every spring, the trees will blossom in multiple colors corresponding to their multiple fruit varieties
Why Kickstarter? 
To create an orchard that belongs to everyone, we need to rally together. This is a project that will thrive on the energy of a large and diverse community of invested participants, and we see Kickstarter as a key way to build this community from the ground up. We hope you will join us in helping it grow.
A plum harvest
Rewards
Collection of historical recipes ($25)
Receive a digital collection of historical recipes featuring fruits from The Open Orchard, compiled by the artist and sent straight to your inbox, plus updates on the project as it grows.
Sample historical recipe from the artist's research for The Open Orchard
Heirloom peach seeds ($50)
Grow your own peach tree with this packet of heirloom Lovell Peach seeds. This type of peach was used to create the rootstock that forms the basis for the trees in The Open Orchard. The seeds come packaged in a custom muslin bag with growing and care instructions written by the artist. Plant them to grow a tree that is ready for grafting, or simply enjoy the peaches it produces, which can be eaten fresh, or preserved by drying or canning. (These seeds can be started indoors and moved outside after June 1. They ripen the third and fourth week of September in New York.)
Peach seeds, ready to grow!
Make your own tree ($100)
Learn how to graft fruit trees in this invitation-only workshop led by Sam Van Aken on Governors Island. The tree you create can be taken home and planted, or donated to a community garden in the five boroughs to help the project grow. 
Sam teaching how to graft fruit trees
Donate a tree ($500)
Help The Open Orchard spread to all five boroughs by donating a tree from the project nursery on Governors Island to a community garden in NYC, and you'll receive a photo of the tree and a history of the fruits it contains. 
Help the project blossom in all five boroughs by donating a tree to a local community garden
Adopt a tree ($1,000)
Adopt a tree in The Open Orchard nursery on Governors Island, and your name (or any name you choose) will be written on a metal tree tag and safely attached to one of its branches. You will also receive a photo of the tree in bloom and the history of the fruits it contains. 
Your name will be handwritten on a metal tag and attached to the branches of your adopted tree
"Grafted" tree tag print ($1,250)
Pick up a limited-edition print of original collages by Sam Van Aken, created through a process of splicing together different tree tags. You have a choice of four designs, each 16 x 20 inches (ships unframed). Includes the "Adopt a tree" reward above.
Grafted Tree Tag 1: Beauty Plum-Moorpark Apricot (2018), Archival Print on Canson Etching, 16 x 20 inches. Unframed.
Grafted Tree Tag 2: Bing Cherry-Stanley Prune-Beauty Plum (2018), Archival Print on Canson Etching, 16 x 20 inches. Unframed.
Grafted Tree Tag 3: Chinese/Mormon Apricot-Stanley Prune (2018), Archival Print on Canson Etching, 16 x 20 inches. Unframed.
Grafted Tree Tag 4: Hollybrook (2018), Archival Print on Canson Etching, 16 x 20 inches. Unframed.
Original botanical drawing ($5,000)
Collect an original etching by Sam Van Aken inspired by the fruit varieties in The Open Orchard. Each etching is accompanied by a letterpress print telling the history of the varieties represented. Also includes the "Adopt a tree" reward above. The first backer at this level gets first pick, the second backer second pick, etc. Pledge early to ensure you get your favorite! 
Botanical Drawing 1: Common Damson (Plum) (2018), Copper Plate Etching and Letter Press Description, 15 ½ x 17 inches. Framed.
Botanical Drawing 2: Napoleon (Cherry) (2018), Copper Plate Etching and Letter Press Description, 15 ½ x 17 inches. Framed.
Botanical Drawing 3: Peach (Apricot) (2018), Copper Plate Etching and Letter Press Description, 15 ½ x 17 inches. Framed.
Handcrafted NYC tree ($10,000)
Claim this reward, and Sam Van Aken will make a tree just for you and plant it at your home or in a location of your choosing within 100 miles of NYC. Available in either apple or cherry varieties, these handcrafted trees contain multiple, heirloom and rare fruits that originated in the NYC region and tell the story of its agricultural history over the last 500 years. The artist will grow your tree in a nursery over the course of a year, and coordinate planting in fall 2020. 
One of Sam Van Aken's custom-grown trees
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are always challenges inherent to a project that involves the cultivation of living trees: from unpredictable weather to how well the trees will adapt to their new home. That said, Sam has been creating hybrid trees – with up to 40 different kinds of fruit – across the country for the last ten years, and Governors Island has a programming team well-versed in producing complex public art projects, as well as an expert horticulture team that can advise on tree care.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Sam Van Aken speaking virtually at Columbia University on 10/22
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone,

Wanted to share the exciting news that Sam Van Aken will be giving a virtual talk at Columbia University's School of the Arts on October 22 at 6:30pm. He'll be speaking along with artist Jorge Otero-Pailos on the topic of "experimental preservation" as it relates to The Open Orchard and his larger practice of cultivating hybrid fruit trees with lost, native and heirloom varieties.

updates.update_userinfo: Spring blooms + join a virtual workshop with Sam Van Aken
updates.update_content:
We did it! Thanks to your support, we've reached our goal! In the weeks and months to come, we will be getting the trees in the nursery ready to plant and laying the groundwork for the orchard, as well as the many community events and workshops to come.
Please stay tuned for updates on our progress and to watch this project grow. We'll also work hard to get your rewards to you promptly. In the meantime, feel free to reach out to us with any questions.

This is it! We're in the final hours of the campaign, and we don't want anyone to miss out on being part of this project with us. Please remind your friends and colleagues who might be thinking about pledging that it's not too late – they can claim some incredible rewards (prints and trees still in stock), and help us build something truly important and beautiful that will last for generations.
Now, let's race to the finish line!

It's the home stretch, and we couldn't be more energized by the incredible support from our community of backers! With just two days left in the campaign, we are well over our initial (and official) Kickstarter goal, but we still have a ways to go to reach our stretch goal of $30,000.
If we can reach that number, we'll be able to send 100 additional trees from the project nursery out to local gardens and communities across the city. It's definitely a stretch, but we're not giving up! Please help us spread the word and invite anyone who might be interested to give in these remaining hours. The campaign ends at 5pm on Friday.

Dear backers,
Thanks to you – all 152 of you – we’ve reached our goal of raising $20,000 in support of planting a public orchard, living artwork and gene bank preserving hundreds of fruit varieties for generations to come.
Our campaign still has 9 days left, so we want to dream even bigger. If we make it to our stretch goal of $30,000 before time runs out, we will expand the tree nursery on Governors Island and donate .

The hands-on grafting workshop reward sold out much faster than expected, so we're adding a second workshop. If you or someone you know missed out on the chance to learn how to graft and grow your own tree, now’s your chance! Only 30 spots are available in this artist-led workshop on Governors Island this summer. 
There are also a bunch of other great rewards still left, from botanical illustrations to the chance to adopt a tree on the Island.

comments.content: Did anyone who pledged for them ever receive the trees we grafted? Will we ever?

campaign.story:
We help you create mobile photos like never before. 
Shot with various mobile phones + LIT Flash prototypes. Explore them in full resolution >
No matter the scale of your idea, the given conditions or your technical skills, you should be able to expand the boundaries of your creativity.
Smartphones don’t enjoy all the superpowers-inducing equipment their big sister DSLRs do.
We are here to fix this.
A powerful Xenon flash is just the first step of our journey. But with your help, it can become a giant leap for mobile photographers everywhere. Let's make it LIT together. 🔥 


MEET YOUR NEW PHOTOGRAPHIC ASSISTANT  
It feels familiar, but it’s new at the same time. [iPhone 8 Plus + LIT Flash]
We created the whole LIT Flash experience with a clearly defined objective: to give the world a tool which represents the sheer joy of flash photography.
LIT Flash will make you rethink what you are capable of, because:

  1. It's your own powerful light source   
LIT Flash prototype at full power. Triggering with built-in remote capture button. Distance: 130 feet (40 meters). Settings: 1/30s, ISO 300. [iPhone 8 Plus + LIT Flash]

  2. Gives you complete wireless freedom of motion 
Shape the light in the most natural way - with your hand. [iPhone XS + 2 x LIT Flash]
Move your phone with one hand and the flash with the other or trigger your smartphone camera capture from up to 130ft (40 m) away with the button on your LIT flash device.

  3. Brings pure magic into flash photography 
 Even if you have no prior flash experience, you can begin to play with it.
LIT Flash lets you be more aware of the light and how it impacts your photographs.

  4. It will be always with you 
[iPhone 8 Plus + LIT Flash]


PRESS ABOUT US
• “... designed to be simple to use yet magical in its features and results.” - Petapixel
• “Handheld flash gives iPhone photos studio pop.” - Cult of Mac
• “… pretty impressive.” - The Phoblographer
• “… this flash will be top-notch …” - 35mmc
• “… a good old-fashioned xenon flash …” - DPReview
• “… you know how terrible smartphone built-in flash is.” - DIY Photography
• “… in means more versatility when it comes to taking photos.” - NEW ATLAS 


WE BELIEVE IN ... 
  ... the mobile future
The last 100+ years of cameras that changed the face of photography as we know it. Do you recognize them?
It is time to treat smartphones like the amazing cameras they are and smartphone photographers like the artists they can be.  
WE PUT OUR MONEY WHERE OUR MOUTH IS. All the photographs and videos on this campaign page have been made by us, using various smartphones and LIT Flash prototypes. Most of them are also edited on mobile.

  ... challenging the status quo 
Anyone who today wants to engage in flash photography needs to invest first in a traditional camera system and learn how to use it!
We don't like that. We always seek for another way. A better way. A bigger way. One that is innovative. And moves the World forward.
Leveraging state-of-the-art technologies we help you create photos like never before.

  ... less but better   
It’s not how many features we can implement. It’s how many features you can’t live without. It's not just the appearance. It's the way it makes you feel, the way it interacts with you, the way it inspires you.
Only well executed objects can be really valuable.
[All three photographs: iPhone 8 Plus + LIT Flash]


#SHOTWITHLIT: A FLASH YOU CAN USE IN ANY SITUATION
  Standard Mode For Every Day (or Night)
Illuminate life. 
No flash vs. LIT Flash. [iPhone X + LIT Flash]
Comparison: iPhone built-in LED flash vs. shot with LIT Flash.
What's in your bag? [iPhone 8 Plus + LIT Flash]

  High-Speed Sync (HSS) Mode ...
  ... for freezing motion
This advanced LIT Flash capability enables you to use really short exposure times (down to 1/10,000s). Without any troubles for you, LIT Camera app will enable it automatically when needed.  
Creative control: left photo at longer exposure time (1/40s) vs. freezing the motion on the right photo (exposure time 1/800s). [iPhone XS + 2 x LIT Flash]

  ... to balance direct sunlight
[iPhone XS + LIT Flash]

 ... and precise creative control when you need it 
Various originals, one edited with Snapseed and in action. [iPhone XS + LIT Flash]

  Stroboscopic Mode for Those Playful Moments
You can set the frequency and number of flashes for a single capture:  
[iPhone 8 Plus/X + LIT Flash]
Check more photos in full resolution.>


AN APP THAT'S GOT YOUR BACK
Can anyone get into using our flash straight away? Yes, and much more:
ONE BUTTON EXPERIENCE: Full automatic mode, hassle-free (TTL metering with pre-flash).
CREATIVE MODES: Portrait, product, night, light painting, bokeh, ... For perfect outcome and your creative control in specific situations.
FULL MANUAL CONTROL: Your total control over ISO, Shutter Time and Flash power.
iOS app first working screens.
Of course this is not where it ends. LIT Flash experience is defined by hardware and software working harmoniously together. We will continue to refine it by blurring the boundaries between the two and adding new features. To make it even more intuitive and ultimately more useful.

  Comprehensive knowledge section, built right inside
To teach you basic flash photography techniques and most effective photo editing methods.  
The right knowledge at your fingertips.
From raw to finished photo in less than 2 minutes. We will teach you simple and effective editing techniques - mobile first
With future app and firmware updates, LIT Flash will only get better and better.  


IMAGE QUALITY COMPARISON
The more the light, the better the image quality and details. These two photographs might look the same at low resolution (Kickstarter allows us 680px wide photos):  
Shot on iPhone 8 Plus (Telephoto camera): ISO: 400 (left), 20 (right), Shutter time: 1/60 both times.
But if we take a closer look (100% crop, JPG files): 
(no photoshopping on these photographs)
LIGHT SHAPING EXAMPLE 
Free hand light shaping: an example of how the light direction impacts the mood and look of your photograph. Photos by beta tester Jure Ahtik. [iPhone X + LIT Flash]


FEATURES
  Good design down to the last detail
Building truly intuitive and useful products is about saying no to good things and settling only for the best ones:
LIT Flash top view: RGB status LED in dark and bright environment. Visible only when your attention is needed. [iPhone 8 Plus + LIT Flash]
Perfect fit for your hand. [iPhone 8 Plus + 2 x LIT Flash]


Unbelievably powerful: State-of-the-art Xenon technology 
Various stock and custom developed flash lamps and trigger components we tested during the LIT Flash development. [iPhone 8 Plus + LIT Flash]
Xenon lamp produces, in a short timeframe, much more light than any other existing technology. WHY NOT LED? Too weak, too slow, too ugly. LEDs have become a popular source of light, but making great photographs differs from other usages in 3 key aspects: 
you want to freeze the movement,
you still need huge amount of light in that short time,
you want a light with high CRI (color rendering index).
Xenon Flash renders colors with the same accuracy as the sun. LED lights generally render colors with less accuracy, and even the best ones are not good enough for perfect skin tones on your photographs.
Luminous energy (total amount of light) out of popular LED light vs. LIT Flash if you take a photograph at 1/100s exposure time.
In real-life, this means:    
1500 lumen LED (Lume Cube) vs. LIT Flash, both at full power. iPhone 8 Plus (Wide camera) at 1/100s, ISO 100. Photographs are not manipulated.
Or expressed in other metrics: LIT Flash can illuminate objects 7-times more distant than your best comparable LED. 


    Prototype overview 
Unedited photos from the prototype overview video:   
Ondu wooden pinhole camera. [iPhone X + LIT Flash]


TECH SPECS
XENON
 •  Flash Power output: 40Ws at full power (equivalent to Guide No. ~32)
 •  Flash Power settings:  1/1 to 1/256 (100-0.4%)
 •  Flash Duration: 1/350 to 1/30,000 Second
 •  Modes: Classical, HSS
 •  Recycle time: 0.1-2.5 Seconds
 •  Flash-Ready Indicator:  Yes
 •  Light beam angle and shape:  90°, cone shape, even light distribution (no hot spots)
 •  Light color temperature:  5500 K
BATTERY
•  Type: Built-in Li-Ion, 2800 mAh, 3.7V
•  Charging: USB-C
•  Life on a single charge: 200 full-power flashes, 400 flashes in real life usage (as tested) 
OTHER
 •  Photo capture triggering: with app or with Flash (remote capture button helps you trigger your smartphone camera capture from up to 130ft (40 m) away)
 •  Exposure control: Auto (TTL), Creative modes, Manual
 •  Mounting options: 1/4” tripod thread and bayonet accessories mount
 •  Dimensions: 4.1 x 2.4 x 1.5" / 105.0 x 65.0 x 38.0 mm
 •  Weight: Approx. 8.8 oz / 250 g
BLUETOOTH
 •  Wireless Sync: Bluetooth 5.0 (works with lower versions as well)
 •  Wireless Range: approx. 130 feet (40 meters)
 •  Multi-flash Sync: Yes, up to 4 units, controlled separately from the app
•   My precious:  With this (optional) setting, LIT Camera app notifies you (even if closed) if your LIT Flash gets out of reach + shows you the "last seen" location of it. Alternatively, triple pressing the LIT Flash button will make your misplaced phone ring even if it's on silent.
•   Lost & found network: In case you actually do lose your Flash, you'll be able to mark it as lost in the anonymous Lost & Found network, powered by our friends Chipolo and increase the chance of getting it back.  
COMPATIBILITY
 •  iOS: Compatible with iPhone 7 and later models:  7, 7 Plus, 8, 8 Plus, X, XS, XS Max
 •  Android: We have a working android app, but can’t yet confirm the whole range of supported models. We successfully tested some, but not even close to all of them.
To help us prioritize specific model support, we'll get back to you once the campaign is finished to find out which phone you’re using or plan to use.
As our work continues in the next months, we will be updating you openly and regularly about the progress and list of compatible phones. If at the end your phone won’t be supported, we will not turn our back on you, even if it means returning you your pledge. 🙏
Circular fresnel lens optics assembly enables cone shaped light beam with even light distribution. [light output simulation].


PLANS FOR THE FUTURE: ACCESSORIES
As we plan to continuously evolve LIT Flash experience with new app and device firmware updates, new accessories will be released along them, adding more effects and functions with every release. With LIT Flash‘s modular architecture, all this new functionality will come without adding any complexity.
Your Flash will always be intuitive and simple to use.
An example set of accessories:
1  Dome diffusor for wider light output (140° FOV)
2  Color filter holder and various color filters
3  Honeycomb for narrower light output (60/45° FOV)
4  Phone clip-on holder
5  Wrist (or neck) strap
All accessories will be released along with 3D model and blueprints so you'll be able to either purchase them or 3D print/make them by yourself.



HOW WE MADE IT
We divided our R&D efforts into 4 main sections: 
Xenon: high voltage light emitting 
Battery: powering device and charging
Bluetooth sync and connectivity
Housing assembly: optical performance and durable construction
We've been working with various R&D partners for separate sections, already chose and started working with European manufacturing partner and negotiated sourcing for all the critical components: Li-Ion battery, custom made Xenon flash lamp and custom made main capacitor.



   Electronics: PCBA and firmware
The most important part of any Xenon flash is the quality and power of light it emits. We successfully tuned the high voltage Xenon part of electronics and locked main components + FW features. 
Research and development at it's finest. [iPhone 8 Plus + LIT Flash]
Complete electronics architecture and PCBA design is currently in the testing phase in slightly bigger size than the final one (seen in the prototype overview video), due to easier and faster iterations.


 Bluetooth 
Over 20,000 photographs have been made during the Bluetooth sync development. 😁
It's finished and we can reliably trigger and catch a flash with approx. 1 millisecond accuracy. Currently there is nothing comparable on the market to LIT Flash.  

One of the early Bluetooth stability and app performance real-life tests.
We tested Bluetooth speed and reliability in real-life studio situation, shooting a whole fashion editorial with professional fashion and beauty photographer Mimi Antolovic: 
Our model Nevenka Peclin showing how to do it like a pro at the golden age of 70ish. [iPhone 8 Plus + LIT Flash prototype]


 Assembly design 
We wanted to make LIT Flash easy to understand, useful and aesthetic. Assembled from as few parts as possible, it's truly thorough down to the last detail. 
Various product design iterations.


   Assembly engineering 
Various housing assembly and fresnel lens design versions.
 To make LIT Flash long-lasting and environmentally friendly, we use following materials:
anodised and laser engraved Aluminum for body and 1/4" tripod thread,
semi-translucent UV-Stabilised Polycarbonate for top/bottom lid,
polished Stainless Steel for bayonet ring + multi-function button,
optical clear UV-stabilised Polycarbonate for fresnel lens,
White high-reflective (metallized where needed) ABS plastic for reflector and inner structure.
CNC milling: from raw aluminum to leftovers and housing. [iPhone 8 Plus and LIT Flash]
Final touch: anodising and laser engraving. Moment Macro lens used for this photo. [iPhone 8 Plus and LIT Flash]
Housing assembly render.
Laser engraving on the back. [iPhone 8 Plus and LIT Flash]

REWARDS  

Connect with us: LIT UNIVERSE
We are building our own universe. It is a home to curiosity, exploration, and everything that ignites creativity. Everyone can join in.
•  Shot with LIT: @shotwithlit
•  Things that inspire us: @samplesbylit
 

PRODUCTION TIMELINE
We are committed to under-promising and over-delivering:



WE ARE LIT
A team of friends, photographers, entrepreneurs, engineers, designers, explorers. 
Gaja Zornada - Executive with the vast experience in image making and camera industry.
Also a: Ex New Yorker, Startup mentor and community builder, (computer) museum buff, adrenaline junkie and avid traveller.
MA, Fine Arts mixed with a bit of NYU Stern Business School
Marko Pirc - Award winning product developer, over the last 6 years responsible for development and manufacturing of the original Lumu light meter (2013) and Lumu Power 1 and 2 (2015 and 2018). The latter is currently selling in US and CA Apple Stores.
Also a:  Photographer, podcaster, glider flying pilot and rocket model maker. Pixel perfect.
BSc, Physics (Technical Physics and Optics).
Jure Novak - During the last 4 years contributed to projects in a range optics-related topics including optical fiber manufacturing, applied nonlinear optics, and use of lasers in dentistry. Recently worked with an R&D company to develop a proof-of-concept noninvasive glucose measurement device.
Also a: Road cyclist, swing dancer, chef.
MSc, Physics (Technical Physics and Photonics).
Jure Lajlar - Senior full stack software developer and manager, specialized in iOS app development. Spent the last N+ years working on various award winning iOS apps. Vast experience in light algorithms (flash, color temperature, colorimetry) and calibration techniques, used in consumer products.
Also a: Photographer, road and cyclocross cyclist, drummer.
Never really found the time to finish his computer science degree.

It's not just us. This project and product wouldn't be possible without the many many other people who have been working with us as an engineers, designers, advisors, testers: Uros Acman, Jure Ahtik, Mimi Antolovic, Martin Baebler, Tadej Beravs, Kristjan Crnoja, Marusa Dobrovoljc, Emperatrizz, Domen Fras, Kristina Gorenc, Elvis Halilovic, Tomaz Hrastar, Spela Hvala, Manca Juvan, Silvo Katalenic, Dino Katalenic, Anja Kandus, Gasper Kojek, Jurij Korenjak, Lenart Kucic, Anze Lemovec, Hana Majdic, Karlo Medjugorac, Matej Meglic, Mitja Miklavcic, Vesna Mirtelj, Dragan Z. Mocan, Ana Pavlisic, Luka Pecavar, Nevenka Peclin, Rok Pregelj, Peter Prevec, Bostjan Pucelj, Janze Racecic, Darko Sintic, Rok Seifert, Ines Sercelj, Dorotea Skrabo, Bostjan Spetic, Domen Stare, Andraz Tori, Primoz Zelensek, Marjeta Zornada and Little panda, Pirate 1 and Pirate 2, Superwoman, Catboy, Gekko, Police officer,... and everyone else, who has our back.
Now, you are part of LIT too!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
TLDR: ***We are confident. There can always be unexpected challenges when building products and things occasionally happen. The team at LIT has dealt with them in the past and is well-equipped to navigate them if they arise. Should any problems arise that might affect the delivery date, we will communicate quickly and be transparent with you.***

- Technology -
For truly innovative products, there is always the question of A: “Is this technically really possible?” and B: “Can this particular team do it?”

A: YES, IT IS TECHNICALLY POSSIBLE!
We decided the best way to address risk A for you but also for ourselves was to put in a lot of work before we ask for your support. Stacked on top of more than 6 months of intensive research is a multitude of experiences from some of the brightest technology minds in electrical and optical design. We made sure that despite our team’s extensive experience in the field of both consumer electronics and optical devices, we left no assumption unchallenged and no alternative unaddressed. By doing that we already overcame some of the major technological hurdles on our roadmap and found optimizations we didn’t foresee at the very conception of LIT Flash. Our investment in in-depth research and testing is paying off. While there is still plenty of work to be done (see roadmap section), that work has a very high level of predictability. 

B: YES, WE HAVE WHAT IT TAKES!
To address the risk B, we made sure our product team has a track record of successfully shipped and loved KS projects (Lumu light meter 2013, Lumu Power light and color meter 2015). We are committed to under-promising and over-delivering to each-other and to everyone around us. Our R&D and manufacturign partners have already experienced that. And we can’t wait to prove ourselves to you as well. 
 
- USER CENTRIC SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT -
Alan Kay once said: “People who are really serious about software should make their own hardware.” 
And we absolutely agree. The essence of a great hardware product is the software that makes it absolutely amazing. We are firm believers in user-centric design and that inevitably means that we are spending numerous hours grooming the software code for the end user’s pleasure. In order to be able to do that, though we first focused on achieving the most important milestones: correct sync and triggering of our flash from the mobile device. Now that we have mostly mitigated that risk, what remains is far more manageable in scope as well as in time.
 
- MANUFACTURED IN EUROPE -
Our experiences with past hardware projects have thought us a valuable lesson. That is to appreciate design for mass manufacturing at scale from day one. When you’re developing your innovation it is always tempting to take shortcuts to achieve milestones on hacked-together proofs of concept as soon as humanly possible, but there is a real hidden cost in that when you take your prototype to production. 
Manufacturing at scale has its challenges and to mitigate that risk, we decided to design for commercial scale in partnership with potential future manufacturers. We have lined up our supply chain partners from a selection of trusted industry suppliers and because we know how vulnerable the product is in its early manufacturing runs, we decided to keep initial production and assembly in Europe.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: How lucky we are to have someone that makes saying goodbye so hard: you.
updates.update_content:
Dear lit people, 
Thank you for believing in us. We truly appreciate all of your heartfelt support, comments, and suggestions.
Creative confidence means having a breakthrough idea plus the courage to act on it. That’s how LIT Flash was born: to change the way people take photographs with their smartphones. To spark the sudden illumination of creative genius.

Dear lit people, we made it. You made it. Thank you.
We reached our funding goal in two days! This means so much - it means you accepted us, our vision and gave us a bright light to follow - to create a Flash for the mobile future, something that should have been done a long time ago.
There are two kinds of people in this world. Those who can imagine a world yet unimaginable and everyone else. We are good at imagining and making new things, but could never do it without your help. That’s why it takes all of us together to make LIT Flash a reality.

comments.content: how's the relaunch coming?! :D :D
Say it isn’t so!! Hoping to see you back in the near future. You have an innovative product!!!
I will definitely back you guys again once you have all the eggs in one basket (so to speak)
Mmm, so new campaign with higher project goal?
Thank you for your honesty and your commitment to communication. It will increase my confidence in any future campaigns you might offer.
Does the app shoot raw? Will it be saved to a specific folder in the camera roll for easy importing into Lightroom mobile?
It’s nice to hear about the battery swap option. Thanks Marko!
Andrew
My 2 cents...
Great to hear! :)
Thanks for the input, much appreciated!

I love 18650 cells and have a ton of them already, but I understand if a single cell isn’t high enough voltage or whatever. A LiPo would be fine if it’s standard enough that I’ll be able to find the right one in 10 or 15 years when it needs the second or third replacement. I guess my biggest question is what it’ll take to get the thing open when that time comes. A screwdriver? A heat gun to melt the glue holding the end caps on? A saw blade on a Dremel tool, and then enough creativity to replace the destroyed case with something new? A little more info would be very helpful.. Thanks!

That makes sense. I was part of another project that shipped from New Zealand and had their proven 18650s delivered separately all over the world. I’ll try to get them to contact you and help smooth the path..
Thanks for the thoughtful answer. At my level, there's always some luck involved anyway, and, as you say, there are plenty of other ways to use the LIT. Thanks!

As for stretch goal, including a phone clip with every order would be fantastic. That’s my number one - but I know it can be tough as there’s tons of sizes and cases etc. My KS Pivo that I just got had the smart idea of a squeezable padded holder so any of mine or my coworker’s phones can be used in a flash.
Also, stretch goals?
Wow!!! Why don't you advertise that more???
Hi! Great idea! How did you produce the picture in the forest at night? It looks like more then one LIT.... Can you use more then one LIT at the same time?
when shooting portrait, is there any distance between LIT and the subject's face, to be consider safe (for the eyes)?
Can the battery be charged from the powerbank, while in operation?

The “housing assembly render” pic clearly shows a replaceable 18650 battery holder with a coin-slot screw cap, but I’m not seeing that cap for the battery compartment in any of your other pics. How difficult will it be to replace the battery on this thing when the time comes? No rechargeable battery lasts forever..

campaign.story:
inform8r– The Business-First App that Bridges the Gap Between One-to-One Communication and Social Media
Meet inform8r, a brand new, business-first app that will revolutionize the way your public receives messages from you. The first business-first messaging app is perfect for any business or group leader, from small-scale or colossal, to reach their public in an entirely new, cleaner, less-cluttered way. 
inform8r allows you to set up closed groups of any size to send out messages without using social media, without giving up your personal information or requesting personal info from recipients. 
Simple, clean messaging that doesn’t rob you of your time or your personal information.
Inform8r can help any business or group manager, like…
a small business that wants to inform your customers of a sale
a teacher sending a note to your students (and you don’t want to use social media and aren’t sure if they’ll actually check their email)
an event organizer keeping your audience up to date
a coach letting his team know about training
a business owner or manager letting staff know about a meeting
a fitness or yoga instructor letting their students know about the next class
a musician telling fans about a forthcoming gig
a food truck announcing 50% off chili dogs from 4-6pm that day
or, on a bigger scale, a local shopping mall announcing a holiday sale to thousands of customers, or a software company taking preorders for a new video game
Why is inform8r the ideal messaging app for businesses?
minimum data needed to create an account (inform8r doesn’t need your personal data)
extremely easy to use with multilingual support (10 languages and counting)
respect for the anonymity of members
discretion among members guaranteed
extremely easy to subscribe and share using QR codes  
no fiddly confirmations whatsoever to subscribe to a group
100% assurance that everyone receives the messages sent out
message scheduling supported 
time-sensitive messaging logic (members only see what is relevant to them RIGHT NOW)
self-cleaning groups, which means no archiving
only active/relevant data is shown to your members (if a message was relevant only until yesterday, we don’t show it today)
no replies to the whole group, only to the sender, which means no clutter
get instant feedback from your members
your group member’s count shows your REAL members only
GDPR compliant
no personal data stored

The Problem for Businesses Messaging
Social media scrambles for users’ attention and is dizzying in the amount of info and ads and notices it throws at us. Messages get lost. Email can be good, but most of us get so many emails, that we race through them, and often lose track of the important—or we don’t check our email in time. With inform8r, there’s finally a messaging app that complies with GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation), because it never asks for personal information. This means that you, and your audience, can feel entirely comfortable using it.
The Business Messaging Solution
You need to inform your audience. You want to be sure they’ll see the message and give it their full attention. Social media isn’t the answer, nor are emails. inform8r is the better way forward.

The Problem for Users
 We spend an average of anywhere from 2-9 hours a day on social media. That can mean over 100 days per year! While it can be fun, it can also feel like it's taking over our lives. And yet being a part of it can be necessary.
  What if there was a way to reach all the people who are important to you? This is crucial for any organizer of events, leaders of groups, business managers and many others--anyone who needs to reach a specific group of people. What if you could do this in a non-invasive way, sending and receiving only the information you absolutely need, without getting caught up in the web of social media? What if you could spend less time staring into your phone and more time embracing life, while still resting assured that you are connected to all the messages that are important to you? Now you can. The answer is inform8r. 
  The Users’ Solution
inform8r is an entirely new type of messaging app, one that is aimed at organizers, managers, and anyone who has to reach out to a specific group of people to provide them with information. This app never asks for or retains your personal information. It is a pure way to communicate with exactly the people you want to communicate with, with none of the clutter. Clean communication, clean messaging, that's what inform8r is all about.
    
A cleaner, more streamlined alternative to messaging apps like Viber, WhatsApp and Messenger
   With inform8r, there are no group replies and no comments. It is just a clean messaging system. It is more powerful and useful for organizers and managers than other apps, like Viber and WhatsApp. It is quick and easy to make groups of any size, with all members “BCCed,” for privacy and functionality. It is a one-way messaging system in which the manager can send out necessary messages in a clean manner.  This sounds cool, but ...
  How does it work? Find out here 
 The App lets you write and edit your message in a few simple steps, create and segment your audience according to your needs, sort your audience into groups for a more targeted distribution, create one message and distribute it repeatedly, get feedback on your message instantly…

   A group organizer invites members via their emails or MMS by scanning a QR code. The organizer can then send out messages to all group members. Only the organizer (and other group members he can allow to send out messages) can see who is in the group. This guarantees privacy.
   Group members receive these messages instantly but can only respond directly to the group organizer(like replying to an event). This eliminates the often annoying frequency of messages pinging into your phone when a group of thirty friends keep messaging and everyone in the group receives every message, even if the content is not intended for all. That’s the crucial difference between inform8r and existing messaging apps, which are perfectly good (like Viber, Whatsapp and Messenger) but different and not quite as good at what inform8r can do.
  A group organizer invites members via their emails or MMS by scanning a QR code. You can share a group’s QR code or group’s content to social media or simply make the group public, so it can be found inside the app.
 Features 
What makes inform8r unique?
 
A word from the inventor 
Hi, my name is Kristjan Marin, and I am the founder and inventor of inform8r. A few years ago, I realized that I was spending far too much time on social media. While I still enjoy using it, I felt like it was taking over my life and I was growing too reliant on it, looking at my phone more than I was living life. I wanted to come up with some sort of solution that would provide the benefits of being in touch with the people I need to be in touch with, but that felt less invasive into my engagement with the real world. That's when I came up with inform8r.
Man has invented languages and media channels to share thoughts and communicate ideas. The world today, however, is cluttered with messages and to find relevant information and be heard is not an easy task. No matter what you do for a living, whether you are an entrepreneur, an artist or a teacher, there is always some relevant audience out there with which you would like to communicate. If you need to say something to one person or are in the same physical location as your audience (at an office, for instance), then there is no problem. But if you are trying to reach hundreds or thousands of people who would like to hear from you, well, that is a completely different story.

Every significant discovery in human history has been made with a solution to a certain problem in mind. I have many interests and I've used many Social Media platforms — it’s always frustrating to have to browse through numerous selfies and food pictures when you would just like to see if your favorite brand has something new for you. If I’m a fan of a certain product or service, I want to be spoken to directly and without being forced to jump through hoops for them. And if I have something important to share with my clients, I wouldn’t like to send them messages one by one and waste time that could be spent improving solutions I’m working on with them. And that’s exactly what we are trying to achieve with the inform8r.
  Why we need your help 
It’s important to me that inform8r be free of charge. I didn’t design it to make money, but with a genuine desire to help free people from their smartphones, while letting them still feel connected with what’s important. I’ve invested my last four years in this project, with thousands of hours of time and energy, not to mention a whole lot of my own money. I’d like to keep inform8r free, but I need some help to do so. That’s why I’m turning to you, to ask for your support.

 Ways inform8r can be used 
Imagine that your children's field trip at school will result in pickup delayed by two hours. With a touch of a button, the teacher can let all the parents know and be 100% certain that the messages will be received. Imagine a business manager who needs to communicate with all the people in his department, quickly and with certainty. How about a soccer team’s coach who needs to cancel practice and wants to get the message out to all 25 team members? Or on a bigger scale, imagine a marketing department manager for a multinational company who wants to send a promotional message or coupon to several thousand interested clients, but wants to do so in a discreet way that will not get lost in the tidal wave of information that overwhelms us in social media apps? 

inform8r is perfect for sending out instant messages to groups that you are organizing. It’s great for
 small businesses who wish to inform their customers
  teachers who wish to inform parents of their students
  coaches who wish to inform their team members
  event organizers who wish to inform their audiences
  marketing directors or publicists who wish to inform the media or customers
business centers who wish to inform their clients or tenants
fitness instructors who wish to inform their participants
business owners and CEOS who wish to inform their staff
chefs who wish to place orders on produce and ingredients
food trucks which wish to inform fans of a 2-for-1 deal on hot dogs
and so much more! 
 inform8r can do all this and more, more cleanly, efficiently, privately and easily than existing messaging apps.
   Wait, this is so cool, why is it free? It’s important to the inventor, Kristjan, that inform8r is free to all. But in order to make it free and keep it free, we need a little help from you.
  See how all began in 2014 ...
Tech Specs 
inform8r is already available in a beta version on AppStore & Google Play and has been thoroughly tested for both Android and Apple smartphones. A desktop version, geared towards mass messaging for businesses and marketing, is a future goal. The app works beautifully, so we’re about 90% there, nearly ready for prime-time!
  We Need Your Help
We’re 90% there, but we need a little help to make inform8r a reality that…and this is the most important part…will be free for everyone. At the moment, we put so much time and personal finance into developing the app, that we would need to charge for it in order to climb out of the red and to get our credit cards out of hock.

   We need a bit of capital to get back into the black and that will allow us to make inform8r free for all. That’s why we’re asking for your help.
 
What Do You Get 
In exchange for backing a worthy project, you get to be the first in the world with this amazing app. You will also get additional benefits that will never be available after the Kickstarter campaign.
 
Planned timeline 
Case study
In order to test how inform8r works in practice, we prepared a case study in Maribor, the second-largest city in Slovenia (population around 100,000). Inform8r is at its best when a concentration of people and businesses put this new, free group messaging app to work. 
    The case study included a large percentage of Maribor’s population, including:
 FC Maribor (football club with 20,000 fans)
 BMW Selmar (with 10,000 customers)
 The Pohorje Region Tourist board, which welcomes more than 180,000 tourists per year
 Cultural centre Narodni dom Maribor (over 2220 events & 380.000 visitors per year)
Two major political groups have showen interest(with more then 30,000 members)
  In addition to this large constituency, other groups included:
 Gurmanski hram (a catering company which feeds students from 5 high schools, with minimum of 1500 meals per day)
 Jack & Joe Steak House (with hundreds of customers)
 INSA - A local real estate agency 
 TopPower STUDIO - a local fitness studio (with hundreds of members)
After using inform8r regularly for more than a month, the verdict was in: it is a better way forward, a cleaner way to send messages out and a preferable way of receiving them. The recipients focused more attention on each message, whether it was from the local football team announcing a rally or discount on tickets, or a yoga teacher letting her group know that the session would begin a half hour later that day), since it is not coming in the midst of a tidal wave of other things, as messages and ads do on social media).

The users were pleased that the app does not require or use any personal information, so there were no privacy concerns (which can be a big problem with social media). It’s ideal in this world of GDPR and when one’s goal is to spend less time looking at a screen, but to feel secure that you’re not missing anything important.

Inform8r really works and has already won over a city of over 100,000 people. It’s a cleaner, better way to send and receive messages, without personal information, and without social media. How can it change your world for the better?
Our team  
 
In Conclusion 
You want to receive only the information you want to receive. Sounds so obvious as to not be worth mentioning, right? Well, just about every means of communication, from social media to mailing lists, wants to harvest as much information about you, personal information, as they can. They want to sell this information so other people can reach you, people or companies you didn’t actually sign up to hear from, or to send you whatever they want to send you, most of which you don’t want to receive. Digital life can feel cluttered, clogging up your thoughts, bombarding your senses. inform8r lets you take back control.
  Get the information you want without giving away your personal data, and with zero risk of receiving data or ads or messages you didn’t sign up for. Clean communication, just the way you want it.

Thank you so much for your time, attention and support. As we say in Slovenia: Hvala (aka “Thank you!”)
More info : https://www.inform8r.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/inform8r
 
Sneak peak: inform8r PRO 
 We know what you’re thinking. inform8r sounds great, but I’ve got a portfolio with hundreds of clients, or multiple groups to manage (like several sports teams or a dozen classes at an elementary school) and doing it all on a phone sounds tricky. Not to worry, we’ve got plans to keep you covered. inform8r PRO will be the next step for power users who either plan to use inform8r for business, such as marketing promotions, or for larger-scale messaging, for example a football league manager who needs to contact referees and teams, or headmaster of a school, who needs to contact many classes.

inform8r PRO, available in a desktop version, will facilitate larger-scale messaging in many ways.
 manage multiple groups easily and smoothly -post a single message to multiple groups at once with our “write-once post-to-many” technology
spread out your working area on your desktop, to drag and drop and import data files with contacts easily
unlimited number of groups created (the phone version supports 5 at a time)
purchase internal app advertising targeting specific group types
use GPS location technology to advertise content within the app
equip your groups with “Beacon” technology for in-house or external use (special group only in PRO)
support multilingual messaging, so you write a message in one language and it will be sent to your group members in their preferred language 
  All this and more in inform8r PRO. Coming as part of a Kickstarter stretch goal.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We know you’re supposed to have a “risks and challenges” section to your Kickstarter page, but we’re comfortable stating that there basically are no risks, and few challenges. The app is 90% done, extensively tested in a beta version, and works beautifully. Heck, it even looks cool (at least, we think so). The biggest risk is that we know other companies will take one look at inform8r and start making their own copycat version of the app or introduce its functionality into their pre-existing apps. It happens, and we get it. A good idea is a good idea.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Go CC or BCC with Comments ...
updates.update_content: Inform8r allows for easy, safe, clean group communications via instant messaging, without giving up any of your personal information. This makes it an ideal way for school teachers and administrators to communicate with the parents of their students. Normally, inform8r allows a single person, we’ll call them the “manager,” to send out an instant message to a group, with all group members “BCCed,” so each recipient can reply only to the manager. It’s just like BCC emails, but the messages arrive instantly, like a text message on your phone, so you can be sure that everyone will receive them.

campaign.story:
Ever wondered why today's ergonomic armrests look like WW2 rifle stands?
We have. 
That's why we built Mouzen. An ergonomic armrest that combines the best of ergonomics with world-class engineering and beautiful design.
Mouzen is designed to optimize the position of your arm and reduce wrist and shoulder tension while working with your mouse and keyboard.  
PLAY

With its ErgoFlow™  mechanism, it allows you to move freely and comfortably in all directions, supporting your arm in a natural state and forcing you to maintain an upright posture.
Mouzen's features create a healthier, stress- and tension-free working and gaming environment. Come out of your workflow cool, calm and collected.
We spend most of our days working on computers. And while the technology has gone a long way since the early days, the mechanics of how we use the mouse and keyboard hasn’t changed that much. Only now are we learning how long-term usage and continuous repetitions can be associated with various computer-related disorders and injuries later in life.
Mouzen is on a mission to combine the best of ergonomic products that help you be more healthy and productive at work. More than 1000+ development hours and seven prototypes later, we’re finally ready to launch our revolutionary ergonomic armrest.
While most armrests require a 10-page manual to install and use, Mouzen is a simple and intuitive product that’s super easy to install. With an innovative single-mechanism lock clamp, Mouzen is ready to use in just 6 seconds. 
PLAY

It works great on almost all surfaces and is suitable for desks of thickness 0.2″ (0.5 cm) – 2.1″ (5.5 cm). Every Mouzen comes with a hex key that will allow you to lock it securely on your desk.
Thanks to the innovative ErgoFlow™ mechanism, Mouzen can hold up to 50 lbs (21 kg) of load, without losing any movement properties. The mechanism has multiple shock absorbers and silencers built in, making it the most smooth and silent ergonomic armrest on the market. 
PLAY


Big thanks to SoldierKnowsBest for taking the time and reviewing our Mouzen armrest in action!

We're on track!  
Mouzen was founded by Gasper Kumprej, a serial entrepreneur and innovator, who first-handedly experienced the problem of using a mouse all day long. Gasper started working with his father Roberth and engineering professor Jure Krof to find the best theoretic solution to the problem. Matej Lorenci joined the team as the materials and injection molding specialist, also providing production capacities with his company Plastika LVP.
We’ve come a long way since the first idea of the product. And we’ve made some great progress, working with some of the brightest people in this field.
Evolution of Mouzen
First wooden version
Benjamin Koren's final design
With a functional prototype, we want to bring Mouzen to mass production, being capable of producing many units, with the same level of quality. This requires important investment, to create molds, prepare assembly and secure materials which usually have large MOQ (Minimum Order Quantities).
But more than that, helping us get Kickstarter funding is sharing our vision and aligning with our mission. We want to raise awareness about computer-related injuries and how to effectively prevent them. The armrest is just the first chapter of a much bigger story in the making.
Thank you for your support!
Gasper and the team
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We're on a mission to eliminate the risk of computer-related injuries. Other than that, there's little risk involved with this project.

The Mouzen idea and product have been in the making for the last 3 years, with 100+ beta testers and numerous supporters from the local community. The team behind Mouzen has significant industry track record, ranging from ergonomics to in-house plastics production (Plastika LVP), and also includes complete production capabilities for all future Mouzen units.

As the company is being successfully bootstrapped by the founders from day one, most of the Kickstarter budget will go into a new industrial solution for plastic injection that will lower the production cost and allow us to produce more than one unit per hour.

Production time will be our biggest challenge, but our first backers will probably get them even before October, maybe even as early as August.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Dear supporters.
First of all, I need to apologise for not being too responsive on this platform. While I’m happy to jump around the workshop, try out new prototypes and make sure we keep on building and shipping the units… staying in touch online is really not my forte.
And looking at these comments, I realise it’s a crappy apology, because I totally understand your frustration. You were our first supporters and you should be given the most attention. I’m still so grateful to each and everyone of you for helping us make this happen.

Sorry that we have provoked impatience. We are selling product in Europe to gain funds, since Kickstarter funded half of our tools. The reson is that there were many backers and we had to change the way of production( we could produce smaller amount on a different way) and take all the risk to buy Injection molding tools for 4x amount of pledges and of course additional certification . But we don't want to give up since our product helps. There were many failed projects that did not deliver. But we have delivered over 430 /652 units, and I guess we have delivered all to patient people.

Hi guys, some of you are writing to us about our project being a scam and that we are not serious and so on even publicly. 
We are a Kickstarter project that estimated delivery by the end of October. But things did not go as planed and we are still shipping (USPO) they did not provide any tracking numbers. 
I am much grateful that you have supported us. I believe that you understand that this is Kickstarter. You were and are helping us build our company from the ground up and some mistakes with unpredicted events are a part of it. We are not a company like many are on Kickstarter with few successful projects, but are those companies what KICKSTSARTER is for?

Hi guys, shipping has started and alot of Armrests are already on the way!
And we are happy to announce that we had our product tested for prevention and ergonomic with Worldwide institute locaded in our country. I am posting report summary.
Great and healthy use to everyone! :)

The situation is currently like this: We have received all the tools needed to start our production, and it will be starting this Monday. Which means you can get your original Mouzen choice as early as late November.
