campaign.story:
Wow, we are in the final 24 hours of the campaign!
 ↓ Be a part of a successful Storyteller story. ↓
Choose Your Storyteller Fountain Pen
Storyteller Fountain Pen - Amsterdam
Storyteller fountain pen - Amsterdam
We strive to make sure that anyone can get their hands on a high-quality fountain pen at an affordable price.  
OUR STORYTELLER COLLECTION:
We started with our 3D printed Storyteller fountain pens and we made a big upgrade: 3D printed Storyteller fountain pen London is now live in a metal version.
 
    We present you Barcelona:
  A Mediterranean and cosmopolitan city with Roman remains, medieval quarters and the most beautiful examples of 20th century Modernism and avant-garde. 
PLAY

Storyteller Barcelona metal fountain pen - Elegant Metallic Chromium
Storyteller fountain pen - Barcelona
Storyteller Barcelona metal fountain pen - Elegant Metallic Chromium
Storyteller Barcelona metal fountain pen - Elegant Metallic Chromium
Storyteller Barcelona metal fountain pen - Phantom Black Lacquered
Storyteller Barcelona metal fountain pen - Phantom Black Lacquered
Storyteller Barcelona metal fountain pen - Royal Champagne Chromium
3 x Storyteller Barcelona metal fountain pens
Specifications: Weight with cap 46g Weight without cap 26g Lenght with cap 140mm Lenght without cap 121 mm
Bock Triple System + Nib Type 076 (Stainless Steel Nib; Fine, Medium, Broad)
PLAY

FREE SHIPPING WORLD WIDE + FREE 4 ink cartridges (made in EU) $45 is around €39 or £35.
 
   Martin Manias, founder of Storyteller™:
It's more than just a business.
It's more than just a fountain pen.
It's a mission.
A mission to make people fall in looove with handwriting again ...
   WHY IS HANDWRITING SO IMPORTANT?
   Albert Einstein once said, if all bees died, humanity would die in 4 years. But what would happen to you, if the art of handwriting died?
   Take a look at our short video to get a basic understanding of why handwriting is so important:
  PLAY

 
   According to a Forbes article, psychology expert and researcher Dr. J. P. says, “It appears possible that writing, which is a formalized form of thinking, helps people derive information from their experiences that help them guide their perceptions, actions, thoughts, and emotions in the present.”
   Perhaps this is why so many people handwrite in their journals and diaries, or write out their goals and aspirations.
   »... handwriting increases neural activity in certain sections of the brain…«
   
   According to a study performed at the Indiana University, the mere action of writing by hand unleashes creativity not easily accessed in any other way.
   And high-tech magnetic resonance imaging has indeed shown that low-tech writing by hand increases neural activity in certain sections of the brain ….
   "… handwriting activates a unique neural circuit …"
   
   “When we write, a unique neural circuit is automatically activated,” said Dr. Stanislas Dehaene, a cognitive psychologist at the Collège de France in Paris. “There is a core recognition of the gesture in the written word, a sort of recognition by mental simulation in your brain.
  A study led by Karin James, a psychologist at Indiana University, lent support to that view.
 
    Writing by hand — and even going beyond that — sketching, drawing, doodling, is a necessary mode of human connection.
   It's rare to see someone focus on their art for many, many hours in a row these days. Some people are addicted to their devices like "cyber zombies." I see them every day.
   It's like they're not real human beings anymore. More like robots, glued to their screens. Not present. And half-alive to life.
   OUR STORYTELLER STORY
   Our Storyteller story began with the development of our 3D printed fountain pens.
   
   The people at Shapeways must really love us since they gave us the opportunity to test out over 170 different print designs, play around with the thickness and colors of the pens and 6 months later we finally had our fully functioning prototypes (huraaaaaaaaaayyy), that completely wowed the whole Storyteller team.
   Because we were so pleased with what we created, we wanted to make sure we could create the same effect with an even more durable and unbreakable material.
   After some hard word and some sleepless nights we were able to develop what we believe is the next step in our journey - the brand new METAL Storyteller fountain pen.
   
   Start writing your story with our Storyteller fountain pens. It seems such a small change but it will have a big impact on your creativity and help you get more in touch with your thoughts & goals.
  LIMITED OFFER: Our 3D printed Storyteller fountain pens will be available exclusively during our Kickstarter and will not be available for sale after the end of our campaign. 
PLAY

 The city of blossoming tulips, artistic souls, and relaxed
  and tolerant people.

  Amsterdam is a symbol for traditional architecture, windmills,
  enticing river canals, and idyllic picturesque houses where
  you’ll find the most open-minded people in the world.

  The Amsterdam fountain pen has been carefully
  and accurately crafted for all lovers of superb architecture
  and design, and especially for modern, easy-going,
  and accepting people, who know how to capture
  a moment of pleasure, appreciate freedom, uniqueness,
  and enjoy modern or retro designs.
Specifications:
  Weight with cap 9g
  Weight without cap 7g
  Lenght with cap 135mm
  Lenght without cap 123 mm
Bock Triple System - Nib Type 076 Stainless Steel Nib: Fine, Medium, Broad

 ♥ THANK YOU FOR SUPPORTING THE STORYTELLER PROJECT ♥
  PLAY
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We know that there can always be some unexpected delays during production but we have planned for this and extended our production schedule accordingly.

Another common challenge is fulfilling a project that exceeds its project funding goal significantly. To solve this potential issue we are working with large manufacturers that can produce our fountain pens in any quantity realistically possible on Kickstarter. We do not anticipate any extension of the delivery date unless the project exceeds 1900 backers, at which point we would need to revise the manufacturing completion target date.

Shipping large volumes - If we will get highly overfunded, all fountain pens will be packaged and sent by a professional logistics warehouse, so we will be able to pack shipments quickly and without mistakes.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hello, we sent our Storyteller fountain pens to our European backers  yesterday and the pens for our backer from the USA, Canada, Japan and  everywhere else will be sent tomorrow. Thank you again for your support  and patience.
Martin Manias

Hello dear backers, good news - all fountain pens will be shipped from 5. to 11. of November.
Martin

I expect them to arrive on October 11th at customs. 
After the quality check, I will prepare everything necessary for shipping.
Finally :)  We are getting closer. 
Thank you for waiting so long.

updates.update_userinfo: The manufacturing of the sections is complete
updates.update_content:
Hi, the manufacturing of the sections is complete, I am now  waiting  for the manufacturer to give me more shipping information, will get back to you as soon as possible. 
Thanks, Martin

Hi, the production of our fountain pens sections part is in full production and will end in 6 days. The manufacturer will then ship the sections to me and as soon as the quality check is complete, your Storyteller fountain pens will be on their way :)
Martin

Hi, the manufacturer has informed me that the manufacturing of the  sections will begin on August 29th. I was waiting for the process to  start so that the info would be 100% confirmed, but I guess it's best  you know beforehand what's going on.
I'll send you another update as soon as manufacturing begins.
Thank you for your patience.

Fountain pens have been engraved, but we are still waiting for the manufacture (they have collective holidays).  I’ve sent them an email every day so hopefully they will be able to move me to the top of their list and finish our Storyteller pens as soon as possible.
Will let you know as soon as I have any new info.
Thank you again for being so patient.

The manufacture has admitted his mistake, I’ve sent them all specifications again and a working prototype of the section part. I am waiting for them to include me in their busy schedule. I will notify you as soon they start the production.
Thank you for understanding and for your patience.
Sincerely, Martin

updates.update_userinfo: Some bad news, Some good news
updates.update_content:
Hello dear backers,
while the caps of fountain pens were being engraved, I started to insert the Bock triple system with nibs into the FP sections and realised, that the manufacturer made a big mistake. They made the sections too thin so the triple systems does not fit in.
This is entirely their mistake, because I send them the samples of my Bock triple system and they sent me a perfectly working prototype. I contacted the manufacturer immediately, now I am waiting for their solution.I know that they are fully booked but I insist that they correct their mistake in make the manufacturing of our sections their priority. I have yet to receive an answer and will get back to you as soon as I have a definitive answer as to how long the delay will be.

updates.update_userinfo: We get our Storyteller pens tomorrow!
updates.update_content:
We get our Storyteller pens tomorrow!
But...
We're very sorry  to inform you that our engraver has canceled on us (due to a much  larger order than ours). This means we are actively searching for a new engraver. We expect to find him/her in the next 5 days or so which means all the Storyteller pens should be engraved in the next week.

campaign.story:
Why This Film Matters To Us
Dusty archives have been painstakingly tracked down and remastered to bring a new perspective to one of the most crucial periods in surfing’s evolution. This is a film compiled of never-before-seen footage from surfing’s Golden Age, with outtakes and extras from some of surfing’s most well known filmmakers to tell a history that has never been told before. 
“Spoons: A Santa Barbara Story” is an exploration of how one of the most significant corners of the world produced, and continues to produce, some of the most talented surfers and innovators. Deeper than all is a story of craftsmanship, work ethic, renegades and tradition, a film that goes beyond the time spent in the ocean to define how one spends a lifetime. 
At this stage, supplemental funding will allow for archival footage to be transferred and licensed. It will also allow for submissions and appearances for a proper film festival run, which will be crucial for getting Spoons in front of audiences and distributors. 
We are passionate about surfing and about stories of dedication, and we’ve pooled our money and resources to this point because we believe this film should exist for the next generation to build on. 


© Yater Collection
© Glen Clark
© Don Balch
© Don Balch
© Greg Huglin
© Greg Huglin
© Charlie Coffee
Simon Murdoch's Black Beauty - Image from the film
1965 Greenough Spoon - Limited Edition Print
Win this board for $40 - Brand New & Hand Shaped by Trimcraft
1964-5 Yater Spoon - Limited Edition Print
Sea Jive clothing raffle - win a full kit valued at $90
Who We Are
This film started as a solo project and grew to a large team of passionate surfers, friends,  supporters of the story and supporters of us as filmmakers. There are too many to list here, but we are the two keeping it together.  
Wyatt Daily - Director & Producer
Wyatt cut his teeth in surf documentaries by working alongside Chris Malloy on "The Fisherman's Son" (2015), and as Assistant Editor for Keith Malloy on his bodysurfing classic "Come Hell or High Water" (2011). With an observational approach defined by exploring the relationships between mentors, students, and innovators, he seeks to present the shared experiences of humanity. 
“I’m making Spoons because it's a vital story to surfing's history that hasn't been told from Santa Barbara's perspective. The younger generation should know their history but also how craft, heritage, and place are relevant to communities beyond surfing.” - Wyatt Daily
Justin Misch - Producer
While working alongside Producer/Director Takuji Masuda as Production Coordinator on the documentary “BUNKER77” (2016), Justin developed a keen ability to creatively navigate the fickle world of surf documentary production.  With his passion for environmentalism and storytelling, Justin’s short film “PICK UP TRASH” won the “Best Environmental Story” award at the 2017 Patagonia Film Festival.  
“I’m stoked to share this inspiring origin story with our surf community. To me, Spoons is a special opportunity to preserve the archives of some of the greatest original surf filmmakers, which might otherwise get lost in the ethos.” - Justin Misch 
Why $ 46,520?
This is the bare minimum we need to pay for the music and archival licensing. Here are the areas that we need to put money towards:
Music
We have three iconic songs that tell the story of the eras we traverse. These are the bulk of the music licensing. For the rest of our 22 pieces of music, we are working closely with Nashville based Hi-Low Sonics to record and score our unique soundtrack.
Image & 3rd Party Video Licensing
Much of the footage compiled has never been seen before, but some of it is from some of the most iconic names in surf filmmaking. 
Festival Submissions
In order to get the attention that Spoons: A Santa Barbara Story deserves, we will submit this film to film festivals all around the world.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
As with any creative project, fundraising is a key challenge. We waited for our Kickstarter campaign up until this point so that backers can see exactly how their support helps the film. We bootstrapped it this far, and are in the final steps of post-production. Our greatest risk lies in simply being unable to license the music and the footage that make the film shine. We would love your support to help us make this film the best possible version it can be and help us share it with the world!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Best Documentary Awards, Lobero Screening, and Online Release Update
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers,
We've got some incredible news! We have FINALLY gotten all our licenses wrapped up and are ready to start releasing the film to the wider world. This starts with our first ticked event, which will be at the historic Lobero Theater in Santa Barbara, California (details below).
Lobero Theater - Thursday Oct 24, 8pm - followed by SPECIAL GUEST PANEL -

Hey Everyone!
In case you missed our instagram announcement, all the raffles have been finished and the winners announced!  We've already been in contact with the winners, so unless you already have a board under your arm (or some fresh Sea Jive clothing), you can stop mind-surfing perfect waves with a board that already has an owner. Yes, that's a tough habit to break.

Hello Everyone,
Just wanted to touch base after the whirl-wind that was the kickstarter, and the ongoing hurricane that is our lead up to our Premier (Saturday feb 9 at SBIFF). We are pressing hard to get the film on screen, so we expect to do the raffles and begin fulfillment of our backer's rewards in by the end of February.
It’s incredible! We’re so blown away buy all the love and support. Thank you to all our backers, and everyone who believes in this project. We can’t wait to release it to the world!

Hello all! 
I can't believe we are already here. These pasts days have flown by! But we are incredibly close, and I'm so honored by all of your support. 
If you could find a moment to share this project ONE LAST TIME, with any friends or family who may not know about it - or just on Instagram or Facebook - it will be a big help.

And here's the call to action that's so hard to write: if you guys could find the time to share the project or tag 2-3 friends in one of our instagram posts, we'd be incredibly stoked. Every word out there helps! 
Remember, we've got some great Raffles going on! 
$40 - Trimcraft Surfboard Raffle ($775 value)
$20 - Clothing Raffle (Three chances to win!)
Thank you all so much for sticking with us, we are nearly at the finish! We have made it 62% of the way there, and the end is in sight.

Just announced! We'll be raffling off a new Trimcraft surfboard (raffle tickets $40) and a full clothing kit from our friends at Sea Jive apparel (raffle tickets $20). These are some of the best kickbacks we've got on offer, so take a look if you'd like to win some new duds or a brand spankin' new board! 
Thank you for already being a supporter. If you could please find time to share this project in this, our final week,  would greatly appreciate it!

campaign.story:
👉 $100,000 Stretch Goal Reached! Pigzbe Green Unlocked!
Pigzbe is a (very) smart device that teaches kids 6+ the value of money in a digital world. It's one of the first ever family products built using the blockchain.
We call it a piggy-wallet™. 
Today’s kids live in a fast changing financial world. Digital money, contactless payments, in-app purchases and cryptocurrency are all things they need help to understand.
It's hard to get to grips with money if you can’t touch the notes or feel the coins!
We wanted to find a way to make digital money physical, so children can touch, play and experiment with it. The same way we did with the coins in our piggy-banks. 
Pigzbe teaches kids about money in a language they understand. It is made up of four connected elements:
 1. Pigzbe Device 
Pigzbe is a friendly and interactive financial assistant that’s packed with personality. Take Pigzbe on adventures, play games and learn together as you grow up. 
2. Pigzbe App
The Pigzbe App connects the whole family to a child’s financial education. Parents can send allowances, set tasks & reward milestones. Kids learn through play.
3. Wollo, a family-friendly cryptocurrency 
Using Wollo kids learn how to save, budget and manage digital money. Every new Pigzbe comes with 200 Wollo inside, enough to start having fun right away!
4. Family Payment Card
Spend Wollo easily anywhere that takes Visa using our Family Payment Card. Or spend Wollo using a Wirex Visa card (both cards available in selected locations, additional fees apply). 
In the Parents App, Mum and Dad moderate. They can set allowances, create tasks to earn money, reward milestones, and invite others to join the family network. 
The Kids App is an interactive game. It allows children to feed their money tree, watch it grow, and learn new financial concepts as they play. 
Lots of parents struggle to talk to their children about finances, and worry about passing on bad habits. Pigzbe helps create a more positive family dynamic around money.  Kids learn: 
Wollo is our family-friendly cryptocurrency, designed specifically to send money globally, quickly and cost-effectively (it costs $0.000001 to send as little as $0.005).   
 Where do I get Wollo?  
Every Pigzbe device comes with 200 Wollo inside, enough for parents to get started setting tasks and giving rewards. You can buy more Wollo online like any other currency. 
How does Wollo work?
Wollo works like any other currency – it has an exchange rate and you can buy it with dollars, pounds or other cryptocurrencies. Like any other currency it can go up and down in price.
Fluctuation is an important financial concept to learn (the dollar does it, the pound does it) so introducing children to this idea with very small amounts of money, is a useful lesson.
How can I spend Wollo?
You can spend Wollo by exchanging it online for other digital or everyday currencies or using a Pigzbe Family Payment Card or Wirex Visa card (selected locations, fees apply). 
Pigzbe comes with all the necessary parts to start playing right out of the box: A. Pigzbe Piggy-Wallet, B. Pigzbe App (Parents App + Kids App), C. USBC Charging chord 
Lights! Sound! Touch! D. 128 LED lights, combined with a E. speaker, a F. vibration motor, and G. 2x buttons, to provide a tangible window into you digital money.  
We're a team of engineers, technologists, artists and storytellers from 15 countries. We've worked on incredible projects for companies like Apple, Google and NASA. We know what it means to deliver exceptional experiences to millions of people. 
Pigzbe is our next big adventure.  
We worked with the amazing team at Pentagram, the world's largest independent design consultancy, to build a truly unique product.  
Pigzbe runs on a Dual core XTENSA® 32-bit LX6 with AES/RSA/ECC/SHA hardware encryption. It has a 24 x 8 LED matrix display, 6-axis motion sensing and works with Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. 
Everything is ready to go. We just need your support. Pigzbe will be in stores in Q2 2019. Back us on Kickstarter and be among the first in the world to get one!   
We’re a team of Mums (and Moms) and Dads who have built some of the world’s best-loved educational toys, things like  Cubetto, the Kano, SAM, Hack-a-Ball, and Suzy Snooze. We know from experience how kids learn.
Collectively, we’ve produced and delivered robots, computers and connected devices across multiple Kickstarter campaigns since 2013. Meet the team here.
Some might say we’re Kickstarter veterans. 
There’s no secret about the challenges involved in delivering bits and atoms, but we know what we are doing. 
We give you our word and guarantee that every backer will receive a quality product made with skill, dedication and passion.
We're so sure about Pigzbe that we are offering a 100% Delivery Guarantee. If we fail to deliver the rewards for whatever reason, we will reimburse the full amount you pledged on Kickstarter. 
Thanks for reading!
🐽 Team Pigzbe x
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Collectively, we’ve produced and delivered robots, computers and connected devices across multiple Kickstarter campaigns since 2013. Some might say we’re Kickstarter veterans. 

Before that we worked on incredible projects for companies like Apple, Google, NASA and Kano, so we know well what it means to deliver exceptional products for millions of people.

There’s no secret about the challenges involved in delivering bits and atoms, but no project worth bringing to life is easy, and we prepared well in anticipation for this moment.

Our strong manufacturing relationships have been established for four years now, and we’ve already delivered on countless production runs for previous campaigns.

We give you our word and guarantee that every backer will be valued individually, and will receive a quality product made with skill, dedication and passion. This is our moment!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
We’re sad to announce that after almost 3 years of intense work, and an extremely challenging 2020, Pigzbe will be closing its doors.
Due to global economic conditions brought about by Covid-19, we were unable to secure the additional funding required from investors to develop a commercial model for Pigzbe, tackle the global regulatory challenges we faced as a crypto related business, and scale. We have therefore decided to put the project to bed.

Pigzters!
I hope you are staying safe. I wanted to bring you up to speed on what has happened the last 6 months, what we’ve learned, what our plans are, and of course, the impact of Covid-19 on our roadmap.
The last 6 months have been challenging and fulfilling in equal measures. We managed to ship 2 more products, bringing our total live-in-market to 3 (, and ), and gather lots of live data from real users.

Backers!
We’re back at our work stations in 2020 with some good news! We're pleased as pie to confirm that your Piggy Wallets have finally left the factory!

updates.update_userinfo: The new Pigzbe App is here!
updates.update_content:
Friends!  
As we wait for device delivery, we’re delighted to let you all know the new Pigzbe App has finally landed in the App store! It’s for both Android and iOS, and it’s free! We also have a more precise update on shipping dates.

Pigsters!
We’re going to keep it straight and to the point. We have an update to our delivery schedule. Watch the video and/or read the information below on the latest.

Pigzters!
We've been busy since we last spoke, and oh so close the P day! We’ve made great headway with the app and device, which we’ll be launching and shipping soon respectively, but we do have a mixed bag of news on our shipping schedule, which will affect all backers differently.

Hello, Pigsters! 
We're getting incredibly, excruciatingly, agonizingly close to P-Day, the day we ship the very first Pigzbe units to you. 
To get you as excited as we are, we wanted to share some updates on the Pigzbe device, our beautiful packaging and the lovely creative world we are building in the kids' app.

Hello Pigsters! 
It’s been a busy busy few weeks for the team, so we thought why not slow things down on a Friday afternoon and tell you some of the exciting stuff going on at Pigzbe HQ.
Pigzbe at The Europas!

campaign.story:
An insight into the mind and heart of someone with anorexia
Anorexia is not a phase, a diet, a trend, or a choice. It’s a disorder. It’s a disease. It’s not something you choose, it’s something you get. Something that can destroy you just as any other disease. It can kill you.
People with anorexia are dying literally every day. If you want to defeat anorexia, you have to understand it, just like all the other “demons”. How to better understand it than to listen to someone who has faced it?
The book is about my life. So who am I? My name is Špela Kranjec and I’ve decided to turn my worst experience into something good. I’m 26 years old and I’ve lived through experiences that can inspire and maybe even save lives.
Today, people see me as a strong and capable woman, who can take on any challenge. A woman who knows how to stand up for herself and lives a life the way she likes it. And that’s how I really am, to be completely honest. 
But anyone that knows me knows that in the past I was a fragile and defenseless little girl, who was suffering from anorexia for 9 years. This little girl is part of my personality, a part that I laid bare for the world to see. With all my experience, I learned how to control this part so that it never takes over again, but it will always stay within me. Just like the memory of all the years when it controlled me.
Anorexia and other eating disorders are mental illnesses that can have deadly consequences. People who have no experience in this area often have trouble recognizing the signs that indicate the potential development of an eating disorder, as well as understanding a person that suffers from a form of this disorder.
The key thing in overcoming eating disorders is knowledge and understanding. With my story, I hope to help you understand what is going on in the mind of someone with anorexia, their desires, their fears, and, of course, what helped me personally get back on my feet.
I wish I could give others the opportunity to walk the world as free as a bird. Without that voice inside that keeps telling them they aren’t beautiful or worth anything. I want to give them the opportunity to fall in love and share their heart with someone that will make their world even more beautiful. I want them to enjoy the company of their friends and not close themselves off, while shedding tears and torturing themselves hidden away from the world.
The more I succeed, the fewer families around the world going through hell behind closed doors. That’s why I must achieve this! Help me achieve this.
This book pulls you into the story and, hopefully, makes you feel what I felt. With this book, I shared my feelings, my thoughts and experiences. I also included comments from my family members and my best friend, who suffered just as I did, which gives the book a really special added value.
It is a simple book, written with strong emotions and the will to improve yourself – a book about a difficult experience. But a happy ending. An ending anyone can achieve. Happiness. With this book I tried to convince everyone that it is possible to beat an eating disorder. If I could do it – a simple, average girl, from a regular family, who became happy, full of life, and thirsty for new experiences, fun, and laughter – anyone can do it!
This book is meant for everybody searching for another chance – and WANTING another chance. Because I know that everybody deserves at least one more. And because I believe that you can learn plenty from a girl who battled anorexia for 9 years, I decided to write a book and try to help others to start living a better life.
I have a story that inspires and changes lives. A story intended for all who are battling an eating disorder and those who just want to understand how anorexia actually feels like.
As one of the readers said: “I know that someone in a similar situation, alone or with a family, would ‘devour’ your book, not just read it, if I can make a comical statement… And if there is a book that can help someone, it is definitely yours.”
First chapter of NOTICE ME: My 9-year struggle against anorexia
If you are a parent of a child who is battling an eating disorder, this book will help you. 
If you are battling an eating disorder yourself, and you know you want to get rid of it.
If you deny the problem, or if you don’t even know what your problem should be called.
If you are a friend of someone or know of someone who is battling an eating disorder. 
For doctors and others that are teaching about or treating eating disorders. 
Did I forget anyone? 
If you didn’t find yourself in the descriptions listed above – this book is also meant for you! Maybe you want to read it just in case, maybe you just want to learn more about eating disorders, or maybe you just enjoy reading.
My book was first published in Slovenia in 2016. I initially wrote this book to clear my head, share my experiences, and express my emotions. However, readers convinced me that I’ve written an amazing book that can help people understand anorexia, which is the first step towards a better future. And that’s why I’ll try to share it with as many as possible. Here is some of the feedback I received from my readers:
A project like this has a lot of different expenses, which I can’t afford at this time. Because I would really like to share my story with the world, I started to look for options that would help me finish my project. 
My brother convinced me to start a Kickstarter campaign, which will hopefully help me bring my book to as many homes as possible. I see Kickstarter as wonderful opportunity to test my idea and to see if I can build a community of people that share my vision. I believe that Kickstarter is a wonderful platform, with an amazing community of people, willing to help different project all over the world that are starting from a scratch. I believe that with your help everything is possible and that’s why I decided to give it a shot. ;)
The next step after publishing my book in Slovenia is to raise money on Kickstarter to translate the book into English and to share it with the world. But that’s not the end. 
Our friend who helped us record a video for our Kickstarter campaign suggested we make a short movie on this topic, and I think that this is a great idea! 
I’m also thinking of writing another book, in which I would described my life after anorexia. I love to write and there is so much more to be said. But let’s start by translating this book first! ;)
 talkhealth Partnership:  www.talkhealthpartnership.com 
It’s a real pleasure working with so many amazing people that are helping me on my journey. I could not manage to do it without you, so I would like to give a huge hug to all of you – you really are something special!
Project and marketing manager: Žiga Kranjec
Graphic design: Tadeja Skrt
Photography: Romina Hočevar, Polona Bartol
Translations: Črtomir Prešern
Video production: Andrej Gobina (AG Production)
Programmer: Tomaž Silič
Makeup artist: Kristina Etling
Others: my friend Nina Mandelj for helping with video production and motivation, Dijana Kene Zore, Žiga Berce and Niko Klanšek for providing advice, my family for financial and motivational support, and all others who helped in any way to make this project a reality.
Thank you!
Špela Kranjec - book author
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are a team of friends, with know-how from different fields. We are not professionals – we are mostly young, ambitious people, trying to do something good in the world. We are trying to foresee as many potential problems as possible, but we can’t predict everything, I guess, ;) My book is already written, so there is no risk that I would not manage to complete it. :)

But there are also some possible problems that can cause unforeseeable delays on this project. However, if we notice potential delays, we will inform you as soon as possible. We care a lot about our community, so we will try to keep you updated regularly.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Nov 12th: We've reached our second stretch goal. THANK YOU SO MUCH! Our next goal is even cooler: Check out this video to get a glimpse where we want to go. Psssst, It's a top secret location! 
Nov 8th: We've reached our first stretch goal. Wow! We now want to film in Berlin, one of the global crypto hotspots. Torsten is German, we have a German TV channel as partner and will talk to the most interesting people there. Our 2nd stretch goal: Help us make this shoot awesome ($3,300 AUD)
Nov 7th: Check out some of our videos here
Oct. 27th: We reached our goal!! You're awesome. Our first stretch goal ($6,200 AUD) is to visit and film inside a mining operation and discuss the issue of energy consumption, a point that crypto skeptics often bring up. Here is one way to look at it. 
= = =
Oct. 24th We're proud to announce that Screen Australia (the film commission) is supporting our documentary with a grant which will cover around 40% of the budget. 
= = =
Website    -    Twitter    -    Facebook    -    Insta
PROJECT
Bitcoin has been called one of the most disruptive technologies of our times, threatening banks by building an alternative and decentralized currency system. Moreover, its “blockchain” could provide a blueprint for a better Internet - challenging the dominating technology giants. Despite this potential, Bitcoin is undergoing severe price volatility and the community is facing a bitter internal ‘civil war’. Moreover, much of the media coverage is often misinformed or misleading and the general public is still confused about the technology and its larger implications. 
Can this technology, designed to operate independent of trust and within a decentralized network, really provide a robust alternative? Can it and the people behind it be trusted to secure elections, prevent financial meltdowns and keep our private information safe? Or are cryptocurrencies just as unfairly distributed, easily manipulated and dangerous as our current systems? Join award-winning filmmaker Torsten Hoffmann four years after his first Bitcoin documentary on his journey to find the answers to these important questions that may redefine the future of the Internet (web3.0). 
CONTEXT
With the proliferation of the Internet, the power of Governments and large tech corporations has reached unprecedented levels. In fact, in the past few years...
Our privacy has been jeopardized, 
Our social media weaponized,  
And our democracies compromised
... leaving some to wonder whether technology itself lies at the core of the problem. 
Now, the big brains (and big egos) who brought us Bitcoin claim that they are building a cyber utopia, where we can take back control of our privacy, run unhackable elections, and break free from the shackles of existing institutions. Can blockchains live up to this bold promise and ... or has the movement lost steam amidst scaling problems, consumer confusion, price crashes and internal debates within the community? 
And why does this all somehow sound familiar? 
Also: How come, these guys really don't like Bitcoin?
OUR FIRST FILM 
The production of “Bitcoin: The End Of Money As We Know It” started in January of 2014 in Miami, New York, London, Cambridge, Melbourne, and Toronto. We successfully raised A$17,362 via a small Kickstarter campaign in July 2014 and otherwise self-funded the project. We released the film in July 2015 (BTC @ $280) and it quickly became one of the most pirated documentaries of the year. @TheEndOfMoney went viral: 2,300 Facebook fans, 104,000 Tweet impressions, and 1,500 upvotes on Reddit. 
Torsten was even on Randi Zuckerberg’s show (and many other radio shows and crypto podcasts) to talk about the film. This generated approximately 500,000 downloads via BitTorrent, Vimeo On Demand, Amazon Prime, and iTunes. Our fans created more than 20 ‘unauthorized’ subtitle versions. Our IMDb rating has been consistently at 7.1 with 750 votes and 81 critics - not bad for an independent first-time filmmaker! In 2015 and 2016 we also won four awards at international film festivals. We supported public screenings in 12 countries at meetups, educational events at startup hubs, incubators, technology conferences, accountant associations, university lectures, etc. 
GLOBAL REACH
We are most proud about our reach via traditional media because we promised to make a film for everybody. These are some of the broadcasters, TV channels and media platforms that have licensed the documentary. 
On these platforms we have reached audiences in developing countries like Kenya, Lebanon, and the Philippines as well as in crypto-hotspots like South Korea, Sweden, or China, ... 40 countries in total. Here's the alphabetical list:
And that’s not all. We also went airborne: These Asian and Middle Eastern airlines showed @TheEndOfMoney in their in-flight entertainment systems.
But here’s what should get you excited: Our first film was released more than 3 years ago. Since then, the price of Bitcoin has increased by a factor of 30. And the interest in the topic as well as the size of our audience has grown by a factor of 10 - at least. Imagine if we could reach 10 times more people than 3 years ago. Let’s go mainstream, baby! 
PRODUCTION PLAN AND TIMING
First, let us be clear: Our new documentary CRYPTOPIA will be very different from "Bitcoin: The End of Money As We Know It" where we focused on the history of money, economics, central banking and Bitcoin. This time, we work with a higher production budget, better creative ideas and with a much bigger scope. We'll get to know the experts in depth, cover actual applications of the blockchain and discuss the decentralization of the Internet. Luckily, we’re already in the finishing stages of production after filming on three continents and have sources of funding. Please do help us bring the project over the line at the best possible quality level!
Depending on budgets, we're still planning shoots in Germany, Switzerland, China and Australia (and will let you know once we have confirmed). Here are some behind-the-scenes impressions from our productions in March, April, and August. 
OUR EXPERTS
Many of the leading figures of the crypto community know us from 2014 and have been generous with their time again. The most influential speakers, developers and experts of the industry are part of our film. The most controversial companies and spokespersons have agreed to interviews and the list is growing still. We also spent a lot of time with the journalist & podcaster-extraordinaire Laura Shin who is helping us and our audience to make sense of this fascinating technology and the people behind it. Oh, did we mention that we even interviewed one of the fathers of the Internet (TCP/IP) who shared his words of wisdom on camera with us?

Check out some of our favorite quotes from more than 20 interviews: 
Of course, we have a great archive of "historical" interviews from 2014 incl. 
Vitalik Buterin, Andreas M. Antonopoulos, Michael Terpin, Jeffrey Tucker, Trace Mayer, Roger Ver, Joseph Vaughn Perling, Diego Gutierrez, Paul Vigna, Michael Casey, Bruce Fenton, Bernard von NotHaus, Nicolas Cary, Naomi Brockwell, David A. Johnston, Matt Miller, Max Wright, Elizabeth Ploshay, Ryan Zhou, Stephan Livera, Ben Dyson, Nicholas Gruen, Mark Bainbridge, Domenic Carosa, Nikki Scevac, Sam Lee, Juan Llanos, James Canning, Eric Benz, Dr. Monica Barrat, Rui Rodrigues, Eric Spano, and many more. 
In the past few months we have interviewed: Laura Shin, Andreas Antonopolous, Samson Mow, Charlie Lee, Roger Ver, Vinny Lingham, Preethi Kasireddy, cryptograffiti, Wences Casares, Da Hongfei, Jimmy Nguyen, Dr. Robert Kahn, Lucas Cullen, Jamie Skella, Marc Weber, Jerry Chan, and many more. 
OUR TEAM
Torsten Hoffmann (German). In many ways, Torsten has been working on this story for 9 years: In 2010, during his MBA studies at Oxford University (ChristChurch College) with a specialization on Finance and Entrepreneurship, he published a paper about alternative (paper) currencies (download). Unfortunately he missed Bitcoin then and only discovered it in 2013. He wrote, produced, and co-directed "Bitcoin: The End Of Money As We Know It", his debut film, in 2014/2015. Torsten is a technology geek, has founded several media start-ups and is a consultant, advisor and board-member of several technology companies. His additional producer and executive producer credits include Ancient Angkor (Discovery Canada), Denali4k (NHK Japan), Kalahari Meerkats (Germany), Baboon Diaries (CCTV China), Khumbu Valley (Korea Telecom) and several Virtual Reality projects. Torsten is active on LinkedIn and Twitter. 
Michael Watchulonis (American). 18 year veteran of the factual television and entertainment industry as an award-winning writer, director and producer with two national Emmy nominations. From the jungles of Papua New Guinea to nuclear submarines, Michael’s storytelling experience crosses a broad range of subjects and his documentaries have been featured on TBS, History Channel, CNN, National Geographic, ... in more than 50 countries. As a co-director on this project, Michael directs field shoots and supervises all post-production aspects of CRYPTOPIA. Michael and Torsten have worked on several other documentaries since 2012 including @TheEndOfMoney.
Brinda D. Paul (Australian). Executive Producer, Production Manager and Researcher for the documentary. She has a Masters in Law (Cardiff University) and her interest is in the legal and regulatory aspects of cryptoassets. Brinda has been working in the distribution of factual content for past 6 years representing many award-winning filmmakers, globally. Her media clients include Netflix, Deutsche Telekom, Hulu, DirecTV, SONY, NBC Universal and many more. She attends film festivals and TV and digital content markets regularly. As Executive Producer her role is to secure funding grants and to negotiate with co-producers. Brinda also really likes bears!
Ilsa Harun (Malaysian). With a background in content creation and a masters in marketing communications (University of Melbourne), Ilsa is our expert in all things media. She is responsible for all publicity and community related work in the film-making process, runs our Facebook, Twitter as well as most of our other social media accounts. Ilsa manages our outreach campaigns and you can get her attention by using the hashtag #CryptopiaFilm. 
WHAT WE WILL DO WITH THE KICKSTARTER MONEY
We have already produced most of the documentary with our own capital and some other funding sources. Now, we are raising $22,400 (AUD) = 16,000 USD = 14,000 EUR = 2.4 BTC here on Kickstarter in order to finish the film to the highest standards. On Kickstarter it’s all or nothing, so please do support us (tips are appreciated, too!).  
Educational materials 
We have an opportunity to tie parts of our film into the school curriculum in Australia and get teachers and librarians to access our film in schools and universities. Pretty cool, huh? Creating the necessary ‘study guides’ and DVDs cost about $4,500 (AUD).  
Animation and Graphics 
Many of our experts explain technical concepts like blockchains, hard forks, and cryptography very well but let’s be honest: We need animators to make it come to life on the screen. We want to spend at least $9,600 (AUD) on this. The more money we can raise, the better we can finally explain blockchain to mainstream audiences. 
Drones 
Yes, you heard right. We already have stunning footage from helicopters and drones to show the beautiful cities we visited (see below). We still need more of these cinematic sequences which will cost about $3,350 AUD.
See a sample of our aerial footage and some great EDM. 
PLAY

Music and Design 
Art isn't free. Artists need to be paid for their work! We plan to spend around $4,950 AUD on graphic designers, composers, musicians, graffiti artists which will make our documentary look and sound 21 million times slicker. We'll tell you more about our collaborators later. 
PLEASE FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIA
                Website    -    Twitter    -    Facebook    -    Insta
REWARDS
The rewards are calculated based on Australian dollars - that's where we are based, so the exchange rate may result in odd numbers for you. Oh! We accept crypto, too (check out website above) and we always appreciate a tip. 
"Zero-Knowledge Proof" Reward
So you just want to give us a tip and stay under the radar? This reward is for you. High Fives, mate! 
"HODL Hollywood" Reward 
Alright, alright, alright! Your name is immutably associated with our film. You will get a ‘Thank You Credit' in CRYPTOPIA. Oh, you think that no one cares about the end credits!? Watch this and reconsider :-)
"Smart Contract" Reward 
Ok, smarty pants: This one is a good deal. You will get access to our 1st award-winning documentary ‘Bitcoin: The End Of Money As We Know It’ and also a 'Thank You' credit in CRYPTOPIA. 
"Medium of (Movie) Exchange" Reward 
Get both of our films. @TheEndofMoney and CRYPTOPIA. And we will credit you with a 'Special Thank You'. We’ll also give you a shout-out on social media. 
"Full Block Reward" Reward
Yup, the Bitcoin block reward used to be 50 BTC in the good old days. Our block reward: You get both of our films. @TheEndofMoney and CRYPTOPIA. And we will credit you with a 'Special Thank You'. Also, we will ship cryptograffiti’s sticker ‘CRYPTOCURRENCY IS NOT A CRIME’ to you. 
“Store of Value” Reward (Almost gone, act quick!)
Get both films and the script. Get credited as 'Blockchain Evangelist' in the new film. We will send you three stickers each and a signed 20 Billion dollar note from Zimbabwe. This is not only the fastest way to become a billionaire but also a stern reminder of the power of hyperinflation. These bills are not legal tender (obviously) but are a nice souvenir and conversation starter.
PROOF OF WORK MINER Reward (limited to 15)
Get both films and the script. Get credited as 'Blockchain Evangelist' in the new film. Three stickers 'CRYPTOCURRENCY IS NOT A CRIME' and a signed 1 billion and a signed 10 billion (the one with the miner) note from Zimbabwe. This is not only the fastest way to become a multi-billionaire but also a stern reminder of the power of hyperinflation. These are not legal tender (obviously) but are a nice souvenir and conversation starter.
"Down The Rabbit Hole" Reward 
Same as the "Store of Value" reward plus a signed poster or other artwork from our film and a signed script of the film. We will also send you a 20 Billion note and a 200 Million note from Zimbabwe. This is not only the fastest way to become a billionaire but also a stern reminder of the power of hyperinflation. These bills are not legal tender (obviously) but are a nice souvenir and conversation starter.
The Anonymous Hacker" Reward
No need for our physical goodies? Don't really want to give your shipping address? We understand. No problem. Here are all the rewards that are digital-only. Both films. Script. Artwork. And, only if you want, a on screen credit "Blockchain Evangelist"
"Hash Function"
Become a community organizer and blockchain evangelist. Host an event and screen CRYPTOPIA - you can sell tickets and beer and invest your profits from the night into crypto, Mr. Movie Tycoon! Also, we’ll use Skype for a live Q&A w/filmmaker. We'll send you a signed script, poster and 5 of the cool cryptograffiti stickers plus a banknote of 500 Million from Zimbabwe. This is a stern reminder of the power of hyperinflation and the folly idea to let Governments manage money supply. These bills are not legal tender (obviously) but are a nice souvenir and conversation starter.
"Satoshi's Sidekick" 
Become an official Associate Producer for CRYPTOPIA on imdb. This is your start to your Entertainment career. You'll get a 1-on-1 Skype session with filmmaker, a signed script of the film, three stickers and a signed book by Andreas Antonopolous (limited to 3). Finally, how about a 10 trillion bank note from Zimbabwe. Yeah, hyperinflation kills fiat money fast, we just added a couple of zeros. This is not only the fastest way to become a trillionaire but also a stern reminder of the power of hyperinflation. These bills are not legal tender (obviously) but are a nice souvenir and conversation starter.
"I-MAX blocksize" 
Become a corporate sponsor. Your logo in the film. Special screenings/premiers or DVDs for your staff or clients, maybe? Get in touch to talk about the details and we'll put something custom-made together for your business.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
If we don’t reach our Kickstarter goal, we will still finish the film. As mentioned, we already have produced most of the material and have access to other funding sources. So in that sense there is no risk of not delivering the film. 

However, to finish the documentary at the best possible quality level we would like to spend your contributions on the items explained above. 

There is a risk of not releasing the film on schedule. I am sure you understand that sometimes the creative process takes longer than expected. Also, film festivals like to get 'premiere' rights (we managed to get our first film into several festivals) and this may slow down our publishing timeline.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear #CryptopiaFilm Backers, 
We have exciting news to share. In the past few months, we've been busy winning awards at film festivals and creating buzz on social media. And Bitcoin is back over $10k. We're finally launching #CryptopiaFilm on Amazon on Thursday! Thank you for all your help along the journey. 
According to Amazon's terms and conditions, I am not allowed to request ratings and reviews but maybe you can help spread the word on Thursday :)

updates.update_userinfo: #CryptopiaFilm is now available as pay-per-view and we need your help
updates.update_content:
Feedback from our cinema premieres has been great: "Ambitious and thought-provoking" "An unbiased journey through the entire ecosystem" "Entertaining entry point into this technology and the movement behind it" ...

...but the Corona Virus has stopped our world tour. That's why we are releasing our film online today! The film is now available pay-per-view on our website: www.CryptopiaFilm.com. 
Independent film making (and marketing) is tough. That's why we need your help: Can you please , retweet us , follow us and share us , and perhaps most importantly: .

updates.update_userinfo: Your Link, Big Online Launch Soon, Academy Awards Shortlist
updates.update_content:
Dear Supporters, 
#CrytopiaFilm has had a few big premieres in 5 countries but as you can imagine the cinema tour came to an abrupt halt due to the Corona Virus. I have been 'stuck' in Germany and am preparing for our big online release on May 7th. 
Today, the personal screening links will be sent from our press@cryptopiafilm.com email account to all reward levels that included it*. The entire team is thrilled to finally share our work with you. It's been an intense 2-year journey! I will be in touch with links and bonus materials next week and hope you can then. Any ideas are welcome.

Dear Supporters, 
This is our movie poster:

Dear Supporters, 
We're a little behind schedule and a lot over budget but very excited to announce that production has finished! Post production is largely done, too. The theatrical version of #CryptopiaFilm will be around 100 minutes long. 
In case you're wondering what we've been up to here are a few awesome sneak previews.

Dear Supporters, 
Here's what's new with #CryptopiaFilm:
- No, we have no affiliation with the trading platform Cryptopia from New Zealand.
- For those of you waiting for some physical rewards, we'll ship them out in the next few weeks.

updates.update_userinfo: Here are some production photos from Europe.
updates.update_content:
Dear Supporters, 
Happy 2019! We went on a hectic but very productive trip to Europe late last year to shoot many more sequences and interviews. Attached are some of our favorite behind-the-scenes images and screengrabs from Germany and the United Kingdom. But of course, there is so much more to come.

updates.update_userinfo: 2nd stretch goal: We're coming to Berlin!
updates.update_content: Just a quick one today. We have reached our 1st stretch goal (mining/energy) and some great news to share: One of the largest German TV channels is partnering with us and we will be shooting in Berlin, one of the global crypto hotspots. Our 2nd stretch goal: Help us make this shoot awesome ($3,300 AUD)!

updates.update_userinfo: An Experiment. More Videos. 6 More Days
updates.update_content:
Dear Supporters, 
We now have 167 backers and there are 6 more days to go. Please help us reach our stretch goal! 
Here is a little graphics and music test. We were aiming for a "Blade Runner" feel representing Tokyo :-) Let us know what you think.

campaign.story:
Imagine a camera with no lens, no focus, no mirror and definitely no batteries that can create images like this.
No need to imagine anymore, it is here. This will change the way you think about light, time and memories. We have created the ONDU pinhole camera series MK III to reignite your spark in photography, and most of all to enable you to create captivating images with light in the simplest way possible.  
Pinhole Photography Never looked so good!
The ONDU has truly become a tool for creative photography that is simple to use. With attention to details and quality craftsmanship at every step of the cameras creation process.   
STRETCH GOALS
By Sharing the campaign with your friends you can help us unlock these stretch goals bellow and bring even more features in to an already amazing camera! Share links are located just bellow the back this project button at the top of the page. 

The wait is over, the ONDU's are perfected! Now let's dive in and check out all the new features.   
All ONDU's except the RISE series come in two colors, bright Ash and dark Walnut wood.
One of the most important aspects in pinhole photography is the camera shutter. Here are some of the criteria that we thought it needed to fulfil:  
Needs to run smoothly, [ CHECK ] 
Makes shake free exposures possible [ CHECK ]
Short exposures are a must [ CHECK ]
Makes a clicking sound for fidgeting sake [ DOUBLE CHECK ] 
Makes filter use possible [ FINALLY ] 
There is a lot of exotic film floating around the globe as well as the need from some photographers to expose 135 film over the sprocket holes ( Yes Please ). For this, we had no choice but to integrate a red window shutter on the backplate of the 120 film cameras. It features the same shutter system as the actual camera shutter, which is lightproof. This makes it possible to use 135 film with the use of an adapter in our medium format cameras. We have also enlarged the red window so it's easier to see the frame number in direct sunlight. 
All those sprocket holes just waiting to be exposed!
The use of filters has never been so easy.
Many of you said you wanted to use filters. Well, we got you covered. With the use of hidden magnets this works like a charm. Filters are an important aspect in pinhole photography that enable us to get even more creative with our images. This includes ND filters, IR film and color filters for black and white photography.   
The actual filter is not supplied with the camera.
For the regular camera series we opted for the circular threaded filter type while with the RISE series it's only possible to use it with the COKIN A series type of filters. Both methods snap on to the camera body without any screws. Please note that the actual filters are not available via ONDU and must be purchased separately.
The most important parts of the camera are CNC machined.
In order to tick all the boxes of usability for this series, we needed to resort slightly more to CNC machining in this camera series. Although, the majority of the camera is still made out of wood. The parts where most wear and tear happen are made either of CNC milled aluminium or steel. We try to keep these components to a minimum, while ensuring the cameras basic visual characteristics and end user satisfaction are met in equal.   
The ONDU Rise Series is really something else.
All these improvements led us to think bigger and the ONDU Rise was created. It is only available in walnut wood that features multiple holes located in the center and film plane thirds. This enables us to compose images with the rule of thirds in mind without distorting the perspective in our image as was traditionally done. It is our most advanced camera so far, the flagship of the ONDU range.  
So many capabilities have never been seen in a pinhole camera until now. The possibility to choose between three holes, snap on filter capability as well as well as the option to use 135 film without modifications thanks to the red window shutter makes the ONDU Rise series the most versatile pinhole camera ever created!  
A camera like this needs a nice tripod, the future ONDU Statik ( more about the tripod below ).
A beautiful camera like this needs to be seen by the world!
Our previous cameras were beautiful but the MK 3 is something else. This is why we have decided to incorporate carrying loops and a strap so your ONDU doesn't spend most of it's time in a camera bag. Hang an ONDU from your shoulders and let the conversations start!   
Engraving lines are a must with composing pinhole shots.
If it ain't broke don't fix it. We kept our much loved engraving lines as well as the levelling bulb. Once you get a hang of it, it's pretty easy to frame an exposure with the ONDU, so we're keeping that as it is.   
Impeccable design, sturdy construction, high quality parts and attention to details like you have never seen before.   
There's an ONDU in our range suited for every type of photographer.
We have really put all of our woodworking and manufacturing skills in the new ONDU series. Years of refining and honing our craft have definitely brought us to the point where we can say that the ONDU is the best out there. The new range of ONDU's encompasses, including all color variations, a whooping 19 different cameras to choose from. The classical single hole cameras are available in bright (Ash) and dark (Walnut) while the advanced RISE is only available in Walnut( dark) wood.   
We couldn't decide bright or dark so we kept both. ( Bright colour not available in RISE series )
WHICH CAMERA IS RIGHT FOR ME? 
If you are a beginner we would actually recommend any camera that is not in the RISE range or the 4x5". All others depending on your preference of final image are suitable for beginners. 
The classic single pinhole ONDU's are available in 2 colors, when pledging you don't need to decide which colour you prefer yet. This will be done at the end of the campaign.  Films in the product images are just for scale and are not sold with the camera. 
To purchase this item with your camera, just add on 12$ to your pledge, we'll take care of the rest once the campaign is finished. ( Can not be purchased as a stand alone item )
The adapter kit consists of 2 pairs of adapters and a reusable take-up spool. Alternatively, if you have a 3D printer you can print your own via Thingiverse.
 At the moment the tripod is just in prototype stage and we have used it regularly on our pinhole adventures. We felt a wooden camera needs a wooden tripod so we made one. It works for us but still needs some refinement and in field testing before we can call it done. However if you have some skills in basic woodworking we will, once the final design is perfected, make available a 3D printer version for free.
We might consider bringing the ONDU STATIK into production if our backers express enough interest.
As seen in: 
Well, you helped bring ONDU to it's current shape and form. Way, way back in 2013 when we launched our first Kickstarter we were just finishing university and not really aware of the exciting things that await us. Little did we know that our passion for pinhole photography was met with equal enthusiasm with like minded people all over the world. The support was overwhelming and we did it, together. Followed by another campaign with our second version of the ONDU cameras. Now that a bunch of time has passed, the sun still rises in the east and thousands of rolls of films later we feel it's right to introduce our most advanced and versatile camera series to date. The ONDU Pinhole cameras series MK 3 was guided by the feedback of each pinhole photographer that managed to get their hands on one of our previous cameras. We listened, we improved and we made you a tool. A camera that will stand the test of time and deliver unmatched quality with every exposure.
Since we want our cameras to be of the best possible quality we make  every wooden part of the camera in our workshop. It's specialised for camera production and has many dedicated tools and setups made especially for the task at hand. We believe that craft making still has a place in today's world and that products made by hand bring an extra level of pride to their owners. We strive to make products that will hopefully last for many generations. There are many stages of production needed to create such a fine tool that is the ONDU MK III and we are really excited for the day that our machines and hands start shaping the finest quality wood into your future pinhole companion.  
Special thanks to all of those who made this campaign possible:  
Niko Klanšek | Business advisor  
Heather Corcoran |  Keeping our spirits high and campaign help
Matej Vranič | Video
DJ Borka | Again with the amazing soundtrack for the video
And most definitely once again to the whole pinhole community to name a few that have contributed images for the campaign: Lance Roth, Charles Strebor, Christopher Clements, Ken
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our third Kickstarter so far, the majority of our tools except some specialised ones are already set up. We will need to make some minor modifications to the layout of the workshop but that's generally it. We have successfully completed more than 6 thousand cameras in the past few years which means that we have become pretty up to date with making them in large quantities. 

Although there is always a possibility for delays due to unforeseen circumstances, for instance malfunction of certain machines, even with regular maintenance. We are confident that the ONDU MK III will be a good challenge and one that will guide our backers on a journey of bringing this product to life. There are a bit more people on the team who will take care of communications with the people that make our work possible, a common thing that gets overlooked in most campaigns, when things get busy.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: The time we've been waiting for!
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers, 
A week turned into a month once again. But we're finally ready to say that we've done it! Most of the cameras are complete and ready to ship. 
Please scroll bellow and have a look at the last stages of the production run.

Hi Pinholers and those that are about to become!
It's been another very very very busy month to put it mildly. But at the end of every pinhole there's light! And soon you'll be putting your cameras to their paces all over the world. 
We are at the very final stages of making the cameras. The bodies have been assembled, together with the backplates, all magnets inserted and the team is doing the final sanding stage by hand before we start oiling, which will probably happen this Thursday so tomorrow. The sanding is the single most time consuming part of the camera production but it has to be done well if we want a nice wood finish.

updates.update_userinfo: Another month passed and cameras nearing final stages of production.
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers, 
it's been almost a month and it's time we give you an update about your future cameras progress. To start we will have to say that we will not be delivering the cameras in May as was said in our estimated shipping times. However, by the look of things, it will be somewhere by the end of June. Even though we know many of you will be disappointed by this, there's nothing more we can do about it but continue to work as hard as we have been. For the past month we have been putting in steady 12 hour shifts as well as working over weekends and holidays. Some things are not foreseeable and it can be difficult to plan ahead.

Hi Pinholers! 
Time flies when you make cameras, in the last couple months the days were just too short for all the things going on in the workshop. We are making some steady progress, most machines are up and running and so far no major Murphy moments presented themselves. (knock on wood)
Let's start straight with the arrival of our CNC machine. It came in the middle of March and our friendly neighbour luckily came to assistance with his forklift and delivered it straight to our workshop door. Upon arrival the packaging looked completely sound but right after the delivery guy left we saw that there was a huge hole on top of the package. Right where the gantry and the Z axis is located. This was a bit stressful and until we managed to unpack we had no idea how big the damage was. Luckily, whatever it was that caused this hole, it did not damage the machine mechanics in any serious way except that it pinched a few cables that cool the spindle. Since then the machine is working fine and positioning accuracy is in our requested specs.

updates.update_userinfo: Starting to make sawdust, and cameras.
updates.update_content:
Hi Backers, 
We hope we haven't had you too worried! We're chugging along in the ONDU workshop and so far so good.

Dear Backers first of all happy new year! 
It's been a month since we wrote our last update and we would like to give you an update on how things are going at ONDU Hq. 
At this moment there are many things coming together at once and very soon we'll start making some cameras in full force.

Hi Backers and soon to be pinholers!
We're excited that the show is starting to roll. First we need to know which variations and add-ons you have pledged for, so we know how much of what we have to actually make. We have a general estimate but we need more info to make this smooth as possible. 
We have teamed up with the kind people over at CrowdOx to send you an extremely simple survey in order to collect the info we need to fulfill your rewards. You should expect to receive the invitation on or around 9:30am EST. The entire process should only take a couple minutes to complete.

updates.update_userinfo: Thank you backers! You helped to bring another ONDU Pinhole camera series to life!
updates.update_content:
The Kickstarter Campaign was a success! 
Thank you backers, pinholers, photographers, friends and believers! Without you, this wouldn't have been possible, you helped crowdfund a camera that we believe will bring many people back to the roots of photography.

Dear Pinhole superheros! 
We reached the first stretch goal!

comments.content: Hi Ondu team. Very pleased with my 6x12 multiformat. I have a suggestion you might like to consider for a future design. Another spirit level on the right hand side (looking from the back) would be really useful for levelling in portrait orientation. Thanks again for a great camera.

Thanks Scott. Very helpful. Think you missed the number of turns in the 6x12. You put “After that turns of the knob advances to the next frame. “ What is the number?
For 6x12 - 3 1/4 turns of the knob will ready the film for the first shot. After that 3 turns of the knob advances to the next frame.
I used a little piece of tape with a marker line to determine how far I'd turned the knob to advance the film. Hopefully, this helps & provides a starting point for using 35mm in the 120 cameras.
Oh and let's get the ball rolling on the Statik tripods!! ;-)

campaign.story:
Don't let the pain hold you back
80% of adults suffer from back pain sooner or later in life. In most cases, it’s recurring pain that is felt each and every day. Neck and shoulder problems are also very common, as approximately 50% of us suffer from neck and shoulder pain. Even more alarming is that even younger people are starting to show symptoms of back, neck and shoulder problems.
Poor flexibility and tight muscles are largely to blame for these types of pains and postural problems. Increasing mobility and releasing tight muscles through dynamic stretching can provide relief for common problems like knee pain, shin splints and tight hip flexors and glutes.  
The HighRoller team knows that living an active lifestyle and staying healthy is important to you. So, we’re here to help you avoid these problems from manifesting in the first place. HighTrainer allows you to enjoy life by relieving tension in the muscles and trigger points. You need your body ready for anything: whether it’s a long day at work, a long workout, or a long game playing your favorite sport. A few 5-minute sessions a week with HighTrainer is enough to keep you going and help you recover faster.
Santeri loved the physicality and competition that rugby brought into his life. His passion for the sport led him to achieving the highest honor in Finland when he was selected to represent his native country on the Finish National Rugby Team. Unfortunately, a sixth concussion ruined him from moving forward with his dream of competing internationally and benched Santeri’s rugby career for good in 2013. 
“It’s an awful feeling. … You have done it so many years and I felt like I was losing everything in my life,” Santeri recalled.
Although, Santeri’s rugby career was behind him, some of the body pain he struggled with was not. As Santeri remained active through power lifting, he found that his upper back was plagued with pain. Determined to not let another injury sideline an active passion, he decided to invent his own solution in the HighTrainer. 
Like rugby, victory didn’t come easy and he learned quickly that it would require a team to successfully accomplish his invention. Santeri’s experience as an owner/engineer in successfully launching products like the HighRoller and HighBaller were a great asset to him. From the HighBaller, which is designed to massage the neck and back, he learned how effective the balls could be in hitting muscle trigger points. He put holes through the balls in order to attach an exercise band that brought the HighTrainer to life.
Santeri’s first initiative was to develop the HighTrainer so the exercise band can be put around a chair so it could reach muscle trigger points in the back while sitting at a computer or driving a car. A lock system allows this to be possible as the function enables people to multi-task while loosening tight muscles and fascia. 
While the HighTrainer can serves a healer, it can also be used as a training tool as well. Resistance exercises and dynamic stretching for the arms, back, chest and legs are products of the HighTrainer’s multi-functional use. The portability of the HighTrainer allows it to easily fit inside a computer bag, backpack or training bag. 
If you are looking for a solution to upper back pain or an exercise tool that can save time and money, the HighTrainer is the answer you are looking for. 
How can you help?
Tooling and design work require a lot of resources for a young company like ours. With your help, we can produce HighTrainer quicker and more efficiently.
We are certain you are going to love HighTrainer and want to tell others about it.
In the Summer of 2018, we launched our second successful crowdfunding campaign with the third product of the HighRoller line: HighHealer. It's the world's first portable 5-in-1 foot care device which allows you to exercise areas of the foot, ankle and calf not only in less time, but more effectively. 
The HighHealer campaign was a big success and we raised over $125k.  The campaign ended in September 2018 and our manufacturer has just started to produce the units. We will be able to start shipping earlier than we promised in the campaign, thanks to the support of our many backers!
In July of 2017, we launched our first Kickstarter campaign with our second product HighBaller. It's the world's first rotating massage balls on width adjustable stand. HighBaller helps to loosen up stiff, tight muscles. The product is mainly used for trigger points and for that reason it includes Trigger Point Map. The map shows you 30 common trigger points and their referred pain areas. 
The HighBaller campaign was a big success and we raised over $100 000. It took us only 3 months after the campaign ended to ship units for the backers. For us, it is very important to keep our backers satisfied and to help people to live pain-free.
In 2015 we launched our first product called HighRoller. It is an innovative foam roller that spins around an axle on a height adjustable stand. The stand lets you foam roll in ergonomic and more effective positions by allowing you to relax while rolling and by focusing all the pressure on the muscle. 
HighRoller quickly gained popularity in Finland, receiving the award for best sports product of the year in 2015. 
HighRoller® Finland Ltd. was established in 2015 and is owned by six entrepreneurs who all come from a sports background. The company manufactures products for personal muscle care in Finland.  
Manufacturing plan
We have been working with our manufacturer for over 2 years now, Manufacturer has a long and successful track record of producing high-quality plastic products.  Together with the Manufacturer, we have produced the first prototype of Trainer and have already put together production plans for when we reach our target.  
More questions?
Please feel free to contact us: customerservice@highrollerofficial.com
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are excited to launch our 3rd successful crowdfunding campaign and to make your life more enjoyable! The last campaign HighHealer ended a month ago and we just got the first units from our Finnish manufacturer. This means that we will be able to deliver the products again in time. 

With our first campaign HighBaller, we started deliveries a month earlier than we we promised and this was possible by help of 1700 lovely backers. As a Finnish company, we love honesty and being in time and that's why we work extra hard to keep you backers happy.

We have tested several materials and techniques over time to create the product to suit the needs of our customers. We have also received feedback from several professionals and now we can confidently say that we have designed the best possible product for you.

With our network, we can ensure a worldwide delivery of our products. 
We anticipate being able to ship orders in Jan-Feb 2019 but if the number of orders exceeds our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill the orders.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: How does immobility and sitting affect our body?
updates.update_content:
Working in a seated position has increased massively and has a huge effect on our body.

Passive and static sitting accumulates metabolic waste in the body and eventually poisons it. While you're sitting muscles do static work to control the pedantic movements of the neck, head, eyes and hands. However It won’t strengthen muscles or help to increase our metabolism and movement of myofascial. Actually, it make them worse. Sitting squeezes liquids out of the tissues and glues them together.

This process make us stiff, sick and unwell. We need to give our tissues freedom to move. Remember to take care of your body and relieve your tight and dried tissues by moving them. That can be done by using HighBaller. Only one or two minutes of using HighBaller will improve your metabolism, release stiff tissues and relieve pain. This in turn will help your body feel better and allow you to work pain free.

We achieved over 160% of our goal! That’s amazing!

One of the most remarkable features of the HighTrainer is its ability to train anywhere and anytime.
To enhance that feature even more, our team of sport professionals has come up with an amazing new premium training program for HighTrainer that we would like to present as our first stretch goal. Once our stretch goal of $30,000 has been reached, we can offer this exclusive training program to you.
