campaign.story:
For more precise muscle tightness release
We all know that pain is a signal of something being wrong. That includes muscle pain and soreness and aching joints when we move. Unfortunately most of us react to that signal in the worse way possible. Instead of finding out what is wrong and fixing it, we wait and hope that it magically goes away. Well, it does not.
Your body should be functional and free of pain, free of limits.
What if we told you that the most common cause of these disabling aches and pains are stiff, tight muscles and myofascial dysfunctions and that there was an effective way to treat them at home by yourself? We invented HighBaller to do just that by:
opening tight muscles and adnate tissues
improving mobility and flexibility to allow correct joint and postural alignment
boosting metabolism in muscles and reducing edema
improving movement economy
preventing injuries and relieving pain
HighBaller is the only twin-ball massager with width adjustable, angled massage balls used for self-myofascial release (SMR) and to loosen up stiff, tight muscles. The adjustable width and angled balls allow HighBaller to be used anywhere on the body in a way no other self-massage tool is able to. HighBaller has an immediate pain relieving effect by quieting down pain receptors and in the long term, it will help you release your stiff, tight muscles to make your everyday life enjoyable again. 
      Get Your Project Funded Today!
 Some of the exercises you can do with HighBaller:
PLAY

Do not let pain hold you back   
Eighty percent of adults suffer from back pain sooner or later in their life. In most cases it is the type of pain that you live with each and every day. Neck and shoulder problems are also very common as approximately fifty percent of us suffer from neck and shoulder pain. It is also alarming that ever younger people are starting to show symptoms of back, neck and shoulder problems. Typical lower body problems including knee pain, shin splints, tight hip flexors and glutes are also often caused by tight muscles and poor mobility.
Poor flexibility and tight muscles are largely to blame for these types of pains and postural problems. 
If you want to stay healthy, live an active lifestyle, and want to prevent these types of problems from manifesting in the first place, then you will love HighBaller. HighBaller allows you to enjoy life by relieving tension and pain in the muscles and trigger points. 
A few 5-minute sessions a week with HighBaller is enough to:
relieve pain
take care of your muscles
enhance performance and enjoyment of your sport/activity
recover faster from activities
Together, we can make you and HighBaller come alive.
Use the wide setting to massage larger muscles like the glutes.
How to be pain free?
If you want to be healthy and pain free, you need to move in ways that improve all aspects of physical conditioning. And you need to do it regularly. Not just once a week. This also applies to the physical qualities that you can improve with the HighBaller. The qualities that play a big part in keeping us healthy and pain free.
Where as pain is a signal of something being wrong, good posture is a signal of something being very right. Our body works as one unit and posture is related to everything within that unit. Having good posture says that your spine and joints are correctly aligned and that you do not have muscle imbalances. With good posture you can also move in correct movement patterns in the activity of your choosing to improve the health of your respiratory and circulatory systems and to strengthen your skeletal muscles. To live life to the fullest without pain. That is what we want to give to you.
"It’s like having your very own personal massagist!"
take it with you to take care of your soft tissue wherever, whenever
HighBaller comes fully assembled; all we need is you using it 
made in Finland 
patented and trademark pending 
will be shipped in November just in time for Christmas 
1 Year Warranty
The only width adjustable twin-ball massager with angled massage balls
HighBaller is patented and trademark pending.
What is a HighBaller?
HighBaller has two massage balls that rotate on top of a width adjustable stand. The stand makes HighBaller comfortable to use and keeps the massage balls in the correct place. The underside of the stand is made from non-slip material to keep the stand in place.
The massage balls are firm and their material creates enough friction against the skin to prevent the massaged body part from slipping for a more precise and effective form of muscle care. The round shape makes it possible to manipulate the muscle with deep massage and target small, specific areas. The twin-ball configuration offers the possibility to treat two problematic areas at the same time. The width adjustment makes it possible to treat problem areas anywhere on the body.  
                           Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!
                                How does it work?
HighBaller is easy to use and you will be using techniques that come from massage and trigger point therapy.

Start by adjusting the width of the balls. Wider for larger muscles like the glutes, narrower for smaller muscles like the triceps.
 Release the trigger
HighBaller is used to loosen up stiff, tight muscles. One aspect of releasing this tightness is trigger point therapy. Trigger points are hyperirritable areas of skeletal muscle and of the fascia that surrounds skeletal muscle. They are like small pebbles formed by muscle fibers that are in a permanent state of contraction and form a “knot” in the surrounding fascia. Active trigger points cause pain both in resting and under stress. They can also cause vertigo and balance problems and appear as muscle imbalances and muscle stiffness. 
Examples of trigger points. HighBaller comes with the full Trigger Point Map.
HighBaller comes with its very own “Trigger Point Map" which shows you basic information on trigger point locations and how Highballer can help. The map shows you 30 potential problem areas and their referred pain areas. That way you can localize your problematic spot, find the trigger point and treat them.
Techniques
There are two techniques that you can do with HighBaller, called "rolling" and "push". With rolling you will get a more general soft tissue release, like after a nice massage. Push is used for specific trigger point release.
Rolling
Place a tight feeling muscle on the balls and adjust the width of the balls to suit the tight area. Slowly start to roll the balls across the length or width of the muscle. You can either use small movements to focus more on a specific area or roll across the full length of the muscle with calm, long movements. If you start to tense up and forget to breath, you are using too much pressure. Increase pressure when rolling towards the heart to direct venous and lymphatic flow back towards it and decrease pressure when rolling away from the heart and to not cause any undue pressure on the closed valves in the veins.
Push
If you find a particularly painful spot (trigger point) while rolling, pause at that spot and start applying pressure. It is going to hurt but try to stay relaxed and keep breathing. Maintain pressure for 15-30 seconds and if the pain starts to fade away, increase pressure until it feels slightly painful again. Continue like this for up to 3 minutes. If the pain persists after three minutes, the area needs to be treated several times over a longer period.
Our vision
As athletes, initially we wanted to create ergonomic muscle care products for ourselves to help us perform better and recover faster. After having the prototypes tested by a variety of people, we realized that we were creating something that could help anyone who suffered from skeletal muscle and fascial dysfunction related pain.

Living an active lifestyle can put stress on your body and now is the time to release that stress. We want to make everyday life more enjoyable and pain free by sharing this product with you. We truly believe that we have created another unique product to complement our first product the HighRoller. 
Together these products will help us and you live free of unnecessary aches and pains and show that elevating muscle care products make a difference.
Testimonials
PLAY

  Why we need your help? 
We truly believe our product can help people deal with everyday pain and is a great way to take care of your muscles. With your help, we can produce HighBaller quicker and more efficiently. Once you have received our product we are certain you are going to love it and know that you will want to tell others about it.
HighRoller - Sport product of the year
In 2015 we launched our first product called HighRoller. It is an innovative foam roller that spins around an axle on a height adjustable stand. The stand lets you foam roll in ergonomic and more effective positions by allowing you to relax while rolling and by focusing all the pressure on the treated muscle.
HighRoller quickly gained popularity in Finland, receiving the award for best sport product of the year in 2015.
In 2017 HighRoller has distributors in Scandinavia, Germany, U.K, U.S and Japan.
If you want to know more about HighRoller go to: https://highrollerofficial.com/
Meet the team
HighRoller® Finland Ltd. was established in 2015 and is owned by five “young-ish” entrepreneurs who all come from a sports background. The company manufactures products for personal muscle care in Finland.
Our products help you take care of your body and are suitable for anyone regardless of age or physical condition.
  Manufacturing plan
We have been working with our manufacturer Vesuto for over 3 years now, Vesuto has a long and successful track record of producing high quality plastic injection products. Their company has been massively involved in the success of our first product called HighRoller. Together with Vesuto we have produced the first prototype of HighBaller and have already put together production plans for when we reach our kickstarter target.
More Questions? 
Please feel free to contact us. Also check out the FAQ or leave a comment on this page!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have tested several materials and techniques over time to create the product to suit the needs of our customers. We have also received feedback from several users of prototype 1.0 and 2.0 and now we can confidently say that we have designed the best possible product for you.

With our network we can ensure a world wide delivery to our products.
We anticipate being able to ship orders in November 2017
but if the amount of orders exceed our expectations, it might take slightly longer to fulfill the orders.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: HighTrainer - Massage, Exercise & Stretch; Anytime, Anywhere
We are going to launch our new product HighTrainer on Kickstarter in Tue 23rd of October!
updates.update_content:
Hello, HighBaller Backers!

We are going to launch our new product HighTrainer on Kickstarter in Tue 23rd of October!

HighTrainer is the first portable product that combines massaging, training and stretching. It can be attached to a chair, a door or a car seat with its unique locking system. This allows you to use HighTrainer for massaging your body while you are working, driving or travelling. Locking the product into the door allows you to use the exercise band for training or dynamic stretching.

Thank you for your support on our HighBaller campaign.  
As you may know we have also launched a new campaign called the HighHealer. Check it out here.  
http://fnd.to/bc/highhealer

HighHealer Indiegogo campaign is now live!

Pre-order yours in the next 24 hours and save 57%!
👉🏻https://igg.me/at/HighHealer👈🏻

We had to change Kickstarter page to Indiegogo, but now it is live!

HighHealer is the World’s first portable 5-in-1 foot care trainer. Exercise areas of the foot, ankle and calf fast and effectively.

If you have any questions about the product or you have problems with ordering just send us a message here or send an email to customerservice@highrollerofficial.com.

updates.update_userinfo: New Kickstarter campaign will be launched in August!
updates.update_content:
Dear HighBaller Backers!

We are going to launch our new product HighHealer on Kickstarter in August! 

With your feedback and support we are soon ready to release our next product for making life more enjoyable.

If you have suffered from sore feet, plantar fasciitis, lowered arch or you just enjoy a relaxing foot massage then HighHealer will be a perfect fit for you.

HighHealer is intended for treating your feet, and the one of most common reason for feet pain is plantar fasciitis (heel pain). Below past president of the American Podiatric Medical Association tells more about plantar fasciitis and how to treat it. He likes that HighHealer is a perfect fit for treating plantar fasciitis, because the product can help to stretch out your plantar fascia ligament, massage your foot, decrease inflammation, and strengthen your intrinsic muscles of your foot.

Subscribe to the HighHealer newsletter from the link below and you'll get a chance to buy HighHealer at a SUPER 24H price and you'll be the first to receive the product!

Well done for a successful campaign, I'm looking forward to using the product and greatly appreciate the hard work you're all putting into the project and answering the backers questions.

@Creator though, will appreciate if u do source for cheaper shippings as 29usd for most parts would be on the costly side. singapore and hongkong do have fulfilment centers too. Even so, would understand if u cant. thanks
How do you pay for shipping? Should the shipping costs be added on to the pledge?

@Creator thanks for the updated estimates and clarity. 29usd to Singapore is much much more acceptable than 49usd written earlier in the faqs. Although still quite substantial, i appreciate the help in bringing shipping costs down

Ive seen the faq then. So unlike all other projects the shipping fee will be an additional invisible cost after pledging? will i have to pay 49usd after funding ends, which is more than 100% of my pledged price?

Nice work guys, this is on a roll (pun intended) - I tried both Prototypes, HighRoller in regular use at home by my whole family and can't wait to ditch the tennis balls taped together.... I hope that the many indie sports shops see the opportunity to have something in their store that no-one else has and commit to your retailer option. One thing I know, it will be quality.
Looking forward to get this product... currently I am using a lacrosse ball :-)

In reply to the question from update 2, an additional set of balls with a softer feel is one idea. Perhaps a set of covers that add a different texture is another one. Perhaps the covers could also serve to soften the feel.
what is the ball like? Rigid with friction; very similar to a lacrosse ball for example?
Yes, I would prefer that to the current yellow-orange. Thanks for asking.
I am ANXIOUS to use this to relieve my neck and upper back muscle pains - can't wait for these to start shipping! Thank you for creating something so useful and simple . . .
Awesome product as I had the chance to try out the prototype. Works well for trigger points and relieve tightness and tension at the right spots.
Looks practical and adjustable for everybody's needs! I like the orange colour too.

campaign.story:
With the 1/924 Limited collection we reinterpreted the iconic polo design from the beginning of the 20th century and gave it a more contemporary style and character. In doing so, our London artisans created one of the most beautiful pieces of clothing available.
In a world of aggressive capitalism and automated production, tradition sometimes seems to have taken a back seat - in big brands at least. What once stood as a symbol of progressiveness and higher status has now reached the point of excess. Traditional values are returning and so are the traditional methods of creating - handcrafting.
            It started as a personal pleasure - born from the love of good clothing and strong values - the vision was to create an unparalleled sense of class and comfort, cemented with quality. As with everything, the best results are achieved when one turns his craft into an art and true art cannot come to life without emotion. The hallmark is achieved when two very different worlds are perfectly united to establish harmony between durability and softness, sophistication and elegance; a vision comes to life - The Bonaefidei Polo.
        A conception by an artisan and skilful execution by a master seamstress. The end result speaks for itself. This is the pinnacle of bespoke - passion in creating and pleasure in wearing. A symbol on your chest you’ll wear with pride, a testament to your character in it’s most authentic form.
The first thing we needed to do was to find the right materials and after many dollars spent and samples tried we finally found a fabric that was suitable. It’s durable, great quality and most importantly, it feels great to the touch. After the first touch we knew that this was something else. 
Supima cotton plant can be spotted by its yellow flowers and black seeds. Its name derives from a group of American Indians who first cultivated the plant in the US, though the plant itself originated in Peru. Another special feature of Supima is a natural chemical called gossypol that protects it from insects and damage by fungus, which makes it perfect for allergies and even the most extreme climates.
To qualify as Pima the threads need to be 50% longer than normal cotton strands. It only accounts for around 3% of the cotton grown in the US each year. This is because it can only grow in certain climates and needs constant irrigation to survive. The work needed to produce the plant means it is much more expensive than other cottons. They also tend to last longer than other type of cotton, yet at the same time the material remains fine feeling and not bulky. This is because the weave uses lots of threads which makes it so strong yet soft at the same time - the ultimate in luxury clothing. This makes for a high quality shirt that looks professional and classy.
 Next thing we focused on were the finer details. How can we give a great quality shirt a special, personal touch - character. It was a classic example of “you don’t know what’s missing unless you’re actually wearing it daily”.
This is how our journey of discovery began. Wearing the polo - our polo - everyday felt great but of course, the whole experience could be a lot better since as of now, we were wearing a plain white polo shirt. 
Putting on a blazer quickly showed us what was missing - a strong collar. Have you ever noticed how the collar your favourite polo always buckled and grossly deformed when you put on a blazer or a coat (something with a harder collar)? Did it ever bother you? If it did, then you’re not alone. It’s frustrating because a gentleman needs to look sharp and a deformed collar is anything but that. So we sat down and found a solution. 
It turns out that sewing another layer of a finer and thinner weave fabric works wonders. There was practically no deformation after that and it also presented us with an opportunity to give our polo character by giving you the option of choosing among different patterns for the strengthening fabric. Good looks and functionality, what more could you ask for? A bespoke Bonaefidei experience is starting to take place. 
We will also offer a completely clean polo, without the pattern - you can choose what fits you best. 
  Given all the options, a shirt is still a shirt and there are limited options even for the best of creative minds, unless you’re planning on making it unwearable. But while wearing it, we found another pet peeve with the standard design - the back of the shirt kept coming out of the pants after a while creating a very unsophisticated look. So we made the whole shirt a little longer and also lengthened the back, to keep it “in the pants”. Simple. And the shirt kept getting better and better.
    To finish up the best polo experience we decided to limit the production to 924 pieces per colour - hence the name 1/924 limited collection. Why 1/924? This was the year british motoring grew richer for their first Le Mans trophy, of course in the traditional British racing green colour. Combining this with the personal touch you can give your polo it really does make a shirt that makes you stand out - in a good way. Seriously, how many people can say they’re wearing bespoke, handmade clothes.
  The original idea was to create a white polo, since it’s the most elegant and purposeful of all the colours but it quickly got joined by it’s colour and character opposite - the black Phantom polo. Capturing the two different and complementary traits of the gentleman’s character, one represents his day life and the other, with it’s darker colour vivifies the essence of his evening charm. 
Since then we’ve added two additional classic colours every gentleman needs to have in his private collection.
    PLAY

              PLAY

              PLAY

               PLAY

                      What good is Polo shirt if it does not come in a home worthy of it’s strong presence and character? This is why we meticulously fold and package each polo in a handmade luxury box. But we even go a step further. To ensure that your polo arrives in the best shape possible, we fold it over a passpartout - a 4mm thick special type of hard art paper, that doesn’t bend like those soft cardboards they fold shirts over. We believe that no detail is to small to ignore. 
        The book of Bonaefidei tells the story of our journey to craft the best possible clothing experience imaginable. It’s a collection of our inspirations, stories, which happened along the way, and a closer look at us, who we are and what we represent. We invite you immerse into the story of artisans and craftsmanship woven into the fabric of our clothes and our creative universe. 
The finished book will have hard covers and arround 40-50 pages of neatly woven stories, images and everything gentleman.
  Preview of the Book of Bonaefidei
        See the unique snapshots from our world.
                      Join our Facebook community.
  Immerse into the latest chapters from our world.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our production line is ready to make product on demand. We will give our best to provide Polo Shirts to our supporters as fast as possible, but to produce a timeless piece takes time.

We offer bespoke polo option where customer can chose whatever his wishes are for the polo. This option can take from 3 to 4 weeks to produce, as we want full satisfaction from our customers.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Kickstarter has helped me to launch 11 projects. As a German artist living and working in Frankfurt Germany, I started by using the American Kickstarter platform before Kickstarter went international--that was in 2010. Seven years later, I have released fonts, calendars, postcards and notebooks to an international group of backers.
Typographic Wall Calendar 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014, 2016
Typographic Postcards I + II (2015 + 2016)
Sigmund Freud Typeface • A letter to your shrink (2013)
Albert Einstein font (2015) 
Cancel / Save Notepads (2016)
The invitation to be part of Kickstarter Gold got me thinking about what projects I enjoyed the most and how I could bring them together in a new and timely way.
Here, in honor of Kickstarter's Birthday, I am offering a new reward based on my two most popular campaigns: the Albert Einstein font which renders Albert Einstein's handwriting and was funded here on Kickstarter in 2015 and the Sigmund Freud typeface which was also created with the help of thousands of backers on Kickstarter in 2013. 
  Studying Freud's letters in the Sigmund Freud Archive Vienna for the creation of the Sigmund Freud Typeface, 2013
I was inspired by the 1932 correspondence between Albert Einstein and Sigmund Freud on the topic of war. Einstein sought out Freud to discuss if and how it would be possible to save mankind from war forever. These letters were published in 1933 under the title “Why War?” with a little print run of 2000 copies. Beyond the curiosity to see how the exchange could be reproduced with the fonts I made, I feel as a artist that it is important at this precise moment in time to circulate all forms of reflection about violence—its causes and alternatives. So I would like to give you the fonts and also to snail-mail you these as “real” letters (in German and translated into English). Hopefully they will inspire you, to think further on these matters.
                  You really want to see this project happen, and with this reward you are contributing greatly to the funding necessary to make this project happen - Thank you!! 
First come, first served. The following rewards are one of a kind — only one of each is available. During the creation process of the fonts I used prints of Freud's and Einstein's letters, envelops, notes, postcards, travel diaries etc. to look for letters that could be used later in the font. These prints are exactly the size of the original, to get a feeling for the real-life proportions of the handwriting. During the work these prints are covered with various notes from me and in some cases even traces of coffee. Over the months and years working with these, they became to me more like beautiful pictures and compositions that tell a story. Since I can't hang all of them, I would like to give them into good hands and fund this project that is dear to me.
The following rewards include all of the rewards above. 
500€ Work Document #1: Page of Letter from Albert Einstein to his friend Paul Ehrenfest, 1916. Shows rare samples of the lower case letter q and uppercase J as well as a mathematical β. Size DIN A3 (297mm x 420mm) 4c laser print on heavy paper.
  Detail of Work Document # 1
  Detail of Work Document # 1
  400€ Work Document #2: Page and Envelop of Letter from Sigmund Freud to his grandson Ernst, March 1928. Various samples of the letter E, J and the german "ß". Movement studies in blue and green. Size DIN A3 (297mm x 420mm)
  Detail of Work Document # 3
  300€ Work Document #3: Envelop of Letter from Sigmund Freud to his wife Martha Freud. Shows beautiful samples of the letters W, B, F and M, as well as one variation for the letter g that made it into the Sigmund Freud Typeface. Size DIN A4 (297mm x 210mm)
  Detail of Work Document # 3
  350€ Work Document #4: Postcard from Albert Einstein to Prof. Dr. Max Jacob, 1918. Shows marked rare samples of the lower case letter q and beautiful M K and C and formula. Size DIN A3 (297mm x 420mm) 4c laser print on heavy paper.
  Detail of Work Document # 4
        The Sigmund Freud Typeface is the first handwriting font that is based exactly on samples of an author's handwriting. It holds four variation of each lowercase letter. The different versions are exchanged by the font automatically as one types.
With the Albert Einstein font I wanted to push the design even further to get closer to the complex look of handwriting. The font holds 5 variations of not only the lowercase letters (a, b, c, d…) but also uppercase letters (A, B, C, D…), numbers and signs. Here you can see a time-lapse of the production process of one of the 5 "y" that are working inside the font:
PLAY

Additionally the Albert Einstein font is created with different weights (Regular, Bold…). The result can be seen side by side below, original Manuscript in black, Albert Einstein Font in red:
If you are interested in how I created the fonts I recommend reading through the updates of the corresponding Kickstarter projects which you can find here: Sigmund Freud Typeface - a letter to your shrink and here: Albert Einstein font. As well as this detailed PDF Albert Einstein Font - How the font was made(takes a while to download).
Technical Details:
Compatibility: Both fonts work on Windows(PC), Mac, iOS (iPhone & iPad) as well as Linux systems. The fonts are delivered in OpenType format (TrueType and Postscript) ready for you to use with your favourite Textediting software like Word, Pages, OpenOffice, LibreOffice etc. as well as all your Apps on your iPhone and iPad that support font selection (i.e. Word, Pages…). Detailed step by step Information on how to install and use fonts are provided as PDFs.
Language support: both fonts support all Western, Central European, Baltic languages as well as special characters needed for Romanian and Turkish and Icelandic. The Sigmund Freud Typeface supports letters to write historic German script called Kurrent. The Albert Einstein font holds a variety of mathematical notation as well as greek letters needed to write physics.
These are the supported languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Asu, Basque, Bemba, Bena, Bosnian, Catalan, Chiga, Colognian, Cornish, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Faroese, Filipino, Finnish, French, Friulian, Galician, Ganda, German, Gusii, Hungarian, Icelandic, Inari Sami, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Jola-Fonyi, Kabuverdianu, Kalenjin, Kinyarwanda, Latvian, Lithuanian, Lower Sorbian, Luo, Luxembourgish, Luyia, Machame, Makhuwa-Meetto, Makonde, Malagasy, Malay, Maltese, Manx, Morisyen, North Ndebele, Northern Sami, Norwegian Bokmål, Norwegian Nynorsk, Nyankole, Oromo, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Romansh, Rombo, Rundi, Rwa, Samburu, Sango, Sangu, Scottish Gaelic, Sena, Shambala, Shona, Slovak, Slovenian, Soga, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Swiss German, Taita, Teso, Turkish, Turkmen, Upper Sorbian, Vunjo, Welsh, Western Frisian, Zulu.
Questions: Do you have a Question? Please contact me through Kickstarter or https://haraldgeisler.com/contact
  Typography: Harald Geisler
Dramaturge: Elizabeth Waterhouse
ALBERT EINSTEIN and EINSTEIN are either trademarks or registered trademarks of The Hebrew University of Jerusalem. Represented exclusively by Greenlight Rights. Official licensed merchandise.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Every artistic project bears risks. Every project is new and brings up unforeseeable risks and challenges both technically and artistically. I have published two comparable projects (Sigmund Freud Typeface and the Albert Einstein font) as well as 8 other typographic Kickstarter Projects (Typographic Wall Calendar Series, Typographic Postcards Series and Cancel / Save Notepad) that involved a lot of packaging and shipping — so I know about the artistic, technical and logistic pitfalls to avoid. The research, experience and preparation that I already made for this project, assures me that I am able to complete this project within the projected timeframe.

Thank you for your support.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Backer,
This is a short update: I launched a new font project. It is about creating 5 experimental fonts. There are some early-bird specials available for the next 10 hours:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2108133360/2020-font-collection
The project is already funded and supported by 217 backers from around the globe. I would be very happy if you join me in this typographic font adventure.

Dear Backer,
As you know the Sigmund Freud Archive and Museum in Vienna has supported my typographic projects that started with the Sigmund Freud font. They very generously allowed me to study multiple times and for weeks Freud's original Manuscripts in their library …and also allowed me to store Freud's letter to Einstein over night in Freuds study, which was to me an extraordinary gift from this institution:

updates.update_userinfo: A visit to the Albert Einstein Archive Jerusalem and a new Kickstarter Project!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backer,
I wanted to share with you that I finally visited the Albert Einstein Archive in Jerusalem, where I had the chance to study original letters from Albert Einstein and Sigmund Freud side by side! And I am launching a new Handwriting font project this friday, of which I would like to share a preview with you - and I would be very thankful for your feedback. 
A visit to the Archive

updates.update_userinfo: All tangible rewards packaged and waiting for pick up! Conspired Lovers available for download
updates.update_content:
Dear Backer,
As you remember the pen pals project met its funding goal only a few hours before the campaign ended. The situation was really tight in the last 3 days of the campaign. In Project Update #4 I reached out to all backers with an offer to increase their pledge:
Everybody who already has or will increase their pledge between last Friday (14 JuLY 2017) and the end of the campaign (in 50 hours) will receive the font as a gift in addition to their reward. The font is based on my own penmanship. Just like the Albert Einstein font and the Sigmund Freud Typeface it also works on PC and Mac as well as iPhones and iPads. Here is what the font looks like on the computer:

Dear Backer,
I just wanted to send out a quick update regarding the process of the campaign… specifically the processing of rewards.
Digital rewards:
By now you should have access to your digital rewards like PDF of the letters and fonts that came with your reward.

Dear Backer,
Another step done on the way to getting Freud's letter to you!
The letters "successfully" spend the night at Sigmund Freud's apartment in his practice/study room.
Mr. Nömaier from the museum welcomed me very friendly this morning in the museum and before it was opened to the public I took the pictures you'll see below. The boxes are standing next to Freud's cabin trunk that was used when he fled from Vienna to London in June 1938.

updates.update_userinfo: Briefe in der Küche/Letters in the kitchen
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
Step one of …: the letters are now stored in Freud's former kitchen. Just as I arrived and was about to carry the boxes up the stairs to Freud's apartment (the stairs are crowded with visiting students waiting to enter the museum) - I ran into Mrs. Frei from the direction. Since the museum is quite busy she suggested to store them in the former apartment (1st floor) and not in the direction (3rd floor). For now 16h until the museum closes 18h they are in placed in the apartments kitchen - which is one of the places Freud did not visit that often as Mrs. Frei added. Today it is used by the museums staff as what it is: a kitchen, meeting and storage for all the things a museum needs.

Dear Backers,
The letters arrived safe in Vienna! I just wanted to share some pictures from the way to Sigmund Freud Museum. Right now I switched from train to tram and I am in this lovely still working "historic" tram with 400+ letters (almost 40kg).
Best, Harald

Dear Backer,

campaign.story:
The story
This movie is about one of the most dramatic and important moments in Steve Job’s life: the one in which he was fired from Apple.
We are going to capture the intimate contradiction of this event, the controversial path that led to such a tough decision: we want you to know how you would feel "Firing Steve Jobs".
As he himself used to describe it, this experience was the best thing that could ever happen to him. It has been a crucial moment in Job’s professional life.
This is true for Apple also, who put themselves on the path of self-destruction, that inevitably had occurred without Jobs comeback in the late 90’s.
Why did they at Apple behead themselves by firing their own front man, the first cover man in the digital industry history?
Why did they consciously get rid of the strongest drive for vision and innovation of their entire ranks?
John Sculley
Two fictional movies have been already heavily focused on this single event. Although a reconstruction may impressively convey the emotions that would arise in such an incident, it falls short when compared to real accounts, the actual reason and the practical consequences of it.
What we did was searching for the people who fired Steve Jobs and listening to the story of his dismissal as being told by the main protagonists of that decision. 
One of them is John Sculley, the CEO of Apple who fired Jobs in 1985 and led the company until 1993. He never spoke extensively on camera about this episode before and a lot of his assertions are quite impressive.
John Sculley
The other one is Mike Markkula, Jobs mentor, Apple nurturer, who always had a leading role at Apple until recent years. If one should name an Apple insider, he definitely is the one.
None of Jobs, Sculley and Markkula is an average guy and their relationship is key to understend how great goals are achieved throughout history.
Mike Markkula
These are no actors: these people are real and they are talking about their own deeds, their emotions and their personal memories.
Along with this two main characters the film will feature a huge panel of digital revolution stars we had the chance to met in these years of development: Steve Wozniak, Andy Hertzfeld, Larry Tesler, Jay Elliot, Paul Terrel, Chuck Peddle, Alvy Ray Smith, Steven Levy, Alan Cooper, Stan Veit, Michael Swaine, Paul Freiberg, everyone of them giving their personal account of the rise of Apple, the MacIntosh development years and the confusion of the early nineties.
Andy Hertzfeld
  Alvy Ray Smith
  Larry Tesler
 The reason why
We’re going to tell a fact already known by Apple enthusiasts around the world, but we are going to tell the full story from a different point of view.
We are going to explain the how and the why of a tough decision, one that dangerously borders with rashness and obscurity, influenced by odd behaviors, which led to a fate of slow decline, but that ultimately was, perhaps, unavoidable.
At the same time, this will turn out to be the story of a computer that would have become a signature trait of Apple and many computer users for decades: the MacIntosh.
The Macintosh
The MacIntosh, was not a success from day one, but nontheless it was a matter of faith from day one, first of all in the Apple ranks. Indeed it was more a failure than anything else and Steve Jobs was the one pushing the Mac more than anybody else.
Could this story have been different if the Mac had been an overnight success? How much of his winding career Steve Jobs owes to devoting himself completely to the Mac vision?
Was Steve Jobs some 20 years ahead of the personal computer market? Did the users and the technology have to allign with Jobs vision before Apple could really change the world? 
Steve Jobs stuck on to his vision, no matter what the numbers told him and it took him 15 to 20 years to see it fulfilled. Is this the way you normally do a revolution?
Those questions, among others, we are going to answer in our next movie which will likely run 90 minutes.
Our aim and our vision
By the end of 2016, we found ourselves with one documentary about Commodore computers on the way of self-distribution and the second one about Atari almost ready for delivering to our bakers.
We were just thinking about our next endeavor in the early computer history and we concluded that we could no longer avoid talking about Apple.
Tough indeed... it`s not that easy to approach a topic like that!
Apple Lisa
What is sure is that our mission is to bring the digital revolution consciousness to a wider audience, keeping accuracy and insightfulness possibly beyond our standard level.
We committed ourselves to give the audience something they never had, which would be worth listening and watching and that will give a payload of knowledge that they would never find elsewhere. So in the beginning of 2017, we reached John Sculley and Mike Markkula.  
It was not easy, but their words are an invaluable contribution to telling the story right, aside of any established storytelling about what happened.
Interviewing those people was a stunning experience and in some cases very intense, more than you would ever expect. We are confident we can let the audience feel the same involvement that took place on set and the same emotionalism that was tangible there.
John Sculley
Moreover, this is a story about humanity, difficult choices, ambition, passion and friendship that deserves to see the light of day.
We need your help now to deliver this same experience and first-hand accounts to the mass audience. Our main goal is to preserve the memory of this personalities for the years to come by means of good storytelling, beautiful footage and insightful words.
We do believe that the digital revolution history is a mass audience matter.
Steve Wozniak
We asked your help twice in the past and always succeeded to deliver and now the time has come to put our storytelling at stake for the most iconic company and the most iconic visionary of the entire digital revolution history.
Stretch Goals
We considered a couple of strecth goals to make our movie even better:
-Goal at 60,000$: exclusive photos! To make this documentary visually stunning and rich we need to use third party exclusive photos about Steve Jobs that we are going to turn into animated footage. 
We already are in contact to get them, but the cost is really high! If we reach 60.000 $ we will acquire the material needed to a unique touch to our work!
-Goal at 75,000$: new interviews! We have the opportunity to shoot some new footage and interviews of two or three personalities that are going to add extraordinary value to the movie. 
This will cost another 15,000$ to make, peaking our goal to 75,000$.

updates.update_content:
Last summer we announced a new documentary "Firing Steve Jobs".
The crowdfunding campaign was closed after just a couple of weeks: we received a lot of comments, ideas, and suggestions about this story. What we've understood is that a story so focused on that particular moment was too limited.
So we've taken a step backward, stopped the campaign, and re-think the whole project. The core of this documentary is the incredible, heartbreaking series of interviews we shot with John Sculley, Mike Makkula, Steve Wozniak, Andy Hertzfeld (and many more!).
They talk about Steve Jobs in a way that we've never heard before. We know that there are a lot of movies and documentaries about him, but we also know that no one can tell this story in such a deep, emotional and addictive way. So we've written a new script, shot some new material, and decided to start again with this project.

Hi everyone It looks like this campaign never really took off, so we decided to shut it down a few days before the natural end of it.
First of all we would like to say thank you to everyone (not few really) who has decided to pledge once again for a movie of ours. You are our strongest support and we would never had done anyone of those movies without you. We would also like to thank everyone who has at least considered to pledge, but did not and everyone who liked and share our campaign on the web.

Hi friends,
what a start for our project: selected as Project We Love and more than 100 backers.
Help us spread the word about this campaign, we really need your help!
In the next update, we will reveal some more material we are working on, just to make you understand better how hard we are working to make this project real. You, for sure, will appreciate it!

campaign.story:
Wibe is the most innovative way for you to workout your entire body — anywhere, anytime. Our specially designed resistance training system is lightweight, ultra-portable, and can be worn on your back when you run, hike, longboard, or do whatever it is that you're passionate about.
We've designed it for people who want to break free from their typical gym routine, live a little, and get some fresh air.
Wibe - design yourself

Whether you are just starting to make healthier choices and getting off the couch or you're a serious athlete, Wibe is the perfect solution for maintaining and getting into shape. With over 150 exercises and two different strengths to choose from and more on the way, you can switch up your routine as often as you like and never get bored.
Already published by:
    Wibe is compact and can be worn on your back or slipped into your luggage without weighing you down or adding bulk.
just take it ...
    Don't feel like leaving the house? Workout at home while you binge-watch your favourite show.
Never miss another workout because you're travelling. If you're on-the-go for work or play, Wibe is lightweight and compact enough to fit in your carry-on bag.
       A list of 151 exercises and still counting ...
  The X is built with the latest materials used by the military and those in the paragliding industry. They are the strongest, most durable materials currently on the market. We've even incorporated a waterproof zipper pocket to keep your phone, cards, and keys safe. 
And to keep you safe, we lined the hems with reflective materials for added visibility at night.
The straps are made from high-grade elastic resistance bands. Wibe X is perfect for all fitness levels!
Modular Backpack
Need a convenient, streamlined way to carry more stuff while you're out? We've created a specially designed backpack that attaches to the Wibe X. It's modular, so you can customize it to fit your needs.
 The modular components attach quickly and easily to the ergonomic base that forms to your body and is equipped with high-quality breathable padding — the same kind that the military uses for its gear. All the components are weatherproof and attach securely with our unique fastening system which holds strong when force is applied downward and will only release when you pull upward.
 Costs/benefits of WIBE or ...
  If you're ready to get into the best shape of your life, join us and get fit with Wibe!
        Special thanks to everyone who played a part in the Wibe Story: Nina Tratnik (movie director),Tadej Živko (camera), Gašper Jager (camera), Barbara Hren (make-up), Borut Bernik (music), Jure (camera guy), Niko Klanšek (support), Grega Piškur (support), Peter Slapar (material expert),Ivana Stanojev (FB content), Mojca Jagodic (FB, Instagram manager), Jernej Svetek - Izstop (web page), Matej Mavsar (X-Gym owner), Damjan Zorc (gym), Jan Jenko (gym), Marko Ocepek (pack shot), Gorazd Dominko (organizational assistant), Luka Golob (sport model), Katarina Filipčič (sport model), Alen Kovačič (sport model), Saš Omerovič (sport model), Nina Kovačič (sport model), Sandra Eržen (sport model), Mihael Zadravec (longboard), our wives, husbands and kids (for being so patient). 
During our search for a lightweight, super portable product that would give us the freedom to exercise anywhere we wanted (especially while we were outside enjoying nature), we couldn't find anything on the market that gave us everything we needed. That's when we decided to take it upon ourselves to create our own. After two years of research and development, what started as a sketch on a napkin, became the Wibe that you see today. We're happy to say that our hard work has paid off, last year the Designers Association of Slovenia recognized Wibe as one of the best design projects of 2016. We didn't stop there. We wanted everyone to be able to get the most out of our product, so we've been working with a number of fitness professionals to develop a series of workout techniques for you to use with Wibe. With over 150 exercises, and a new training video every two weeks, you'll never get bored with your workout. Now we've come to you, Kickstarter, to share it with the world and give you the opportunity to get your hands on Wibe, before it hits the market.
  Digitalization - We'll incorporate smart sensors into the Wibe design that will let you get more insight into the progress you are making with your workouts.
Mobile App - The Wibe app will be connect to your smart device to track your training achievements and provide additional training tips and tutorials. Additional Colors - We'd add more color choices, so you can express your unique style. Some ideas are purple, blue, and black.
Children's Sizes - Once we get the adult version of Wibe off the ground, we'd like to begin adding more products to our line of exercise gear. For our second product, we'd like to introduce a version that fits your kids, so they can join in on the fun. (Design ideas are already in the works.) 
Please see R/C written bellow.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
After two years of developing and testing the Wibe prototype we are confident that we have the best design possible made with the best materials. We realize there is always the possibility of setbacks when bringing a product to market and have planned accordingly. We've allowed enough slack in our production and delivery timeline, so incase we hit any bumps in the road there will be plenty of time to resolve any issues that could possibly come up and get Wibe in your hands and on your back on or before our estimated delivery date. During the design and development stage, we worked closely with fitness instructors, selected only the best materials, and tested tons of prototypes. We're confident that our final prototype is the represents the apex of design, durability, and innovation. In fact, we even have an award to prove it. If despite all of our planning there are delays that are unavoidable, keeping you in the loop is of the utmost importance to us. It is our priority to keep communication with you transparent and frequent, after all you are the reason we're able to bring Wibe to life.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Our product is a custom-made hand cream based on shea butter, where you get to choose two major components that make all the difference: an active substance and a seed oil! All substances are locally produced to European standards, and we buy them from friendly people only!
Panthenol - moisturizes upper skin layers and smoothes the skin (Vegan friendly),
Hyaluronic acid - moisturizes skin and increases it’s elasticity (Anti aging; Vegan friendly), and
Collagen - deeply moisturizes skin and makes it velvety (Anti aging).
Raspberry seed oil - provides excellent natural UV protection,
Plum seed oil - is perfect as an emollient to condition skin, and
Pumpkin seed oil - with natural nutrients that help firm and tighten the skin.
  Hyaluronic acid & raspberry seed oil hand cream in aluminum packaging
  We want to develop a wider range of natural skincare products on the same principle, and to add many more ingredients to meet everyone’s needs, and that’s essentially why we need your help. 
For supporting us you will receive a Digital Brochure, and that is true for all our backers. Depending on your pledge, you will also receive one or more Hand Creams, custom-made as you wish. All our creams come in aluminum packaging.
If we reach our goal, you will be able to choose between 3 active substances and 3 seed oils, giving you a total of 9 different combinations.

campaign.story:
We started the project because we want to give you a more compact way of opening your drinks.
       With the "Jo - Just open" titanium micro bottle opener, you can open your drinks anywhere you want, without the need to carry big bottle openers with you.
HOW YOU USE IT:
     Using your keychain split-ring for leverage, and placing your thumb on the opposite side, requiring only a single tug to remove a cap. Sure - a bigger sized opener has more leverage, but no other bottle opener is this powerful for its size!
MATERIAL:
     To deliver a long lasting experience, we decided to use Grade 5 Titanium. It has highest strength-to-weight ratio of any metal, outstanding corrosion resistance and it is lightweight. Titanium is perfect material due to its durability, its resistance to seawater and chlorine in swimming pools and as it is non-toxic. The fact that titanium is so strong, light and non-toxic it makes perfect metal of choice for our      "Jo - Just open" production.
 Thickness: 2mm/0,08 inch        Weight: 1 gr/0.03527 oz
Funding: 
     We plan to use Grade 5 Titanium, refined with laser cutting, finishing, custom packaging, and other related production costs. 
     The price available to Kickstarter backers will be lower than our final retail pricing, so get your  "Jo"  while you can!
TOP 7 REASONS WHY   "JO"  IS PERFECT FOR YOU:
1. Lightweight – titanium is lighter than steel  
2. Strong – titanium has a highest strength-to-density ratio of any metallic element. Titanium has strength and hardness comparable to carbon steel.  
3. Durable – titanium is one of the most durable metals on the planet, which is why it’s used in aerospace and military
4. Small – small as a coin, ideal for your key-chain  
5. Pocket friendly – perfect for everyday carry in your pocket
6. Excellent corrosion resistance - titanium is more resistant than any other metal.Titanium is highly resistant to most types of corrosion. It will hold for years without succumbing to the effects of rust and corrosion.  
7. Non-toxicity - titanium is used as a material for surgical implants and dental plates attesting to the non-toxicity of titanium. Also titanium can be used within the human body due to its bio-inert qualities. 
 Our campaign starts in June. Hopefully it will finish successfully funded in July. In that case we will start with the surveys and wait for the funds to arrive. As our suppliers are on standby we will start the production in September and have the first shipments sent and delivered in October.
Thank you for taking the time to learn about our project "Jo - Just open" and we sincerely can’t thank you enough for the supporting our dream. THANK YOU!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are more than capable of delivering "Jo - Just open" to the market.
We proved our competence with our first Kickstarter project "MyPocketMaster" reaching over 5,000$ in backing (feel free to check it out)

Although we don't foresee any major problems, we understand that there is always a chance of small delays. We have lowered the risk of failure by making "Jo" production process as simple as possible. Our business partners are fully informed about the launch of "Jo" and are waiting for the first production orders. The only thing remaining is waiting for your support to help us to meet the goal that we require to bring "Jo - Just open" to life. Rest assured we'll be updating all backers frequently on our progress.

campaign.story:
The Guardians of civilisation is a documentary film project about Assyrian artists in Iraq. It is being developed by two Slovenian movie makers, who plan to visit Iraq soon in order to make a final footage and give the voice to the voiceless.
The inspiration for the move originates in the overlooked fate of one of the oldest nations in the world, commonly known as Assyrians. In modern times one can find main Assyrian communities in South-East Turkey, North-Western Iraq and North-Eastern Syria. All three territories are now war zones, cut through and apart by battle lines.
Assyrians are one of the first people to accept Christianity. Even though outsiders refer to them as Assyrian christians, the community is divided into three main branches of Eastern Christianity: Eastern Assyrian Church, Syriac/Syrian Orthodox Church and finally Chaldean Church, leading many of Assyrians to identify themselves as either Assyrians, Syriacs or Chaldeans.
Before the start of the Second Gulf War there were 1.5 million christians living in Iraq. Due to war, numerous terrorist attacks and senseless destruction of their towns and historical monuments vast majority have decided to leave their homes for good. They have joined countless others who try to seek refuge in Europe and elsewhere in the world.
To give you the idea on where the movie is taking place:
  For more information on Assyrian history we kindly invite you to visit our website.
The movie will feature the story about Nenous and his father - two Assyrian artists from Bakhdeda, very near Mosul. After Bakhdeda was liberated from ISIS in November 2016, they visited their town and found it to be almost completely plundered and ruined. Nevertheless, the family is hoping to return home soon. Apart from rebuilding their house Mr. Thabet and Nenous also intent on making anew all the destroyed statues.
We did the research for our movie in December 2015 and started filming in March 2016. We are making a 55-minute portrait-type documentary. Rather than covering the issue through a set of interviews with many different persons from political figures to refugees, we are focusing on personal stories that tell the greater tale.
 Mr. Thabet is one of the most renowned Iraqi artists. He took care of old Assyrian statues in Mosul and made his own for churches and monasteries in Ninevah. Islamic state destroyed all of them in 2014. Mr. Thabet's family joined thousands of others fleeing their homes. Currently they are still refugees in Ainkawa, Erbil's predominantly Assyrian suburb.
The refugee camp in Ainkawa, Erbil The refugee camp in Ainkawa, Erbil
Mr. Thabet is teaching art at a high school set up at one of the refugee camps and has an art programme Portrait at a local station Ishtar TV. His most dedicated student is his son Nenous, determined to follow in his father's footsteps. Nenous talent has already been noticed by local and foreign media, in fact the story was covered by CNN in December 2016.
Nenous and his father
    With this documentary we wish to provide a chance for Assyrians to tell us the stories of their common tragic fate and to introduce themselves to the world that has largely turned its back on them. We wish to raise awareness among the international public about the situation of Assyrians in Iraq. We want to both educate the people about the complexities of the Middle East as well as to wake people up by realising that what is happening to Assyrians is not just a crime against humanity, it is also a crime of humanity against Assyrians. .
Our main commitment is to portray the undying hope to rebuild what was destroyed and to defy death with life. We are building a film document about history, about culture, about identity and above all about human courage.
  Erik Valenčič is a longtime journalist with in-depth knowledge of the situation in the Middle East. He received an award for ‘outstanding accomplishment’ by Slovenian Association of Journalists in November 2015, Slovenia. Currently he is finishing a TV documentary movie for RTV SLO about three monasteries: Mor Augin in Turkey and Mar Mattai and Rabban Hormizd in Iraq.
Miha Mohorič is a passionate travel writer and filmmaker documenting people’s ways of life and their culture in his films. His main focus is socio-cultural thematic, specially the one which is in our society hidden or ignored. Miha is also the founder of Kranjska Gora International Film Festival in Slovenia where his main goal is to present atavistic and human rights documentaries to wider public.
Making a documentary movie is a time and money consuming effort. So far we were able to travel to Iraq couple of times in the period of 2016 and 2017, where we spent several weeks filming in various cities, from Bakhdeda, Erbil, Mosul, to Dohuk and have shot around 4 Tb of video footage. Because of the unstable situation in the area, we had to plan yet another, and last, filming trip in order to make our final footage. The trip will take place in late June this year.
This additional filming trip has seriously compromised our budget. Your support will allow us to cover costs like audio and video editing, colour-grading, sound, translating and subtitling. It would also enable us to compensate fixers, translators and everyone else who contributed in making this movie. In these tumultuous times, it is important for us to get this message out, to give voice to the voiceless and make a positive impact. With your help and our dedicated team members, we are confident that we will not let you or the content down, and create a beautiful documentary movie with a strong message and educational note that will reach many hearts.
Every euro counts! If you can’t support our project by getting any of the offered perks, tell your friends, email everyone you know about it or share this campaign on your social media page. More “LIKES” we get, more exposure and more chances our documentary gets to be screened and aired.
You are more than welcome to learn more about the project and the team!
www.facebook.com/guardiansofcivilisation/
www.guardiansofcivilisation.com
Thank you for your support! Every little bit helps.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Every project in the potentially dangerous area brings it own challenges. Whole team actively works to minimize existing threat both at home when planning where and how to film, and on the field by knowing and trusting right people. Even so, we cannot completly guarantee the safety of our people, so it is always possibility that project fails if equipment or people on the field get compromised. 

After the film crew returns, we don't expect any aditional problems. The deadline of release might be postponed for a month or two beacuse of extended production work.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Our aim is to preserve centuries-long legacy of craftsmanship of the Balkan artisans, by providing them with a steady income, as well as to give the locally designed and manufactured products worldwide visibility through our online platform. 
    We make sure to provide ethical and fair compensation to all the people involved in the production and supply chain. Folkk is an initiative of Nova Iskra creative hub from Belgrade, Serbia.
    This modular, triform serving board lets you arrange a compelling dinner or snack arrangement with ease. You can use it as a single large board, or play around with trapeze-like cuts and use the segments to make up your own, unique table setting. 
    Enhancing the functionality of a much-used everyday object such as a plate, this beautifully imagined and carefully crafted piece has a two-sided design. Use Plato for everyday meals or arrange a unique combination of finger food and nibbles to share in those special moments.
      It takes more than 100 hours of work and the collaboration of two distanced craft workshops to create a pillow such as Ment. Stuffed with unprocessed wool collected from Serbian shepherds and completed by high-quality twill on the backside, Ment pillows speak of their infinitely human origin.
      All Resa kilims are hand-woven from 100% locally-sourced wool and come in vivid, stable colors that will liven up any interior they land in. Weavers from the south of Serbia use traditional techniques, looms and tools that are grounded in deep cultural experience. It requires more than 150 working hours to complete one of these exquisite kilims.
        Folkk is initiated by the team of Nova Iskra, a creative hub founded in Belgrade, Serbia, that empowers emerging creative professionals and helps develop innovative businesses. Nova Iskra aims to strengthen local and regional economies and support people on the social margins, in a creative approach that is rooted in design-thinking process. 
Creative collaboration, mutual learning and trust between designers and makers are what makes our products truly exceptional. 
                We are proud of our economically and ecologically sustainable production methods that benefit everyone involved in the process.
2/3 of our revenue goes directly to our makers, while the remaining 1/3 gets reinvested into development of new products and reach out to new makers.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have already worked with all of the artisan communities and workshops, and are confident we will be able to deliver all the products on time. Production delay: if for any reason we are delayed in our production schedule, you will be the first to know, whether post-Kickstarter or in the future. Our first priorities are our backers and future customers. We commit to providing the most efficient and detailed communication possible!
Taxes, Duties & Shipping: Backers will be responsible for covering any VAT, import duties, etc, in their country of residence / delivery.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Folkk supporters,
We are happy to let you know that we have started shipping Folkk products that you pledged for during our Kickstarter campaign. Thanks once more for supporting us, we are eager to put your favorite Folkk items into your hands!
However, due to the rationalization of shipping costs of the Serbian postal service, as well as their slow pace of daily operations, we will not be able to ship all of your items at once.

We are so happy to let you know that Folkk got all the necessary funds to move forward!
Thank you all for making this happen. Thanks for your feedback, shares, articles, support & love!

We're checking in one last time before Folkk Kickstarter campaign ends! We are so happy to tell you that, as of right now, we are 70% funded!
We're working tirelessly to raise the additional 30% in the next few days. Please help us spread the word and show that social entrepreneurship can be the way to bring change in Serbia!

Hello and thank you to our first 46 backers! We're so excited to see Folkk come alive and engage more artisans across the Balkans into our production! 
We're off to a great start and we've still got 27 days left to reach our goal, but we could still use your help to spread the word. As I'm sure you all know by now, Kickstarter projects are all or nothing, so if we don't reach our goal we won't receive any funding and Folkk will be postponed. You've graciously backed our project, if you wouldn't mind taking the extra step to share it with your friends we'd be much obliged.

campaign.story:
Roby d'Bear is a robot which will bring kids back from their virtual worlds into reality. Revolutionary step in connecting technology and socialization. Use your knowledge of mobile devices and upgrade it to control a real robot. Roby d'Bear - your connection from virtual reality to real life.  
      Kids and adolescents spend most of their time on their mobile phones or other devices, playing all sorts of apps and losing basic social skills. 
Every one of them has his favorite figure or character. Wouldn't it be special if characters from apps could come alive?
We have made that possible and created the robot Roby d'Bear. This is a product, which will upgrade social and virtual skills of younger generations and bring them back a feel for real things. Roby d'Bear is more than a toy. It is a partner that will help you return to the physical contact with people and things.
Description
Functional robot in the form of an attractive bear. Multiple operation modes such as Dance, Karaoke, Voice repeat and Manual control. It is totally controlled via application on your mobile phone or tablet with activated Bluetooth connection. 
    The Robot
Robot which repeats after user in the form of an attractive bear. Suitable for all genders of all ages. You can arrange him in any position you choose. Manual and automatic operation for even more fun. Total control with our brand new application for users of different mobile operating systems.
             Home screen
Everything takes place on home screen. First you need to turn on the device and enable Bluetooth connection on your mobile phone or tablet. Open the app and Roby is ready to use. On home screen there are two basic functions and a menu button. You can choose between Play and Manual mode. In Play mode, the robot waits for you to start talking and then repeats after the user in normal voice. In Manual mode, the user can manually control the robot. Movable parts are both arms, head, mouth, eyes and eyelids. 
Functions screen
The second part of brains of Roby d'Bear. All functions are nicely arranged to give user a complete control over possible operation modes. Here you can control the basic settings like speakers and motors or select advanced operation modes for even more fun. Functions such as Dance, Karaoke and Repeat change the operation mode of the Bear. There are also additional functions for setting high or low repeat voice and sliders for changing speaker volume and microphone sensitivity. Robot can be used for number of different functions to bring more fun to all types of users.
Music, hands free calling, docking station and more
Another useful function is an integrated charger for mobile phones. Speaker function enables hands free calls. For more entertaining conversation turn on Dance function. The robot will move his mouth and you get the feeling as you were talking to him. Easiest way to transform your boss into a funny looking bear.
Audio station with alarm 
In addition to all the functions, the device can be also used just as an ordinary audio station for playing music. Powerful speakers and built-in amplifier ensure highest sound quality. 
Wouldn't it be nice if your best friend Roby d'Bear could wake you up?
We have made that possible. Simply set your alarm clock and activate a Bluetooth connection with the device. When an alarm is triggered, Roby will start singing and dancing (depending on your alarm tune) and will wake you up in a friendly manner.
        Kit model
Roby d'Bear is also available as a kit model. Kit includes all necessary parts to build robot from scratch. Instruction manuals included. 
             Development
There are quite a few challenges when developing a new product. We have designed, repaired, re-designed multiple models until we finally found the right one. 
Development includes not only design and construction, but also all other fields of knowledge and expertise such as marketing, sales and production. During that process we have learned more than we first expected. Challenges and problems appeared on every step of the way and we had to overcome them. Finally we have our product ready for launch and we need you to help us realize our dreams.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Production includes multiple stages. During our development we have gathered contacts and suppliers for all the parts needed. If we successfully conclude this Kickstarter campaign, the production process will begin immediately. 
We look forward to inform our contractors and suppliers to begin with production, so we can deliver you our products as soon as possible. 

Thank you for supporting us!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
