WOCH will wirelessly charge your phone. Just place it on the top and let it do its magic.

campaign.story:
Watch the pitch video in higher quality on Youtube!
Mordhau is a multiplayer medieval fighting game where fights range from duels all the way to large, open battles of up to 64 players with horses, siege engines, and castles to be stormed. It features a skill-based free-flowing combat system that is easy to learn, but hard to master.
The game is being built on Unreal Engine 4 and will be released on Steam for Windows PCs. Other operating systems and platforms might follow post-release, but there are no concrete plans at the moment.
Check out some of the game's key features below.
FREE-FLOWING COMBAT. Chain your attacks into combos, punish your opponents with quick counters, push them away with kicks, trick them with feints, grip your polearm closer to the head, use real halfswording techniques -- and much, much more. And the best part? You can combine it all, any way you want. Get creative with your play-style.  
EXPRESSIVE CONTROLS. An entirely new dimension of input. Our melee combat system allows players to cut and thrust from a total of 240 different angles by flicking their mouse in the desired direction. If you prefer a controller over a mouse, or a more traditional control scheme, don't worry, we've got you covered.
REAL-TIME COLLISION DETECTION. Your blade will cut exactly where it looks like it should. Weapons can clash together, resulting in fast-paced exchanges and the occasional loss of hands.
BELIEVABLE FIGHTS. A game where fights look believable, Mordhau strikes a balance between gameplay and realism. Ballerinas and circus performers are replaced by carefully designed combat mechanics. We are confident that our system solves most of the common problems of this genre, and is also heaps of fun.
GORE. LOTS OF GORE. Decapitate your foes, cut off their arms, hands and legs and watch throats being slit while they gurgle their last breath away. And for those who prefer a more family-friendly visual effect, we will offer options to tone the gory visuals down a notch.
DEDICATED SERVERS. Bad netcode can ruin a multiplayer game, especially a melee title with a focus on precise timing. Peer-to-peer? No thanks. Dedicated servers ensure a stable experience and low ping.
SIEGE ENGINES. Take out enemies from the safety of your catapult, scale siege ladders and fight on them, or pin enemies down with a well-placed ballista shot.
MAP INTERACTIVITY. Bring gates crashing down on enemies, chuck boulders off of castle walls, and pick up and drop equipment as you go. Interaction is a big part of the game, and it spices up every match.
FIGHT ON HORSEBACK. Plow through the enemy ranks on your horse and launch surprise flank attacks on the enemy archers. Take care not to get swarmed and overwhelmed by infantry!
VARIED BATTLES & ENVIRONMENTS. Our combat system is designed for fights ranging from duels all the way to large open battles of up to 64 players with castles to be stormed, and fields to be covered in blood. A variety of environments will keep each battle interesting, as we will take you from dusty deserts, to lush green forests, and even icy peaks.
RANGED COMBAT. The game’s arsenal includes ranged equipment such as bows and crossbows. You can also throw your sword, preferably into someone’s face. Projectiles will collide with other projectiles, and even attacks. See an axe flying towards you? Bat it away.
EXPRESS YOURSELF. Use animated emotes and voice commands to scream at the top of your lungs as you charge into battle, or simply sit back and laugh at your enemy's demise.
CREATE YOUR WARRIOR. Pick your gender, choose the type of body, adjust facial features, and even sculpt a face to your liking. We want you to be recognized from how you look, as well as from how you fight.
SUIT UP. Create your suit of armor: pick from gloves, arms, shoulders, chest pieces, legs, boots, helmets, and more. Color each piece to your liking and select a metal tint. Pick an emblem that represents you well, and you can even choose how polished you want the metal to be. Be anything from a viking to a crusader.
BUILD YOUR WEAPON. Smith your sword out of individual pieces: pick from blades, crossguards and grips. Want a mace instead? No problem, pick your head and handle and choose the wood type. There are hundreds of possible combinations.
WATCH & LEARN. Spectate other players in first or third-person to see how they play and record your battles to watch them from different perspectives with our demo system. We even used it to record our gameplay trailer!
BUILT FOR PC. Choose your desired field of view, unlock your framerate, set all manner of control and quality options that have once been taken for granted, but are now missing in many recently released games.
OFFLINE PLAY. Mordhau is primarily an online game, but you can play the game offline against bots with different personalities and difficulties.
NO EARLY ACCESS. We aim to deliver a polished game that we will continue to expand with post-release content and updates.
END HIM RIGHTLY. Yes, you can unscrew and throw your pommel in this game.
Find out more about the customization and combat in these two devblogs, keep in mind this is older footage:
     Reaching these stretch goals will help speed up the development of the game. We’re passionate about what we’re making, so it is likely that we will attempt to deliver these regardless of the funds raised. However, they may take longer to complete and may arrive much longer after the game has been released, or they might not materialize at all. With your help, we can ensure this doesn’t happen. Please do keep in mind that these goals represent additional development time, and may not make it directly on release. We will be revealing the hidden goals as the campaign funding progresses, so keep your eyes peeled!
Mordhau is being developed by Triternion. We're a young, 10-person international team driven by our passion for melee games and the medieval era. We've accumulated thousands of hours of playtime in awesome titles such as Chivalry, Mount & Blade, War of the Roses, the Jedi Knight series, and many others, too. Having been part of the community as players as well as content creators, we feel we’re in a unique position to use this experience to refine and further evolve the melee genre.
For the music behind Mordhau, we're collaborating with a team of three passionate composers: Viktor Alexander, Paul Keilhau and Lukas Gorris. Their music brings an element of grit and power to the already brutal setting.
Up until now, we have been operating without a budget, living off of our personal savings, and working part-time jobs. To be able to finish Mordhau in a reasonable amount of time and survive the costs that come with it, we decided to ask you, our backers, for help. The target goal we've set will let us release the game in time, but just barely. The more money we raise, the smoother the ride. This means more things we can include, and a better, more polished final product. Below we have compiled an estimate of how the $80,000 will be spent. Any additional money raised will go towards development.
  Backing at the Alpha level or above ($60+), will give you access to our Backer Alpha, which will begin around August 2017 and last until Beta. The alpha will be missing certain features & content, and the focus will be on testing the combat.
Backing at the Beta level or above ($40+) will give you access to our Backer Beta, which will begin around January 2018 and last until Release. The beta will be in a more polished state than the alpha, and be more or less feature-complete.
Backing at the Release level or above ($20+) will give you access to the game on release, which will be around March 2018. At release, the game will be feature-complete.
Exclusive Engraved Longsword Skin (Concept Art)
Exclusive Gilded Gloves
Exclusive Royal Helmet (variant without faceplate also included)
 All cosmetic items in-game (final assets):
Take a gander at the gold teeth below, along with the other cosmetics.
    We’ve been blessed by an active community that works tirelessly to help promote the game, as well as offer feedback and suggestions. We wouldn’t be here without them, and we love them to bits. Our community spans several social media websites, and we welcome you to join us on all of them. A game is nothing without its players.     
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/mordhaugame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/mordhaugame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/mordhaugame/
Official forums: https://mordhau.com/forum/
Official steam group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/mordhau
IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/mordhau
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Mordhau/
Mordhau has been the recipient of the IndieDB Editor’s Choice Best Upcoming game, and as if that wasn’t enough, we were voted #1 Best Upcoming game by the players as well!
  If you’d like to see what others are saying about Mordhau on Youtube, we’ve collected a playlist for you.
                                    More recent articles about Mordhau in various languages:

vandal.net
Unreal Engine 4 is a complete suite of game development tools made by game developers, for game developers. From 2D mobile games to console blockbusters, Unreal Engine 4 gives you everything you need to start, ship, grow and stand out from the crowd.
Revolutionary new workflow features and a deep toolset empower developers to quickly iterate on ideas and see immediate results, while complete C++ source code access brings the experience to a whole new level.
Unreal Engine technology powers hundreds of games as well as real-time 3D films, training simulations, visualizations and more. Over the past 15 years, thousands of individuals and teams and have built careers and companies around skills developed using the engine.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
With video games, delays are always a possibility. Since we do not aim to release the product in early access, this makes it even more challenging to deliver on time. However, we are committed to finish this game no matter what. We’ve been at it for a few years, the game is not in a concept or prototype stage, and the funds raised will allow us to accelerate development. We are both aware and cautious of feature creep at this point, and are realistic about what we can accomplish for release.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
What a ride! 
The day of Mordhau's release is finally here. Our target is to go live today April 29th @ 10 AM PDT. We will be launching with a base price of $29.99 (Steam currency/regional pricing applies!) and a 10% launch discount. Besides the base game, for those who really want to go the extra mile to support us, you'll also be able to purchase the Supporter Pack containing the soundtrack, Medallion (necklace) wearable cosmetic and Mercenary banner. Those who wish to purchase the Steam key to the game on our webshop, will be able to do so when the game is released, and a lot more money from those sales will go to the developers, as Steam won't take their cut.

Mordhau is releasing on Steam on April 29th 2019
Thank you for your support and making this project possible! Check out our brand new trailer below:

Attention all backers!
As we approach towards having everything ready for release, we need your help to do some stress testing and identifying any show-stopping issues. Starting on March 15th (Friday) at 5 PM CET (Central European Time), until (including) March 17th (Sunday), we will be running organized tests on the pre-release build, where you'll get a taste of what we've been working on.

updates.update_userinfo: Mordhau "coming soon" Steam store page is now live!
updates.update_content:
Mordhau's store page is now listed on Steam!
We've been hard at work wrapping things up for release the past several months, fixing any outstanding bugs and adding the necessary polish and content where needed. This work will continue leading up to release in Q2 2019, which we estimate we will hit somewhere in April (early if all goes to plan). A glance over the Steam page should give you a hint of what to expect on release, but I will elaborate a little more here. We'll be releasing with 3 new modes that we expect to be the main attraction.

updates.update_userinfo: Ongoing progress update: building, climbing & more
updates.update_content:
Work progresses on Mordhau, and we wanted to show off some of our newest additions and features to the game. Keep in mind that much of what you may see is in varying stages of completion, and these work-in-progress features may be changed during development.  
First off, we've been working on the back-end of our 64-player Frontline game mode. This involves optimizations to both our client and our server to ensure both can handle the increase in player count. Another thing that is crucial for us is the hectic feel of the battlefield itself, and one of the features that will help to add to the chaos and immersion of this mode is the Toolbox, which allows you to place dynamic fortifications around the map. Currently, you can choose between three different items: the archer barricade, stakes, and a miniaturized ballista. These can be placed nearly anywhere, but use up the toolbox's ammo, which you can replenish at a supply crate.

updates.update_userinfo: Quick heads-up regarding accessing your Mordhau key
updates.update_content: Just wanted to do a quick heads-up regarding keys. There's a bit of confusion right now due to people not receiving emails. If you have already linked your Kickstarter purchase to your Mordhau website account (many of you did a long time ago already), you will not receive any email as you don't need to do any further steps. Your key is waiting for you under My Purchases on your Mordhau website account. Sorry for the confusion!

Hi everyone! 
It's been a while, but today we've just released our fourth dev blog, the Road to Release. In this blog we showcase some of the improvements and additions made to MORDHAU in the past few months during closed alpha testing. Speaking of testing, things have taken a little longer than planned and while we've had to push full release to early 2019, we've decided to activate keys for Early Bird and Release-tier Kickstarter Backers, thus letting everyone that backed us into the current state of the game. Check your emails registered with Kickstarter for more information, and enjoy the video!

updates.update_userinfo: Delays, beta backer access to alpha & reward fulfilment
updates.update_content: Work continues on Mordhau and we're making good progress towards beta and release, but unfortunately we're not quite there yet. We do not intend to rush things, but since we promised early access to Beta backers by January, we are letting the Beta backers into the melee-focused Mordhau Alpha. If you are a beta backer, you will receive an email from us shortly with instructions on how to get your Steam key. Our actual Beta and Release dates will unfortunately have to shift a bit further into 2018 to make sure we can deliver content with an adequate attention to detail and polish. We will keep you updated on the matter!

It's here! The purpose of this Alpha is to ensure the stability of the game and its server infrastructure, as well as testing the functionality and synergies between all the game mechanics. Balancing is not a big concern to us at the moment and will be addressed once we have finalized our proficiency and perk system, which will follow in a future update, along with other features that we're currently holding back while they're being worked on. Please keep in mind that this is an early alpha version of the game, bugs and broken things are to be expected.

It's almost here folks, and yes, that's 2017, we're not delaying it by another year. We will unlock Steam keys tomorrow by the specified time, which will then appear in your forum account, and you'll then be able to activate them on Steam. If you haven't activated your purchase on our forums yet, go ahead and do that (we've sent out emails with the activation link some time ago!)   
We can't wait to have you guys get your hands on what we've been working on (and what you've been waiting) for so long. See you guys tomorrow!

The progress system in the game felt like something you would either encounter in a F2P game or in an early alpha build. And seeing how there was even a bug that randomly assigned you a level (I remember a person who started playing the game and, due to that, instantly reached 51).

campaign.story:
PRODUCT DESCRIPTION
The S-Holder is an innovative shirt holder, which will keep your shirt perfectly tucked in even when you move! It is made of comfortable and skin-friendly materials, which will make sure that the S-Holder and your body work as one. You will constantly look amazing and sharp, as every real Gentlemen should!
  S-Holders will make your shirt perfectly tucked, even though you move!
  Beige S-Holder set
   Perfectly tucked
IMPROVEMENTS
After a great Kickstarter success last year with the T-Holder, we have asked our beloved backers for feedback. The majority of them were extremely positive, saying how T-Holders improved their lives and that they basically cannot live without it anymore. However, we were even happier to receive some suggestions for improvements. Based on these, we have developed the S-Holder with these main improvements:
Adjustable side straps: which will work perfectly with any length of shirt
Adjustable side straps for different lengths of shirt
  PLAY

 New clips
New clips
  New clips
 New colors: Gentlemen black, classy beige and navy blue
New colours: Gentlemen black, navy blue and classy beige
  Black, blue and beige!
REWARD SYSTEM 
Reward system
    SHIPPING PLAN
The one thing you really do not need to worry about is shipping. It will be totally free, thanks to our business partners. The package will be delivered to your home safely in just a few days. When the campaign is over, you will receive a survey in which you will provide us your delivery address, thigh measurement and the colour of your brand new S-Holder.
Shipping plan
HOW TO MAKE THE THIGH MEASUREMENT CORRECTLY
Our mission is to make high quality, custom made products. In case the S-Holder Kickstarter campaign is funded, we will ask you for your thigh measurement on the thickest part, that we can create an unique product for you! How to do it:
1. Take flexible measuring tape and wrap it around your thigh on the thickest part, as it is shown in the video below.
2. Remember that measurement, because you will have to provide it to use in the Survey, if we are funded.
PLAY

                               COMMUNITY 
We have already welcomed more than 5000 Gentlemen in our T-Holder family. Positive feedback and customer are number one in our priority list. We are so proud that we have received a bunch of them in those months:
Satisfied customers
TEAM
The team who has brought the S-Holders alive:
Nik Vene - Founder and CEO
Nik
Team of dressmakers, lovely ladies who are making sure that S-holders of the best quality become a part of your everyday life.
Luka Karlin, Rok Podgorelec, Vid Šubic – Movie makers
Eva Ožbot, Maja Rigler – Graphic designers
Eva and Maja
 Anže Vene, Klemen Maček, Andres Monroy – Models
  Klemen, Anže and Andres
Joe Rayner - English proofreader
Niko Klanšek - Business advisor
Niko and Joe
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Last year we presented our first successful campaign on Kickstarter. We were really well prepared and every thing went according to plan, making our customers extremely happy. Now, we are even more prepared, since we are familiar with the whole procedure of Kickstarter. In addition, as you know, we have an amazing customer service offering, which will take every single problem into consideration and will try to find a solution.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear NV family,
Our new Kickstarter campaign is live!
Get your brand new W-Holder -> http://kck.st/2rjZiSM
Your help with bringing this product to live would be more than appreciated!

Dear NV family, 
 We'd like to notify you that our W-Holder Kickstarter campaign goes live in 12 hours!! And you are the only ones who know the official time - It is our pleasure to give you the opportunity to get super early birds! 
 UNITED STATES - 4th of May (Today)

updates.update_userinfo: Founder's message + W-Holder KS campaign preview
updates.update_content:
Dear NV family,
It's Nik here, founder of NV Holders. I have decided to write you a personal email, in which I'd like to let you know, how much do you mean to us. 
 I have started my business 3 years ago, 19 y.o. student, from nothing. I applied to Faculty of Economics here in Slovenia, with a great desire to create something from myself. In my opinion shirt is "a must" in a business world, so I started wearing formal clothes - but there was a big problem! Every time I moved, stretched or sat, my shirt came undone and it was pissing me off! I went to the local textile shop, bought materials and started creating the first T-Holder.

updates.update_userinfo: W-Holder - A perfect gift for a special lady in your life - will be launched in 10 days!
updates.update_content:
Dear NV Holders family,
We are so excited to announce you, that our brand new product will be launched in 10 days (5th of May)!!
As we really appreciate you as customers, who have helped us create that business, we decided that only you will be notified about the official hour of launch - So you'd be able to get super early birds, which will be extremely discounted!

updates.update_userinfo: W-Holder, the first shirt holder for women in the history, will be live on Kickstarter on Saturday, 5th of May, 2018!
updates.update_content:
Dear NV Holders family,
Firstly we hope that you are doing well!
 It is a big pleasure for us to announce our W-Holder (women edition) Kickstarter campaign! After 7 month of development, the product is finally ready to be presented to the world.

Dear Ladies and Gents, 
 As you know, we have been developing women edition of the S-Holder since October 2017. It is a big pleasure to say, that the product is almost finished - There are still some details to improve, but we are on the right path. 
 Our mission is to gather all the fans and customers on one place. That is why we have created an official Facebook event Launch of the W-Holder!

updates.update_userinfo: W-Holder (women edition) coming on Kickstarter in 2018!
updates.update_content:
Dear Ladies and Gents,
We wish you happy 2018, full of love, happiness and success. 
As you know, we have been developing women edition of the S-Holder, called W-Holder, for more than 6 months already and there is still a lot of space for improvements. However, we are glad to present you one of the final prototypes:

updates.update_userinfo: BLACK FRIDAY DISCOUNTS AND LIMITED RED/BLACK EDITION ARE LIVE!
updates.update_content:
Dear Gents,
It is such a pleasure to announce that we have launched our Black Friday -30% off sales!
Addtiionally, our brand new creation - S-Holder red/black - is live on our web store as well!

updates.update_userinfo: S-Holder limited red and black edition - live on Black Friday!
updates.update_content:
Dear Gents,
It is a big honor for us to present you our latest creation - S-Holder red/black edition!

Dear Gents,
We sincereley hope that you are doing well! Thank you again for your help - it has helped us grow a lot in the last few months!
It is a pleasure to say, that we have sent all the products out! We deeply hope that your brand new S-Holders work perfectly and that your shirt stays perfectly tucked!

campaign.story:
Board Game Brawl
 Unfiltered Gamer
    The Rise of Mafia is the first of its' kind tabletop game based on real life mafia from 1930s' with only one goal...to become a Don!  
Each player has to defend his honour and if that means killing his co-player, so be it! Investing in lucrative businesses, buying luxury residences, extorting a mayor of New York, hiding from police or maybe bribing them, that’s just a few necessary actions you have to do to become a Don! 191 cards offer you limitless possibilities of action so the game does not repeat it self.
About the game:
191 unique cards
For 4 - 8 players (it can be also 2-10)
Play time: 1 - 3h (depends on arguing)
Easy and fast to learn
Based on real events
It can be played on small table
Dice throwing battles
  Each player gets random character card and three god cards. Good cards must not be shown to other players.
Every turn, you draw a card form a deck and take $1,000 as initial profit. Others do the same.
When you have enough money, you can invest in business or residence...
...or you can just gamble!
When you draw a card, you never know what card you could get!
When you receive a bad card you have to read it out loud.
To finish the game and become a Don you have to place five businesses and two residences.
Few examples of events:
You can control arms deals and also murders during mafia wars
You can merge with other players in business investments and you can finish the game faster
Offer racket protection to other players
Your construction company helped build Empire State Building, needless to say, how many bodies is underneath in the concrete
You can buy seized arms and alcohol from police at a reduced price and profit from sales
Arrange a meeting of the mafia bosses and as a team you can pick one player who will have to defend his property
Prevent the player to play his move
Measuring your strength with arm wrestling  
Dice throwing in casino and winning or losing money  
Betting on horse racing  
Murdering your co-players (you should see their faces)  
Sending police on to other players and much much more!!  
Still, you can play the game however you choose to play it and make it your own. Think rationally, make big moves and nothing can stop you. Or can it?
*Click on image to see rulebook
         The main goal of the game is to place down at least two residences and five businesses in order to finish the game and become a Don! 
Invest money in 70 unique lucrative businesses and accumulate financial assets
Buy residences and use them as safe hideout in case of mafia wars
Bad cards force you to pay ransoms, extortions, road blocks or they stop you form playing for a few turns. Bad cards have different shiny backgrounds so your co-players will not be able to hide them from you. But you can eliminate bad cards with the help of ...
... Good cards! You get three in the beginning of the game. They will spare you from prison incarceration, cancel restrictions or extortions from other players. But, always hide your good cards! This way you will have an ace in your sleeve
There are also an Event cards. When this card is drawn it affects everyone in a bad way! Those players that built their empire wisely could be protected from event cards
*please choose an opponent your own size and strength
  REWARDS 
    *rulebook not shown in the picture
    *rulebook not shown in the picture
    the game + wallpapers(JPG.) + custom cards; rule book not shown in the picture
    *box made from FSC European oak; rule book not shown in the picture
    *both versions of the game; rule book not shown in the picture
    *wooden box + wallpapers(JPG.) + custom cards; rule book not shown in the picture
    *if we reach extended goals, we will add more interesting goals
     A year and a half of hard work was invested in functionality, simplicity and logics of the game. On the way we had a lot of support and help by our friends. Big thanks to Ivana Geljić, Eva Mesarič, Matej Dimic, Maruša Šebenik, Žan Nemanič, Denis Mandić, Aleksander Mijatović.
                   This will allow us to make this project real! We really love our game and we would like to see our game on your desks at home, having as much fun as we did playing it. 
The Kickstarter success will be a huge testament to our project empowering us to continue bringing you, backers, more top of the line products that we have in our minds already. 
Your opinions and feedbacks are more than welcome. Since we are all one big community we can basically work together. We are not here just for the money, but it greatly helps. 
With exceeding the goal you will be getting more for your money. Not to mention that we made the prices as low as possible for you to get what you want with minimum sacrifice.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are highly ambitious couple with great deal of experience in doing business in different fields. Until now we have encountered many drawbacks but we managed to cope with them all successfully with positive outcome.

During the past year and half, we built several prototypes of the The Rise of Mafia game in collaboration with our suppliers and made a special bond with them. They are basically just waiting for our order and quantities. From the box, to cards and dices, everything is on stand by. The longest process is the preparation for printing, mixing colours, and packaging itself.

We don't expect to encounter any problems because we managed to coordinate with and between suppliers and they all are driven by the code of Omertà!

The only extremely nice problem would be if we would get sooo much backers to back us up. But even in that case we contacted other possible suppliers and they were more than happy to offer us their services in addition to our primary suppliers. 

That being said, we are committed to deliver the best product at the fastest timing possible and we commit ourself to update you backers about everything. We are more then glad to do so and we will not go by the meaning of Cosa Nostra.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
It has been almost 30 days since we have launched our project here. In less than a month we have learned a lot and now we can see what went wrong. We heard from some of you what we should change and what should be done differently. We even got couple of business offers that we took in consideration.
With all that information to think about we are planning to take a month to rethink everything and evaluate what should we do. Should we sell rights for our game or should we try on Kickstarter in the near future once again. We will be glad if you, backers, would send us your opinion/thoughts on info@theriseofmafia.com or our Facebook/IG page and tell us what do you think we should do. Your recommendations about changes in our game and campaign are welcome!We would really appreciate that! Maybe we decide to return on Kickstarter. 
THANK YOU!!

Dear fellow wise guys,
We are fighting this fight together for 20 days. We've got 9 more days to go! We are grateful for your support so far and we need your help! Lets make this campaign successful!
Share our project, tell all your friends about it and back our game!

campaign.story:
★★★The Easy Life Belt is made of very durable military cotton webbing, minimal shaped metal buckle, stylish leather label, secret strong magnet which allows the end of the belt is not swinging and finally for this belt specially developed durable elastic which is main part of this product. This part in front of the belt is flexible at exactly determined area which means that it is gently stretched at each body move (e.g. at seating, folding, sheltering, …). That’s why the belt is breathing together with you and your body in all your activities!
HOW IT WORKS!
    How do you measure your waist?
Making Sure you are NOT wearing a belt while doing this, put a measuring tape through your pant/skirt loops and wrap it around your waist. Because you don’t want your new belt to interfere with your breath, inhale deeply and then measure your girth. Where the tape end meets the rest of the band, you will read your bodily circumference. That will be the size you need to provide when ordering your new belt.
                          Thinner BUSINESS LINE!
                               OUR STORY
Behind the name GIPSY AND CLOWN stands I Jaka, one of the last qualified tailors in Europe and my girl Janja. Janja is fashion designer and she just adores sewing and designing of the clothes. 
I started my education in early age and i earned my first snowboard and motocross bike when i was only seven years old in a home workshop, where i energetically drew knowledge.
We are very well educated textile designers, lovers of extreme sports, nature and animals. In free time we also love to paint and create music.
Our first campaign was great school and we learned a lot! Easy Life Belt was choosen to be one of this year ISPO MUNICH finnalists!! And also that give us a power and strength to create even better, more stylish and  more useful - Easy Life Belt MAGNETIC!! For all of you!! And this time also for your children!!
Hidden strong magnet prevents the end of the belt from swinging and you can also attach it to any metal!
  Idea about Easy Life Belt was born when i had enough feeling that classic belt limited me in my work and sport activities. Than we found out that people sit more and more each day - some of us even 14 hours a day. Based on this finding we immediately started to work. After a number of trials we created unique Gipsy and Clown belt – Easy Life Belt MAGNETIC!
This belt is the only belt in the world, which has inserted the elastic part. The elastic part is located at the front of the belt, because in that part of the body the physical workload is the biggest. I found manufacturer of high quality military cotton webbing and experts who helped me to develop unique durable elastic part of the belt (which was developed for this belt only).
I and my friends tested this belt for more than one year. They were all impressed about it and they would not replace it any more for the ordinary belt. When the belt received first positive feedback and fans, it was time for a design. The belt is designed with a lot of sense and love for street wear. 
EASY LIFE BELT MAGNETIC breathes with the user. The belt has positive effect on a daily life, user´s feelings and emotions. You can use it during work, sport or any other free activity you like!
    SUPPORT us and become a part of our STORY!  
You will get the first belt that breathes with you! Try Easy Life Belt MAGNETIC and you'll see. You'll never replace it anymore. Breathe with us!
    SPECIAL THANKS!
VIDEO : KREATIVINE - MARKO PIRC
LOVRO
FOTO : TILEN
SOUND : GREGA SVABIC 
ACTORS: GIPSY AND CLOWN 
★★★THANKS FOR SHARING★★★

Risks and challenges
We were first time presenting ourselves and our product on Kickstarter last year. And everything went just great! We will stay in close touch with you the whole campaign and the whole time of production and delivery!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello dear backers, 
We would like to inform you that we are just in a process of developing our new website. Soon we will launch gipsy★clown webshop, where it will be possible to order hoodies, unique jeans pants and some other products, created in our workshop.

Hey guys!!
*The ones who are satisfied and happy with our product are prof that our intention was good, and those few of you who still didn't get your belt we are really truly sorry.. some of the belts we send for two, three times, and still come back to us.. and this also isn't ok for us you know.
Months ago we asked a post service to research for us all lost and two time retuned packages.. we want to know what went wrong, so all of us we'll get a refund and see what wasn't ok.

Hey OUR guys!!
At first we are really truly sorry that we let some of you wait with answers. 
All belts was send one month ago.. Most of you already have them and some of you still don't received them.. post service said that sometimes package need also up to three weeks to arrive.. so we really hope all of you who still don't have them will get them soon! :)

We hope you are great! 
In this update we want to tell you that we are more than a half with shipping your belts :D 
Every day we are packing and shipping your belts! In these week we send more than 500 of them.. some already have them and thank you so much for your great comments! We really appreciate it!

campaign.story:
MyPocketMaster is the best single-piece multi-tool with more practical features than traditional tools while still being able to fit comfortably in your pocket. One of the smallest everyday carry tools combines several tools in one.
There are so many types of multi-tools on the market. But not everything is for everyone. There may be no single multi-tool that’s perfect for everyone, but there should be one that’s almost perfect for anyone’s particular situation. Everyone has an occasional need to cut a line, tighten a screw or open a box. That’s why MyPocketMaster is perfect for every day carry. Just have it on your keychain and you are ready to go. No extra bulk in your pants ;)
Our focus for MyPocketMaster multitool was to create a tool that is cool, small, strong and most importantly functional. We focused on the importance of everyday usage. MyPocketMaster design incorporates everyday habits and tools that we use on a daily basis.
"You can do what with MyPocketMaster? That is clever." That is the usual response that we get when we show MyPocketMaster. You probably don’t even think that you can have a tool with so many functionalities. We will show you how you can use MyPocketMaster and test it yourself! Have it on a keychain to be available for use. It’s simple, small and highly functional master for your pocket, it’s MyPocketMaster.
Material: To deliver a long lasting experience, we decided to use Grade 5 Titanium. It has highest strength-to-weight ratio of any metal, outstanding corrosion resistance and it is lightweight. Titanium is perfect material due to its durability, its resistance to seawater and chlorine in swimming pools and as it is non-toxic. The fact that titanium is so strong, light and non-toxic it makes perfect metal of choice for our MyPocketMaster production. 
Thickness: 2mm/0,08 inch              Weight: 4 gr/0.1286028 oz
MyPocketMaster is small but functional
MyPocketMaster is simple and highly functional tool that will change the way you do things every day! With its combinations of functionalities it's going to excite you and make your everyday tasks easier. Take a look below to see all the features and functions that MyPocketMaster offers!
Check out the tips how to use MyPocketMaster, incorporated in everyday life.
Useful tips how to use MyPocketMaster
We care about the safety of our MyPocketMaster users. Our brushing process allowed us to create a blade that is safe to touch. The semi-sharp blade is sharp enough to cut through a paper but not your skin! So really any one can use it!
1. Lightweight – titanium is lighter than steel  
2. Strong – titanium has a highest strength-to-density ratio of any metallic element. Titanium has strength and hardness comparable to carbon steel.  
3. Durable – titanium is one of the most durable metals on the planet, which is why it’s used in aerospace and military  
4. Multi functional – functional tool that can help get you out of a jam  
5. Small – small as a coin, ideal for your keychain  
6. Pocket friendly – perfect for everyday carry in your pocket  
7. Excellent corrosion resistance - titanium is more resistant than any other metal.Titanium is highly resistant to most types of corrosion. It will hold for years without succumbing to the effects of rust and corrosion.
8. Non-toxicity - titanium is used as a material for surgical implants and dental plates attesting to the non-toxicity of titanium. Also titanium can be used within the human body due to its bio-inert qualities.  
9. Safe to touch - semi-sharp blade is sharp enough to cut through a paper but not your skin  
10. It’s master for your pocket - MyPocketMaster
See the variety of rewards we offer below and let us know if you have any question or special request. 
Our campaign starts in December. Hopefully it will finish successfully funded in January. In that case we will start the production in January/beginning of February. As our suppliers are on standby we hope to start the first shipments end of February/beginning of March.
Thank you for taking the time to learn about our project MyPocketMaster and we sincerely can’t thank you enough for the supporting our dream. THANK YOU!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are more than capable of delivering MyPocketMaster to the market. Although we don't foresee any major problems, we understand that there is always a chance of small delays. We have lowered the risk of failure by making MyPocketMaster production process as simple as possible. Our business partners are fully informed about the launch of MyPocketMaster and are waiting for the first production orders. The only thing remaining is waiting for your support to help us to meet the goal that we require to bring MyPocketaster to life. Rest assured we'll be updating all backers frequently on our progress.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Backpack is considered as sport equipment - isn’t it? But if you think carefully you realize that the main purpose of a backpack was only to carry sport equipment. Until now. From this day on we can say that we reinvented the backpack.
Atlexa backpack is intelligently designed to bring sport in your everyday life. Having Atlexa backpack, your personalized trainer with you, will improve the quality of your sport activities and will help you to design yourself. You can use it anywhere, whether you are hiking, running, cycling, rock climbing, kayaking, indoor or outdoor training or just walking. Atlexa backpack will never let you down. 
Atlexa backpack is designed to improve you physical shape and as such, it can be also used as stand-alone workout equipment. It’s specific features allow you to enrich your workout anywhere and anytime you decide to take a moment to work on your muscle groups.
  Our favorite feature of Atlexa backpack is its versatility and innovative touches to its components.
         Atlexa backpack is designed to fit all your needs, no matter what type of physical activity you engage in or how much sport active have you been so far.
        Push-up Exercise: A modified body weight exercise with Atlexa for your chest and triceps. The starting position is facing down with weight distributed on the hands and feet. Lower your body until your chest nears the floor and then push back to the starting position. Now repeat this as many time as you can. While doing so don't forget to breathe in on the way down and breathe out as you come back up.
Whole body workout: Make sure your knees do not push out in front of your toes. Keep your torso tight and back straight.
Leg and Glute workout: Do you want your glutes to be firm and round? Just follow these rules with Atlexa: start with 2 sets of 10 repetitions, but if you are more experienced, hold the end position for 10 seconds and do 2 sets of 10 to 15 repetitions.
Upper back workout: Pull your elbows back as far as you can. Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the point of peak contraction. Hold the end position for 2 seconds and slowly return (3 seconds) to the starting position. Do 5 sets of 10 repetitions.  
Push-up Exercise: The starting position is facing down with weight distributed on the hands and feet. Lower your body until your chest nears the floor and then return up to the starting position. Now repeat this as many time as you can.
Shoulder and Core workout: Extend your hand above your head and do a mild twist in your torso. Breathe out whilst extending your arm and breathe in when you return to the starting position. Do 3 sets of 10-15 repetitions and don't forget to keep your core tight... You will definitely feel it.
We are working with a number of professors of Physical Education, fitness instructors, CrossFit trainers and sport enthusiasts to develop special workout techniques to complement your other physical activities. This means that Atlexa is also standalone workout equipment that easily subtitles many other workout devices at once. Stay tuned for more news about this as we’ll start rolling out some more video tutorials and how-to’s for the most efficient Atlexa workouts in the following weeks. We will launch new video every two weeks – so, you will never run out of new ideas how to use Atlexa backpack.
              This is our first stretch goal that we will be able to develop and add to the final design after we reach a goal of $150,000.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We currently don't expect any unplanned risks since all phases of our project have been thoroughly checked, tested and verified.

Our main challenge is moving from prototyping to the mass production scale which is the main goal of this campaign. Most of the other expenses have already been accounted for and fully covered by our own investments and savings but this last step is way too demanding to take on on our own. All of the funds raised by this campaign will be going directly towards covering production costs and other business development plans.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Oto is your personal handheld (& handmade) massager. Well...he can get personal with your best friend too. Oto just loves returning favours. Who wouldn´t like a stimulating morning massage after all? And a relaxing one after your evening run. Need to boost up your blood flow during your long office hours? Let Oto give you a hand. And remember. He can be gentle or a little rough. Like a true shagger.
        It was somewhere in July 2015 when my honeybunny Inja & I had enough. Enough of overcrowded spaces that felt empty. Enough of pointless tasks for people that knew the price of everything and the value of nothing. Inja is an actress & a model..her lifestyle was not a simple rutine : sit, make-up, photoshoot, act, sleep..sit, make-up, photoshoot, act, sleep.. What we strongly felt in common was the amount of useless energy spent sitting. Doing nothing useful in particular. Not for ourselves, not for others. Endless phone calls, sitting in the car, sitting in your office...and in the evening, sitting in our sofa, doing nothing - exausted by life´s strange and meaningless cycles.
 So...we decided the Croatian coastline was the answer. To break this monotonous circle of life that had absolutely nothing to do with hakuna matata. We sat in our red volkswagen (yup - sat again) and just drove. Destination...sea. Heavy rain did not stop us. Every drop shattered on our front glass was a silent scream for freedom. It felt a little irresponsible because my job demanded full focus...but so did Inja´s eyes. So did MY life. OUR life. We used to live like bunnies. Jump around, make love, make friends, party, make love, eat a little, jump a little & make some new friends...embracing all of life´s little-big secrets. Sharing all our shameless passions. Being crazy in a good way.
  Somewhere near Dubrovnik (´The Good city´), like an hour away from our life changing fairy ride to eternal sunshine, seagulls and fried calamari, our red volkswagen got thirsty. Inja did her usual catwalk to the toilets, said something about her swollen feet, but I didn´t particulary took notice because I was really exausted from all the ´sit & drive´ thing also. Gladly the six hour drive went by without some stupid, little, meaningless fight about whether an albatros could, or could not circle our mother earth in one flight. Why would he?.. It was then I noticed some crazy looking guy talking to Inja - so I hopped into that direction. I´m not a particulary jealous bunny. The guy was ´polar bear´ huge, around sixty-ish, short white hair, sun wrinkles everywhere...but immediatly after I came into his shadow, fearlessly tried to look boldly into his eyes, searching for intentions, my mind made a subconscious decision - the guy was OK. His sparkling sky eyes weren´t there to seduce, to infiltrate fear...he was the nicest ´Man bear´ I´ve ever met. It seemed like they were into some small talk rubbish but it turned out he just wanted to help.
 He likes to drink coffee when the sun is high he said. He likes seagulls singing and crickets in the back. And roaring thunders from the south. He likes flies tickling his fingers...reminding him of moments passing. But he doesn´t like young people passing by. Rushing. Exausted. Swollen. Then he gave us this funny looking massage tool. Handheld, handmade. We wanted to pay for his coffee at least. He politely declined. Gently smilin´ in between.
And he said: ˝This is not a miracle object...You are...Your body is. The tool will remind you of that. That You are Energy that needs to be awakened!˝ ...he smiled in between.
So...I wanted to share what the old man told Inja and me. That we could all be bunnies again. Hopping lively into life´s ending meadows. Smilin´ in between. The old man´s name was OTO.
Nace & Inja - founders of OTO the Massage Shagger
           I improved on the old man´s recipe. I´m a pretty pretty thing...& the most minimalistic, eco-friendly, handheld massager ever. You´ll shagg me once... and we´ll be lovers forever honey ;)...
  RELAXING:  Hug me smoothly before you rest. Don´t over work your bunny body...close your eyes & let me do teh rest.
STIMULATING:  I can turn you on in no time. Bunnies do it smooth & quick. Anytime, anywhere ;)
-CELLULITE:  I´m no miracle bunny. You are. Your life is. But we can heat & hide your winter pelt...before summer shines on your fluffy belt.
+LYMPH:  If you know where´s your soul...you´ll know where to go. Massaging smoothly towards your heart - is the right & healthy flow.
SOCIALLY ENGAGING:  It´s all about returning the favour. Isn´t it? Happy, happy world anyone?
FUN TO USE:  I´m no dull & boring bunny. I hop around & make this world bunny funny.
BATTERY FREE:  Most of them go BRRRRR...I don´t make robo-farting sounds. Cos´silence is the most beatiful sound sometimes.
+BLOOD CIRCULATION:  Can do!...Massaging your beloved self makes your oxygen go nuts. Hop, hop, hop like a happy bunny-blood cell...;)
ANTI-STRESS:  You should know by now...that the one thing you want less - is life with too much stress. Because bunnies only live once.
HANDMADE:  Fit for a hand. Made by hand. Because hands know best what fits nicely into their palms. Don´t they? ;)
                         Thanks giving is the perfect day for giving me...or I can always hop under your Christmas tree...and let your friends have the coolest birthday yet to see...
Your perfect gift...Oto the Massage Shagger
 And by giving Oto to someone you care...you both earn an exclusive discount on your Shaggers! Just check our pledge sheme for further details ;)...
          Here is a video where we show a bit more of what OTO can do. Leave a comment if you want us to adress your health problem. More professional material like this will come with OTO APP.

updates.update_content:
Dear friends!
First i hope you are all safe and sound. 
I know that you too are aware that choosing healthy and sustainable products is not a luxury. It's a necessity. But it's rare to find brands that provide both aspects... and are actually trustworthy.

Hello Dear Everyone.
I would like to share a few words with you and give you a little update. I will not name it but we all know what is happening. These are not easy times yet every time we are faced with a challenge it helps to look at is as a blessing and an opportunity for growth.
Fear is what separates us and fear is what lowers our vibration. It is for that reason that older people are more affected by the virus and children as otherwise vulnerable beings are more resistant. It simply gets down to how much love we vibrate with and this brings us to acceptance and control. The more we learn how to accept things around us as they come, the more we grow and the more we glow, the easier life gets for us. Acting from a place of heart is what we need as a collective now more then ever.

updates.update_userinfo: Link to App in Google PlayStore + discount code
updates.update_content:
Dear Hunniez, Dear Bunniez, Drage Zajčice, Dragi Zajčki
We are happy to let you know we have Finally moved forward with our project and released the first version of the Otobody App. It's been quite a while since we’ve been in touch and it's also been quite a ride for us, lots of ups, downs, and ups again, but this is life and it would be pretty boring if all was paved with flowers. With this, we kindly thank you for your patience and hope that our Oto brought some fun and sparks into your life.

So what’s new? Oto has been upgraded to universal stiffness with slightly longer loops. Quality has been drastically improved and it's now really almost indestructible :). It is still a family-owned business and production is still in Slovenia. We kept the sales running in two little gift stores, sold a few bunnies online but mainly had hands occupied with other things.

campaign.story:
If you want to… 
- Make your entire home and appliances smart, connected and automated… 
- Connect your appliances the way you want, without any ridiculous restrictions (yes, you can tell your coffee machine to make you a coffee every time you flush the toilet, why not)… 
- Control every part of your home, even if you’re hundreds (or even thousands) of miles away… 
- Make significant savings on your electric or gas bill (by not letting your appliances be ON and waste energy when there is no need)... 
- Control everything from your iOS, Android, Windows, or any other device… 
- Have a secured smart home system that can’t be hacked (you’re protected with advanced 2-step encryption system)  

- Be simple to use (so that even your mom could set up everything on her own)...  
Then this is the Kickstarter project that you need to check out closely and, hopefully, back it up.
Here’s why…  
So far, every smart home solution on the market requires from you to have a smart device (appliance). In other words, if you want to make your home smart and automated, you’d need to buy a bunch of new devices, even if your old ones work just fine.
Up until now. 
Introducing…  
AHIS - Automated Home Information System That Allows You to Make Your Entire Home Smart, Automated and Connected, in Just 4 Hours, Without Tech Skills and Even if You Have Old, “Dumb” Appliances 
To put it in other words, you plug and/or connect all your devices with AHIS, choose what type of device they are (are they sensor, input or output devices) and you’re all set. 
Yup, that’s the whole process. It’s so simple that even your kid (or your mom) could do it. 
There’s a joke here in our team when some client asks if some training is needed: We ask them do they know how to drill a hole in a wall. If they say YES, we say
 “Great, you’ve got a certificate.” Then we ask them do they know how to hang things on the wall so they don’t fall off. If YES, then they got Advanced User Certificate. And the final question: do you know how to click buttons on a cell phone or on the computer. If YES, then they’re Official AHIS Implementation Coach. 
Don’t believe me? Check out this short video for live demonstration:
Told you it’s easy. (What do you think about the idea at 2:09? Crazy, right?)  
Now, if you’re anything like me, you probably asking “how is this even possible?”. Here’s how  
Basically, any device on Earth can be classified into 4 main categories (based on their signals). You have:  
Input sensors (for example, a thermostat, thermometer, light sensor, etc.) 
On/off devices (light switch, etc.) 
AC and DC devices (no, not comic books. Things like dimmers and everything that need smart and precise regulation) 
When you connect those devices to AHIS our advanced technology inside AHIS (no, we won’t tell you how it works) knows what type of signals is going to get, and what type of signals is going to send. And it preloads your control device (your phone, PC, whatever) with options and settings that you can use. 
After that, you control your devices the way you want, from wherever you want, without any restrictions. 
Here’s a quick tutorial on how easy it is for you to learn to use AHIS system in just 2 minutes:
Did you notice the “Offset” option at 0:36? Here’s what it does…  
With “traditional” home automation solutions, you define the target value (let’s say it’s a temperature, but this applies to everything else).  
In standard IT solutions (that weren’t developed by automation engineers) this is how “automation” works:  
Let’s say that you want a temperature in your room to be 25C. When the temperature reaches that number, the heating is off. Once it’s slightly below, it will turn on again.  
This constant on and off will eventually damage your system. That’s where “Offset” comes into play.  
With offset, it’s like you tell your system: “Look, I want my temperature to be 25C. But don’t turn on immediately when it’s 24,9C. Wait a little, give it some time, and turn it on. And once it’s 25C, don’t turn it off immediately. Wait a little, and then turn it off.”  
This will allow your heating system to work properly much longer, and it will spend less energy, which means more money saved in your pocket.
Check out the video below to see AHIS in usage:
And check out this video to see some… well… more creative use of AHIS system:  
 “OK, and what about security? I don’t want someone to mess with my home.”
Sure, security is one of the things that pay most attention on, especially because we’re using cloud servers to enable to control your home from anywhere in the world.  
That’s why we partnered with Microsoft (yup, THE Microsoft), and they recognized our work and our efforts and now we are part of their Microsoft BizSpark Global Startup Program.  
That practically means that we are using the latest cloud technology from Microsoft, just to make sure that you have the highest level of security. In addition to online security, we also improved the offline security. 
Entire offline communication of your devices is protected with multi-layer 128-bit encryption. 
If you’re not a tech person, this is super-secured. And that’s not all.  
We know that the biggest threat is not hackers. It’s not your smart neighbor punk who want’s to prank you.  
No, the biggest threat comes from your own house!  
That threat has the power to take over the control of every device, and probably make permanent (or at least expensive) damage.  
Yes, ofcourse I’m talking about your kids.  
That’s why AHIS has a special “child protection” security level, so that you can give your kids your phone, without any fear that they’ll make your living room a living hell.
“And what if I want to automate my house, my lake house, my office and my boat? Do I need to buy more phones to control them all?”  
Absolutely not. We got you covered.  
AHIS comes with multi-account support, which means you can control multiple devices from just one device.
Also, we support a lot of devices:
If you’re a techie and you need tech specs:
 To make it simple, here are the main features and benefits of AHIS:
And this is just the beginning…  
In the following months, we plan to significantly improve AHIS.  
First, we plan to make it look beautiful (yes, we know it’s ugly, but we’re engineers). You won’t need to hide AHIS behind the flowers. Instead, AHIS will be a nice visual addition to your home.  
That’s why we plan to use part of the money you help us collect to hire a professional industrial design firm in Italy, to help us make AHIS beautiful.  
Next, we plan to add support for Z-Wave standard, and also a support for IP cameras.  
And we plan to add advanced monitoring and tracking of home conditions and select values using fuzzy logic and human behavior. In other words, we’ll make AHIS super-smart. (We’re actually using latest researches from MIT and other top institutions, to include them in AHIS.)
It’s also important to say that every future update to AHIS software will be completely FREE.  
There are a lot of things that we want to add to AHIS, and this is where we come to the point where we need your help.  
If you’d like to help us improve AHIS and put it in mass production, and at the same time secure your device at manufacturing price (pledges of $60+) click the link below, and pledge the amount you think it’s appropriate (so far, the average pledge is $145).
Here’s the reward list:  
And here’s our planned timeline:
 Interested to help the future of smart homes and home automatization, and secure AHIS before others and much, much lower price?  
Click the link below, and choose your reward.  
Who am I? 

My name is Milan, creator of AHIS system and owner of a green energy, HVAC and home automation company. 
I have McS in Industrial Automation, and I’m currently working on my PhD thesis on Industrial Automation. 
Why am I telling you all this? 
So you could see that I’m not just a hobbyist and enthusiast, but also an experienced engineer who know what he’s doing. 
My first serious work in IoT (internet of things) field was in 2006., back when term IoT wasn’t even invented. 
In my McS thesis, I designed an entire system of remote control and monitoring of the heating system, via GSM terminal. That thesis was awarded as the best thesis in my class. 
After that, I’ve spent a year working at the Faculty of Electronic Engineering, and after I left I started my company, where we design, project and implement the HVAC and smart house systems for hotels, residential buildings, farms, etc. 
And after some specific requests made by one of our clients, we created what will later become AHIS. 
After that project for a client, we realized that our solution can be used for much cooler and greater things. 
And that’s why I decided to gather 26 experts in their fields, and to start develop a device now know as AHIS. 
Here’s how AHIS was developed in the last year: 
Thank you for your time. Hope you like what you see here, and that you’ll help us take AHIS to the next level. Click the link below and choose your pledge. (And send the link to this project to a friend who loves this type of things.)  
Why Do We Need Your Help?
AHIS needs your support!  
Everyone should be able to own a smart home. It's a simple idea, but we believe it can impact the world in a big way. 
Help us to take the next step in that mission: We have a tested, working prototype - AHIS needs a mass production now, and your help on that way. 
So, what do you think? Need a smart home? Like AHIS? 
Support us - all it takes right now is a pledge on Kickstarter. 
And please spread the word!  
Follow AHIS on Social Media:
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
AHIS is a unique product, innovative, life-changing. AHIS was built on mounds of technical knowledge and expertise. Every one of the nine creators has more than ten years of experience in air conditioning design and automation of large facilities by using green energy and PLC (industrial controllers). The entire project is run by a group of 26 enthusiasts who cover all segments of the market presentation and placement. All of us have invested a tremendous amount of work and effort into bringing AHIS to life, creating what we believe is currently the best smart home system on the market. We have a tested, working prototype - AHIS needs a mass production now and risks are minimal. Most of the technology we use is known and well used in other products. Technically there will be obstacles, but we are ready and experienced enough to tackle them as we go.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
While computers, mobile phones, cars and even the way we drink coffee is changing with rapid pace, cooking has even made a few steps back in the past few centuries.
We’ve forgotten how to use the cookware made by our great grandfathers and we’ve forgotten many recipes and methods taught by our great grandmothers.  
We strongly believe that cooking, now more than ever, should be easier, funnier and the food we make tastier.  
At IRONATE, we want to bring back what our ancestors already knew about cooking for generations and improve it with modern materials and manufacturing techniques. 
We want to Reinvent cooking. Join the revolution!
 Let me tell you a secret. This pizza wasn't made in a wood fired brick oven. It wasn't made in an oven at all. I made it on my kitchen stove in just 3 minutes.
 It has a thin, crunchy crust with just the right amount of those traditional, charred spots on the rim and the toppings are cooked to perfection at high temperatures you just can't reach in your home oven.

If you are here, the chances are that you love making pizza at home. But like most of us, you hate waiting for your oven to preheat.  
Nowadays, you even see celebrity chefs like Gordon Ramsay and Jamie Oliver making pizza in a frying pan, finishing it under the broiler.
But why stop there, why would you use an oven when there is a better, simpler way? IRONATE is designed to skip an oven altogether, so you can make your pizza straight on your kitchen stove or range. Or if you are an outdoor person, you can even use it on your grill or camp fire.  
Trust me, when you serve your friends a gourmet pizza on a camping trip, the looks on their faces will be priceless.
     
In under 10 minutes, IRONATE can heat to over 800 degrees F (around 430 degrees Celsius) just like commercial pizza ovens. No more waiting 30+ minutes for your oven to preheat, heating up your apartment and wasting all that energy.
The top of IRONATE is designed to quickly soak up the energy from your stove and radiate intense heat into the crust and toppings to ensure evenly cooked pizza in just 3 minutes.  
The bottom end of IRONATE emulates the floor of a wood fired brick oven. You see, we made IRONATE out of special steel. Just ¼ inch of this steel can hold as much energy as a few inches of brick and it conducts heat much better, so you get those perfectly charred spots on the bottom of your pizza, a characteristic of the best Italian pies.
Pizza is the original fast food and I really love to share it with my friends. It's the perfect party food. I don't know many people who don't like pizza.
But, making pizza at home can be time-consuming and the results are never the same as in my favorite pizzeria.  
Well, it WAS time consuming, until IRONATE was born.
Don't miss all the party while you sweat away in your hot kitchen and don't keep your friends hungry. Nothing kills the mood faster than hungry guests. 
With IRONATE you can make a pizza in just 3 minutes, so you will actually be able to enjoy your party. And you can keep them coming – a different pizza with different toppings every few minutes.
We love to cook and experiment with all kinds of dough and toppings. We love using sour dough and organic, homegrown toppings for our pies. 
But there are times when you just want a pizza and don't have the time to mess with the dough. 
That's why IRONATE is designed for a standard 10" pizza from your local supermarket freezer. 
And what a frozen pizza it is. High cooking temperature and shorter baking time can turn even a bland, frozen pizza into the star of your party. The crust won't get all hard and crumbly like it does after 10, 15 minutes in an oven.  
You can add just a few leaves of fresh basil or some fresh mozzarella and your friends won't believe you didn't make that pie all by yourself.
IRONATE is made out of heavy duty carbon steel that prevents wrapping and has the perfect thermal properties for cooking. It has even better heat capacity than cast iron. 
You can use it on most heat sources in most conditions. It can make a great pizza indoors, using only your glass cooktop or gas burner. 
But it can also be used on an open fire or as a separate container on your grill. You can easily remove those cool wooden handles, cover the whole IRONATE with hot coals and use it as a bell for authentic Mediterranean feel.
     
At IRONATE we want to learn from our past. Cast iron and carbon steel cookware was used for generations and generations and for a good reason. 
It's much more durable than modern, thin Teflon pans and can hold much more energy. That really helps with cooking.
When developing IRONATE, we wanted to use that age-old technology but add something to it. We researched all the available materials and manufacturing techniques and IRONATE was born.
  In the process of making a pizza-making gadget, we developed a piece of cookware that can really do anything and will last a lifetime. 
It's can withstand high temperatures and doesn't cool down much, when you put food in it, so it's perfect for searing those sous vide steaks, giving them a nice crust on the outside. 
You can use it to make vegetables. Just close the hot lid for a few minutes to cook them and then crank up the heat to add some color. 
Even the lid has a few tricks up its sleeve. If you’ve ever wanted to bake your pizza in an oven, you can use it instead of baking stones or steels and save up to $90.
It can also be used to keep your food warm for up to an hour. Just flip it around and serve your dinner on the plate. IRONATE doesn't use coating, so you won't damage the lid when cutting or using metal cutlery on it.
        When designing new products, we look in the past for inspiration, but design for the future.
That's why you won't find a single piece of artificial material in our product, even the box that IRONATE comes in is wooden. And there is no built-in planned obsolescence. IRONATE is designed to last for generations.
The bulk of IRONATE is made out of carbon steel, hand welded together for ultimate durability. It's coated and seasoned with vegetable oil, that's all the rust protection you will ever need and it provides a great low-stick surface.
Those cool handles are made out of locally sourced oak or beech wood that can stand the test of time. Even the packaging is handmade out of untreated softwood boards.
We don't use artificial printing ink anywhere on IRONATE. All the logos and insignia are laser engraved into the material.
      IRONATE comes with cool wooden handles that protect you from hot metal. They can be easily removed for easy cleaning or use in an oven or on open fire.
All handles are laser engraved with IRONATE logo. But our friends told us that IRONATE would make a perfect gift for special occasions like weddings, housewarming parties and birthdays.
So we decided to offer you, our Kickstarter backers, an option to choose a custom engraved handles. You can put anything you want on those handles (within reason).
  Shorter pre-heating times and shorter baking times means that you will be able to enjoy the party with your guests, instead of waiting and sweating in your kitchen.
But it also means that you can save money and energy.
Faster pre-heat and cooking times mean less energy spent. That can translate into less dollars spent and your apartment will not turn into a sauna every time you make a pizza.
You will also save money on cookware. IRONATE is durable and made to last a lifetime, so it can be the only one you will ever buy.
Just think about all those cheap, thin pans you bought over the years. Sure, they are only $19,99 but it adds up if you have to buy a new one every few months.
Steel is a perfect material for cookware. It really is. Cleaning IRONATE is a breeze. You can put it in a dishwasher or clean it with warm soapy water. As long as you don't leave it wet for long periods of time, it's natural oil coating will prevent it from rusting.
It doesn't need any special maintenance either. Just add a few drops of oil now and then and it will reinforce its seasoning every time you use it.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is not our first gig. We launched a Kickstarter project before. Like most creators on Kickstarter, we made some mistakes and we faced some hurdles along the way. But what's most important, we learned a lot from our previous project and we will use this knowledge to make IRONATE as seamless as possible.

Making a hand crafted product is not an easy task, but we have sourced, vetted, and put in the time to make as much prototypes as possible.

Our manufacturing process is scalable and robust so we are confident we will be able to keep our promise and deliver the first production batch before Thanksgiving (November 24. 2016).

There is always risk of delays. We promise that we will honestly communicate with our backers if things don't go exactly like planned.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Special deal for our Kickstarter backers.
updates.update_content:
Hi everyone, 
thanks to you, IRONATE is turning into a real business that has new employees, rents a nice office and warehouse and is on a good path to grow and develop new, exciting products that will reinvent the way we cook.
We will never forget support we got from You, our Kickstarter backers and we promised to prepare a special deal once the campaign ends and all IRONATES are shipped.

updates.update_userinfo: This is it ladies and gentlemen. 99% of rewards shipped!
updates.update_content: Are are happy to report, we shipped the rewards to all but 13 people. We are still waiting for additional shipping details for those 13 people.

updates.update_userinfo: We will ship 98% of rewards by the end of next week.
updates.update_content:
Dear backers, 
we are happy to announce that we will ship the remaining rewards to almost all backers in the next 7 days.
This is todays batch, around 60 IRONATES + another 300 more in the back, packed and waiting for tomorrow and Monday.

Hi, 
the last month was quite hectic for us. We were trying to make enough IRONATES for you, our backers, but with every new production run we ran into some kind of trouble. It was soon clear that the production process we were trying to establish and optimize throughout our campaign and these last months is just not suitable for mass production.
Some background...

Just a quick update to let you know how we are doing.
We sent out most of the Thanksgiving rewards. If you are a "Thanksgiving special" backer and you haven't received your IRONATE it is probably in transit.
We are using DHL Express for our overseas backers. Their estimated delivery time is 2 to 4 days to most places in the world. But, sometimes packages get delayed in customs or we get a request for additional information and that can take a few days.

updates.update_userinfo: A short "how-to" video of using IRONATE
updates.update_content:
Hi, 
in the last update, we promised an uncut video of using IRONATE, so here it is.
It is speed up, but there is always a clock in sight, so you can keep track of the actual time.

Hi, 
people have started receiving IRONATES in larger quantities by now and there are some comments we need to address, so we put together a quick FAQ.
I have problems with baking the pizza in 3 minutes. I doubt that IRONATE works as advertised.
Well, this is not the first thing we screw up in this Kickstarter project, but it is one of the worst screw-ups. We put too little attention to the user manual and when we reviewed some of the feedback from you guys, we saw that the manual is very vague in some places.

updates.update_userinfo: This weeks batch prepared for shipping.
updates.update_content:
Hi, 
we worked hard during the holidays, but we finally managed to sort out our production and quality control issues. Most of our suppliers and partners did not work during this 2 week period around New year, so it took us a bit longer than expected.
At the moment, we have production and shipping capacity of around 150 IRONATES per week, but that number should at least double with some optimization.

@jk van. I seasoned mine in the oven, but a good friend of mine who also backed did it on the stove. Basically, he cleaned it off after delivery, applied a thin layer of canola oil(rapeseed), and then turned on his exhaust fan to its max setting. He then turned the burner to medium high and just heated it (lid on bottom, main pan on top) until it started to turn a blackened "cast iron-ish" color and had seasoned. *Note, his house smelled terrible even with the exhaust on and be prepared for the fire alarm to go off when the pan smokes but that's how he seasoned it.
Good luck to you all

@Remy, 2 posts below yours, I detail what it's like using the new/non-welded version of the pan.

@Kathy, that wouldnt work because the peel isnt heated beforehand so you'd never get a good bottom crust. Also, if you use a peel, after making the raw pizza and moving it onto the well floured/semolina (only if you use semolina) peel, you should be able to kind of shake the peel back and forth in such a way that the pizza kind of slides on it. Once that happens and it moves easily, just lay the peel in a 45 degree angle so that the pizza would slide right into the bottom ironate pan with one side of the crust hitting the inside of one of the rims of the pan. Once the pizza makes contact, gently pull the peel back letting the rest of the pizza slide snugly into the rest of the pan.

I don't know about others, but I've find that I have to pre-bake my dough so it's rigid enough to lay into the pan. Sort of defeats the purpose. If I could make it on something like the peel that stays in the pan while cooking- it would be a very quick process- rather than a longer, messier process.

I had a pizza party and made 9 pizzas in succession. It was not easy. We found that 3 min would cook the pizza, but only if it was hot enough (and there is no way to tell). Yes the toppings stick to the lid and I just scraped them off quickly in order to put it back on for the next. It DOES help to use solid items that won't stick on top of the cheese - artichoke hearts work well. The hardest part is getting the pizza into the pan! I am going to get a peel to see if that works.
