campaign.story:
Cookbook's easy to use interface will help and guide you through the creative process of developing your very own recipes  
Just wait until you see the inside...
Featured on
   Development platform 
Keep track of changes to the original recipe - whether its tinkering with the cooking process or changing the ingredients.
After each try use the scoreboard to evaluate your dish, write down important notes for next time and keep a tab on who loves it the most. 
Don't follow, rather develop new recipes that work for you and your taste buds
  Wake and Cake
 Taste map  
Created to help you uncover new taste pairings or create dishes from scratch.
Just like outer space it's a map that keeps growing and inspiring your imagination
 Encyclopedia  
Helps you with everyday kitchen trivia like cups to grams and Celsius to Fahrenheit conversions, bakers percentage, meat doneness, healthy substitutes and appropriate wine pairings.
Challenge yourself to learn it by heart
What others have to say?
Janez Bratovž (JB) - One of Europe's top chefs and amongst the top 100 restaurants in the world
Design
The booklet is fully customizable and lets you design its final outlook; whether its cut-outs, photos, illustrations, stickers or just text, Cookbook won't have any complaints.
Cookbook loves to have a personality
Created with minimalism and homeliness in mind, Cookbook collects memories on both inside and outside, while it hopes to become your trusted cooking companion. It holds place for twelve recipes, each allowing six tries. After 72 days of thoughtful and devoted cooking, the journal becomes your personal cookbook, holding twelve signature recipes you will always be proud of. 
It can either be spelled cacao or cocoa
Artist series     
Cookbook was thrilled to hear that two young artists from our hometown Ljubljana (Slovenia) were willing to collaborate with an exclusive illustration / design which adorns the interior of the Cookbook's cover. We are sure you'll be blown away by the works of Urška Hvalica and Matija Medved, who we are collaborating with for our first Artist series.
Story    
The idea for Cookbook has long been sparking up in my head. It has evolved from my personal need as it is something I've always wanted to have in my kitchen instead of numerous  post-it notes, lost paper sheets and cut-out recipes that never seemed to work. I believed my cooking process can be both creative and organised at the same time. The booklet slowly started to come to life while i was working as an Associate in a corporate Law firm in my hometown Ljubljana, Slovenia. Developing the idea acted as a stress reliever and a much-needed creative output after long office hours. It helped me balance the abstract world of rules and numbers with my passions: cooking, inventing and design. After my Christmas vacation, I decided to quit my job and fully focus on bringing Cookbook to reality. Hopefully it will spark numerous cooking ideas and make your cooking fun, organised and even more creative.
Rewards 
Why we need your help
After designing and prototyping the book, we soon realised the production costs of a larger pressing, which would make the production viable, are too much for us to afford on our own. By reaching the campaign goal we will be able to cover the initial costs of the covers, paper, prints and bookbinding as well as shipping. Hopefully we'll then be able to continue producing the Cookbook and inspire many amazing recipes to be developed around the globe.
About us
Matija Renčelj - Product development (26) - ex lawyer; gets cooking inspiration just before bedtime; loves his hometown’s coffee culture; about to start a LL.M. in Air & Space Law     
Špela Tušar - Head of design (27) – communications graduate; uses too much wine when cooking; loves the golden light; co-founder of UAUU, an artist studio and gallery in Ljubljana
Hana Gaber - Head of communications (24) - law graduate; business student; dancer & yoga teacher; a very messy cook
Thank you
There's no way we could have done this campaign without the help of a number of our friends who we cannot thank enough for their kindness, effort and support throughout the project
UAUU - Artist studio and gallery in Ljubljana that has provided a much needed creative environment
Juš Premrov - Video
Tosja Flaker Berce - Video
Domen Valič - Main actor
Nika Jurman - Actress
Gaber Jovanovič Architects - Apartment, Help and Kindness
Maruša Račič - (Analog) Photography
Blaž Ferjan - Stop motion animation & Team Photography
Blaž Berdnik - Web development
Marko Nedzbala - Voiceover
Luka Kejžar - Voiceover recording
Janez Bratovž (JB Restaurant) - Advice and support
Luka Nagode (LUDA) - Advice, insight and support
Jelisaveta Đuričič (silver_stitches) - Hand stitched whisk patches
Urška Hvalica - Interior cover design (Artist series)
Špela Vavpetič, Nika Zupančič, Kapitan Kolačkov - Recipe handwriting and illustratiion
Jupiter "Jupi" Gaber Jovanovič - The dog
Kevin MacLeod - Video track 1: Sonatina in C Minor (Creative Commons attribution)
as well as: Ajša Jeričević, Klemen Sašek, Domen Rozman, Gaber Jovanovič Family (Petra, Sašo, Nil), Matija Medved, Dušan Renčelj, Jan Kikelj, Miha Artnak, Niko Klanšek, Mateja Gaber, Jerneja Jenko, Petra Pešič, Gaja Čeferin, Maša Kranjc, Brina Vidic, Sai Pan, Gregor Jenko, Gregor Berkopec, Memowu, Rok Seifert, Lara Flegar,  Kinodvor, Sax Pub ...

updates.update_userinfo: The books are on their way!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,

Thank you so much for all of your support in these past few months since the beginning of our project. By saying "our project" we really feel you are also a part of it as you have played a huge part in making this a reality.

Today we have sent the books via post and it should take somewhere between 2-14 days (depending on your geographic location) for you to receive your very own Cookbook.

We are looking forward to your first impressions and can't wait for all of your delicious recipes.

Best regards and keep your ovens hot!

Matija, Špela, Hana
Project Cookbook

Hi guys,

We're super excited to almost be ready to ship the Cookbooks!

The books have been printed and are waiting at our workspace in Ljubljana for their packaging to arrive out of the print house - so we'll be on time and will send them out until the end of the month.

By the time you'll receive them we'll also have our website (which is still under construction) up and running and you should be able to order additional copies for your friends if case they'll like your latest kitchen addition :)

Thank you once again & be sure to download the .pdf for the time being 

All the best & have a great start to October

Matija, Špela & Hana

Hi guys,
Thanks for all the wonderful support during our campaign. You are the ones that made it happen and we cannot thank you enough! We cannot wait to send out the Cookbooks this coming October.
We are fully focused on the production stage and will update you on all further developments. Until then hope you will enjoy the summer and cook and eat some great dishes.

updates.update_userinfo: You've made it happen & Our take on the chilli
updates.update_content:
Hi guys!

We're thrilled that our creative cooking community is still growing - thank you so much for joining and we're looking forward to receive your feedback once the Cookbooks become a part of your kitchen.

As for now, we'd like to hear your recipe suggestions which we'll develop according to our taste and preferences in the following days. By doing so, we will also post the process of how to use the Cookbook.

So go ahead and suggest a recipe - we can't wait to hear about your favorite dishes as we are always ready to cook and eat :)

Wohoooo! We have just received the greatest news - we have officially been funded! With your help we managed to reach our goal 14 days (2 weeks!) before the end of our campaign!
Thank you so so much! We are forever grateful for your support and all the amazing feedback. We’re sure you’ll create amazing recipes to share with the world, and we’re happy that Cookbook will be there to witness it all.

Hi guys,
Thank you so much for backing our project this early on! We are really grateful to have received such amazing support and hope the backers count will keep growing.
We are now at almost 25% of the way to be fully funded and look forward to send you the books this coming October.

campaign.story:
Pre-Order Here: click
Stretch Goals
Stretch goal #1: ($75.000)
Ludicrous mode, Motor current measurement & Transparent upper housing with multicolor LED lighting. Each & Every BuWizz will be capable of powering LEGO models with ludicrous speed with 11.8 Volts output. Each motor's current will be measured and recorded in real time. This will enable various advanced functions - linear actuator end position detection, motor overload, collision detection and programming of sequential motions of several motors. The upper part of housing will be transparent. Lit with several RGB LEDs, It will be capable of changing colors. The LED function will be programmable - they will be able to indicate battery state, motor state, flash in various patterns - create light effects.
Stretch goal #2: ($100.000)
New housing colors and USB data connectivity - we will add several color options for BuWizz housing (colors will be determined based on demand). Data connectivity will enable connection to PC/Mac/Linux computers, Arduino, Raspberry Pi, etc. There will be an option for connecting external sensors. BuWizz will become a robotics and educational platform.
What is BuWizz?
We are glad to announce the latest innovation in the field of LEGO® models. Our remote control brick, paired with your smartphone, is the coolest thing that ever clicked into your LEGO Technic model or train. Operating via Bluetooth and working within a large range, your models will move faster than ever and exhibit the power of real RC models.
Meet BuWizz, the one brick to steer them all
As LEGO® fans, we wanted to have more fun with our models, more speed, power and possibilities to play with the models we construct. We were not satisfied with available solutions. We wanted the freedom to control several models with many motors at the same time and steer them with precision, power and authority. One should be able to drive models outdoors and enable them to climb over obstacles and defeat rough natural terrain such as grass, gravel, tree roots, etc. We set a goal and worked hard for two years to reach it.
What's in it for you?
BuWizz is a high performance yet compact controller for LEGO® Power Functions motors. BuWizz comes equipped with embedded battery and a Micro-USB charging port. A single BuWizz brick controls up to four motors. Smartphone or tablet controlled, it's super easy to setup and use. The App can control several BuWizz bricks in case you ever really want to build that monster model with 30 motors & lights you are dreaming about.
  Out of the box setup
Saves your time, with no setup necessary, BuWizz just works out of the box. Insert BuWizz into your model, connect the motors and start the App. Auto configuration will take care of setting up BuWizz. You can, of course, change all the settings and store them for unlimited number of models.
  Compact build
At only 8 bricks long, 4 bricks wide and 3 bricks high - BuWizz is compact (even smaller than LEGO AAA battery box), yet it replaces the LEGO® battery box and two LEGO® IR receivers. You can also embed the BuWizz brick deep into your model if you so wish and hide it out of sight. All you need is access to the Micro-USB charging port (which can also be achieved with a simple USB extension cable).
    Responsive control with precise steering
Steer your models smoothly – LEGO PF Servo motor has 15 positions with BuWizz (not just left-center-right as with LEGO IR controls). Move the sliders on the touch screen fast and your model will respond to speed changes instantly, move the sliders slowly and the motors will follow your commands and change their speed gradually. Control with fast response was the drive behind BuWizz. Test it out, it feels sooo cool.
    Delivers 2x the speed and 8x the power to any model
BuWizz is very powerful. It delivers two times more power and speed to each motor, so your huge & heavy 5000+ bricks creation will scream & roar and not just barely move across the floor. Each of the four outputs can easily power two LEGO XL motors at the same time. When all four outputs are used, BuWizz delivers 8x more power to the motors than any solution using LEGO battery box! Unleash your imagination and build the monster MOC you always wanted to, without worrying how to make it move and where to drive it.
  Charges via Micro-USB
BuWizz has an embedded high performance Li-Ion battery and a standard Micro USB charging port. The battery lasts for hours of fun (depending on usage). When the battery eventually gets low, the App will alert you and you can charge it from any USB source. You no longer need to burden the environment with depleted batteries.
    Be alerted when battery is running low
We have been there many times too – without warning, somehow the NiMh rechargeable batteries are always dead when you finally find the time to play with your models. We have this covered. The App will show you battery charge state so you will always know how much power remains.
 Endless fun
In case BuWizz battery gives up before you do, you can charge it with any standard Powerbank battery even while you drive your model. No problem if you forgot to charge your BuWizz – just make sure your Powerbank is full.
FAST and SLOW speed modes
In FAST speed mode, BuWizz delivers 2x more power to each motor, enabling them to spin faster. Your models will run faster and have more power to climb obstacles.
Retract the gear on your plane, move the barrier or convertible roof. BuWizz is the only solution that moves the LEGO PF Servo motor between positions very fast or very slow or anything in between – you decide. Check the video below to se the difference between "Fast" and "Slow" modes.
Tracked vehicle steering
If you have ever tried it, you know steering a tracked vehicle can be a hassle. Drive your tracked vehicle like you would any “normal” vehicle - with forward-reverse & steering control sliders. BuWizz will do the rest and send appropriate control signals to left and right track motors.
PLAY

  Studded or studless? 
BuWizz can handle both worlds with ease. Bottom & top surfaces have studs for connecting BuWizz to studded designs. The 4 pin holes in the corners enable BuWizz to be integrated in studless models.
 The app
BuWizz works on Android and iOS devices. Designed for ease of use, both platforms support automatic pairing and setup of your BuWizz brick(s). We are developing several fully customizable skins - here are just two of them:
Dimensions
BuWizz has the same footprint as two IR receivers. You can swap those and use it instantly. It mostly fits inside the models, yet you have to rearrange a brick or two sometimes :-) We believe BuWizz is the most useful brick. A brick to control compact and complex LEGO creations. The possibilities are truly endless.
  You need to see this video:
How we developed BuWizz
We got the idea for BuWizz back in late 2013, created some simple prototypes and tested them at local LEGO user group meetings during 2014.
Serious development started in 2015, when we decided to add a battery to BuWizz since this was the only way to achieve the desired performance. Months of development, testing, changes, more development & testing, etc. followed. We changed the internals and external design and added pinholes. It was hard work but it was also fun and now BuWizz is ready! 
      BuWizz beta testers
We thoroughly tested the prototypes and gathered feedback from several beta testers. Here are some of them and their opinions:
Sariel: "performance is excellent!" Here is his video review.
Nico71: Here is Nico's video review (in French). And review on his website.
Philo: "I mostly tested on 42030 Volvo wheel loader, worked remarkably well!"
Designer Han: "I really like it! "
Jurgen Krooshoop: "Allthough the App is still very basic, it works pretty well. It didn’t crash 1 single time."
Crowkillers
 Timeline
After successful Kickstarter campaign, we will set in motion the process of manufacturing BuWizz. We need to order the plastic moulding tools from our suppliers, order all the electronic components, and start the production at our external supplier.
  Technical Data
Battery
Battery type: Lithium Polymer (Li-Ion) - rechargeable
Battery capacity: 7.5 Wh 
Charge rate: 5 W (5 V, 1 A) 
Charge time (20-80%): 1h 15 min
Perfomance
Max current per channel: 3 A 
Max power per channel: 30 W (HIGH speed mode)
Max power total: 45 W 
Connectivity: Bluetooth Smart (BLE)  
Range: up to 60 m
Dimensions: 8 x 4 x 3 bricks
Speed mode voltages 
SLOW speed: 4 V
NORMAL speed: 7.5 V
FAST speed: 10 V
Software support
Android version: 4.4 and up 
iOS version: 9 and up  
open Bluetooth communications protocol
Comparison to LEGO batteries
BuWizz output voltage is regulated and stays constant regardless of load (either 4, 7.5 or 10 V). Maximum (all channels combined) output current is 4.5 A. 
LEGO Li-Ion (8878): output voltage drops when battery gets discharged, depends on load. At 50% capacity, 1 A discharge, voltage is only slightly above 6 V. Maximum current: 1.5 A for 5 seconds (before protection trips).
LEGO AA battery box (8881): performance depends on AA batteries used. At 750 mA discharge, voltage is about 6.5 - 7 V. Maximum current: 1.5 A for 5 seconds (before protection trips).
LEGO AAA battery box (88000): performance is worse than AA battery box; voltage at 750 mA is 6 - 6.5 V. Same current limiter as AA battery box
Excellent documentation about LEGO batteries and extensive test results can be found on Philo's website. Thanks Philo!
Credits to BuWizz team
Roni Leben - making it happen (team leader)
  Kajetan Kovač - typist & coder (software design)
  Sandi Romih - wielding a soldering gun (hardware design)
  Lovro Sambol - slide ruler expert (CAD design)
  Matjaž Ferenc - rulers & pencils (design, UI graphics)
  Melissa Cerić - color crayons (design, web design)
  Žiga Godina - the messenger (community manager)
  Peter Irman - killin' it behind the lens (photography)
  Robert Reinhardt - adult supervision (mentor & startup consultant)
 We want to thank many other people, who helped with the project so far.
We want to thank the Kickstarter team for making this possible and all the press for covering our product. A big thank you for backing our campaign and supporting the project we all believe in.
Origin of BuWizz name
BuWizz is an imaginary name. Means nothing. Or something. Bluetooth. Battery. Better. Upgrade. Wizard. BuWizz. Makes your models whizz by. You decide what BuWizz means.
Disclaimer
We are a group of enthusiasts and we created BuWizz as an enhancement to add more fun and enable new possibilities with LEGO models. We tried hard to differentiate BuWizz from LEGO products, but to maintain compatibility, some similarities are unavoidable.
LEGO® is trademark of The LEGO Group, which does not sponsor, authorize or endorse us or this project in any way. All Trademarks are property of their respective owners.
 Save
Save
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We feel confident enough to show you and deliver this very special brick. BuWizz is set to ship inside this year and our plan will be fairly easy to accomplish, if we are fully backed. We need to prepare plastic moulding tooling for production, set up the assembly line and create the first batch with support of our external partners. Possible risks include manufacturing and logistic issues, but we already accounted for possible delays in our schedule. We also need to "polish" the App, both iOS and Android versions, where we have full control over development.

So here is our challenge: We commit to our dear backers to fulfil the orders and deliver rewards inside this year. Specifically, the early bird batch will ship in November. This is a promise we will look forward to fulfilling. The main shipment will follow in December, when BuWizz will enter the market.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: BuWizz 2.0 with LUDICROUS speed mode + Cyber Monday sale
updates.update_content:
Hi all,
We have great news for you: we just released the new
BuWizz 2.0 with LUDICROUS speed mode!

Dear backers,  
Finally, an update long overdue!
We were silent, but not idle through the summer. We have been busy and we have news for you :-)
We are constantly working on the app and adding the much anticipated features, but this is not going as fast as we would prefer. We are also updating our website. We will add FAQ, blog, forum and other resources. We are opening up part of the software (and communication protocol), so you will be able to create your own apps. We are also expanding and restructuring our team.

updates.update_userinfo: iOS app users - we need your Apple ID email
updates.update_content:
Hi all,
Current status update:
Android app: released, available on Play Store
iOS app: in review to be released by Apple. Release date is out of our hands, but you can use the app as beta testers immediately. All you need to do is PM us with your Apple ID email, we will add you to beta testers, then you can install the BuWizz app through Apple's Test flight app.

Hi All, we have good news!
We already shipped the first production Bricks to beta testers and we are collecting their feedback as we speak.
We will start shipping rewards to backers on Monday.
Please check if your address is correct and please provide your phone number (required for delivery by our shipping partner).

Dear Backers,  
We can finally see the light at the end of the tunnel! First BuWizz bricks are coming from the production line and they look gorgeous! Shipping will start real soon. We need to take care of packaging and shipping logistics first.

BuWizz production continues. We received all of the moulded housings and they look beautiful and fit perfectly!

Dear backers,  
One of the key components has finally arrived - batteries (packed neatly in 12 boxes) :-)

campaign.story:
Thank you for looking at our project. We are so happy for being successfully funded but... the race is not over. You can still be part of our adventure!
We are opening our first epicurean cantine in Manhattan this fall and need all the support we can get. We got great press excited about our opening (see above + EATER, GOTHAMIST and FRENCH MORNING articles) and we hope you will see our drive & passion and help us realize our dream. Please keep on reading, pledging and spreading the word. Thank you!
UPDATE: Great news! We will be able to ship all our rewards this fall when our store will open in Greenwich Village. See more info bellow. 
New to Kickstarter? You will find more information on how to pledge below.
Pour plus d'informations en français, explorez notre section plus bas. 
OUR REWARDS
WHAT IS ANCOLIE
Ancolie offers fresh, delicious breakfast, lunch and snack options with sustainable, well-sourced ingredients packaged in reusable glass jars. Our recipes are prepared in our kitchen daily, inspired by traditional French home cooking and international flavors.
Built upon the epicurean philosophy, Ancolie believes that each meal should be respected and savored amongst friends. In today’s digital world, people rarely pause to appreciate their meals, yet Ancolie invites you to slow down, disconnect from your daily routine and enjoy every wholesome bite.
We will be opening our first restaurant in New York City this fall in the Greenwich Village Area. We already signed the lease and are working very hard through the renovation process.
Ancolie wants to become your cantine and have you for coffee, lunch, snacks or even a glass of wine. Whether you are in a good mood or a bad mood, we want to be here to brighten your day. Help us get there!
OUR GOALS
With $20,000 (reached): we were able to start the production of the large glass jars we will be using in our restaurant for our mains and salads. 
With $50,000 (reached): we will be able to also manufacture small jars to use for our desserts and sides. 
 With $70,000 (new objective!!): we will be able to add buy warm and cold display cases for our store. 
With $100,000: we will be able to do buy most of our cooking equipment. 
It takes a lot of support to open in Manhattan and we need your help to achieve our dream. 
HIGHLIGHTS
Our cantine is located at 58 west 8th street (at the corner of 6th ave)
500 square feet with a kitchen on site and 15 seats
Below is a picture of our window with hand drawn jars and vegetables
We will serve breakfast, lunch, snacks and dinner 
All the meals will be ready to grab and go in refrigerated display 
Vegetarian, vegan, gluten free and dairy free options will be available
Breakfast: french toast sticks, chia puddings, layered omelets 
Healthy salads: salmon and soba noddles, lemon chicken tabouleh 
Hearty mains: shepherd's pie, chicken tikka 
Sides: fresh soups, gratins, ratatouille 
Desserts: Fab's chocolate cake, carrot cake and fresh fruit salad 
You will receive a free dish for every 10 jars returned
WASTE: GET YOUR FACTS STRAIGHT
100 million pieces of lunchtime trash get thrown away every 24 hours
On an annual basis, that's 20 billion pieces in our landfills
Every week, the volume of plastic thrown into the oceans equals two Empire State Buildings
Less than 4% of plastic used is recycled
30-40% of food produced goes to waste
Ancolie jars are portion controlled, waste-free and plastic-free. The healthiest and most sustainable lunch companion. Keep in mind, the best way to reduce garbage is to NOT create it!
WHY GLASS?
Gorgeous: Transparent inside and out, see exactly what you are eating
Elegant: Replaces all of the clutter of your typical to-go lunch
Reliable: Keeps cold dishes crisp and warm ones toasty
Proven: Captures seasonal flavors like our grandmothers used to
Green: Participates in a zero waste community
Pure: Natural and chemical free
ANCOLIE JARS
Designed by the pickiest eaters and the best experts and designers:
Wide enough to eat directly out of 
Curved inside to enjoy every bite up to the last one
Stackable and leakproof 
100% reusable
Easy to transport everywhere 
Freezer, microwave and dishwasher safe 
So durable, they will invite you to slow down and enjoy every bite
Dimensions: width 4 1/4 in. at the top (11cm), height 4 3/4 in. (12cm)
Content: large size 22oz (625mL) - small size 10oz (300mL)
OUR BAGS
To go with our beautiful jars, we needed the perfect partners. So we created two awesome bags that you can reuse rather than plastic bags. We hope they will become your favorite eco-friendly lunch boxes!
The Isotherm Bag: A beautiful insulated lunch pack that fits comfortably and comes with 2 large jars and will keep your meal cool or cozy depending on what you need. It fits easily in any bag (5" tall x 9" wide x 5" deep or 13cm x 23cm x 13cm) and looks great with cotton canvas on the outside. 
The Carry-Everything Bag:  We created this bag, to carry your lunch with everything else you need for the day. It has leather handles (very chic!), cotton canvas and two compartments. One compartment is padded to safely transport your laptop and the second one, larger, fits the Isotherm Bag perfectly and everything else you need with you . It also has a small pocket on the side to fit your phone, keys and all the small things you need accessible at all time (15" tall x 9" wide x 5" deep or 38cm x 23cm x 13cm). The handles are large enough to carry on your shoulders and not too long to also carry in your hands to your side. 
Want to add extra goodies to your pledge? Just added the following amounts and send us a note to confirm: 
$10 - Set of 2 small jars
$30 - Lunch set (including 2 large jars)
$35 - Apron
$60 - Carry everywhere bag (including lunch set inside)
$55 for 5 lunched or $100 for 10 lunches in our store
MEET CHLOE
Growing up in Paris, our founder developed an affinity for well-prepared, wholesome meals. After working for ten years in finance, she grew tired of the typical ready made lunch options they were mass-produced and packaging heavy. This is when Ancolie was born!
On her side, she has a team of passionate people united around a common goal: making eating on-the-go as sustainable and delicious as possible. 
TIMELINE
Early 2015: The idea was born in France
2015: First drawings of our jar
Early 2016: Recipe testing and first prototypes
April 2016: We have a packaging we like!
May - June 2016: Kickstarter Campaign - you run the show now!
May 2016: We signed the lease of our first cantine
July 2016: Final production tests / Permits and demolition of the space
August 2016:  Manufacturing / Renovation begins
September 2016: Shipping / Renovation ends
Fall 2016: Opening our of flagship cantine, yeah!
Need help on Kickstarter? Click here to see the step by step tutorial. 
WE ARE SOCIAL
Like us and share our project on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter !!
You can also check our website and subscribe to our newsletter. 
__________________________________________________________________
QUELQUES MOTS EN FRANÇAIS !
Ancolie vous propose de délicieux repas, exclusivement préparés avec des ingrédients frais et locaux, le tout dans des bocaux en verre réutilisables. Nous allons ouvrir notre premier restaurant très prochainement à New York et avons besoin de notre soutien ! 
Des récompenses ont été spécialement pensées pour nos amis du monde entier. Vous pouvez commander dès à présent vos bocaux, sacs et tabliers pour les recevoir directement en France et partout dans le monde. 
Nos recettes, inspirées par le raffinement de la cuisine française et les saveurs du monde entier, sont confectionnées dans notre cuisine tous les matins. Au sein du monde digital dans lequel nous vivons, rares sont ceux qui prennent un moment pour apprécier leurs mets. Ancolie vous invite à prendre votre temps, à vous déconnecter de votre routine afin d’apprécier chacun de nos ingrédients les plus raffinés. 
Soutenez nous, rejoignez le mouvement et contribuez à un système éco-responsable. 
Pour plus d'informations, découvrez également l’interview de la fondatrice d’Ancolie en français ! 
On vous remercie et on compte sur vous !
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Production - Our team partnered with experienced designers and manufacturers to developed the best product available. However, we will not settle for mediocre quality in order to save time. Should any issues arise we promise to keep you updated every step of the way.

Restaurant - Opening a brick and mortar in New York City is not simple. We are supported by the best team for construction, permits and menu development. Like every other project, we expect bumps in the road and we will be very transparent with you, giving frequent updates, good or bad. Be assured that we are putting all our hard work and energy to this project.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Thank you! Its been a year already!
updates.update_content:
A year ago, you guys, collectively changed my life! Without you, I couldn't have done it. 
We now have a beautiful store that is selling delicious, healthy and sustainable food daily. Today, I would like to thank you one more time. 
If you haven't received your reward yet:

updates.update_userinfo: We did it!! Everything is shipped!
updates.update_content:
Dear friends, 
Sorry for the long wait, we finally shipped all the jars, bags and aprons! You should receive your tracking number by tomorrow. 
For the ones that selected a pick-up in store, we are waiting for you at 58 West 8th Street.

Dear Backers, 
Many thanks for your patience. We have great news: shipping has finally started!
US residents should receive their tracking number tomorrow. For the rest of the world, we had some issues with higher than expected broken jars and are waiting for an updated shipping date, which we hope will happen in the next week or two.

Dear Friends, 
I am really sorry to inform you that we were not able to ship as we had planned most of our rewards this week. The warehouse we had selected told us that they were too busy to take care of our order and dropped the ball at the last minute. Apparently, people can do that... Our partners at Ideaspacher/Nift did everything they could to 1. have them honor their commitment and then 2. find anther one that could pack and ship before the Holidays but unfortunately it didn't work out.

updates.update_userinfo: Items Shipped, Store Open, Smiles Wide
updates.update_content:
GREAT news - This week, we plan to start shipping out of our warehouse what you've been so patiently waiting for! Orders with small jars will take a little longer but they will be worth the wait we guaranty! For people that opted to pick up in store, you can come next week to try our delicious meals or pick up your item, we are open from 8am-7pm Monday to Friday, 9am-7pm on Saturday and 9am-5pm on Sundays.
Thank you for bearing with us as we wrap up our Kickstarter Experience! We can't wait for you to enjoy our jars and our meals

Hello Friends!
The day has finally arrived: WE ARE OPEN! We could not be any more proud to say our team at Ancolie is ready to serve you. Thank you to each and everyone of you who has been with us since the very beginning. We couldn't have done it without you and your endless support to keep us going!

Hello my friends, 
I am really sorry for not posting in such a long time. As you can imagine, we have been quite busy with the opening of our store coming very soon. 
Here is where we stand on the store opening: 
We passed the fire and health inspection and can now start cooking in the space

updates.update_userinfo: Focus Groups Next Week! We need you
updates.update_content:
Hello my friends, 
If you are in New York and we haven't met before, I need your help!
I am running 3 focus groups next week at Ancolie and we need a couple more people to participate. The goal is to better understand people's tastes and expectations around eating well and being sustainable. It needs to be people I don't know...

Hello friends, 
Since our last update we have done a lot of progress in the store:
We have tiles, see below, but only in half of the store
All the plumbing and electrical connections are in place 
They started patching the walls
Still not in: kitchen appliances, lights fixtures and millwork

updates.update_userinfo: Shipping info - Look out for a dedicated email

Hello my friends, 
Its been a month since my last update. I hope you are having a great summer. 
Today, you are going to receive an email from my friends at Ideaspatcher to confirm your pledge details and shipping info:

campaign.story:
We are all gadget enthusiasts, but also somewhat disappointed about what is available on the market to protect our devices in style. So we decided to refresh the phone cases market and make our stand with Organika cases :) If you are someone who wants to stand out with a one of a kind case, made out of natural hand picked materials for you to not only see the difference, but also feel it! Then Organika cases are just for you.  
              With unique smartphone covers made from hand picked actual organic  materials. They stand out with their looks and also have a natural scent which gives you a style like no other, because each case is hand crafted and one of a kind. 
Apple World.Today - Coffee Beans shows just how remarkable the scents can be.  
The Gadgeteer - The rose petal case smells like real roses because it’s made from that exact material.
iPhone life - Now that I have one, I want them all.
Appadvice - If you’ve always wanted a unique iPhone case check Organika case. Natural bliss.
Gadgetflow - Organika Cases will perfectly commend your unique style. Coolsmartphone - Making your next phone cover even more individual. Fashion Tales - You can really view the embellished details with the rose petals; a smooth and textured surface that also give off the rose fragrance. 
    iPhone 5, iPhone 5C, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 PLUS, iPhone 7*, iPad air, iPad mini 1/2/3, iPad Air 2, LG G3, LG G4, LG G5, Samsung Galaxy S5, Samsung Galaxy S6 / Edge, Samsung Galaxy S7 / Edge, Samsung Galaxy Note 3/4/5, HTC M8, HTC M9, HTC M10, Huawei P6, Sony Z2  
* iPhone 7 & 7plus will be availabe in September!
Choose between energizing Coffee, memory evoking Alpine Hay, love inspiring Roses or the calming and charming Jasmine. 
If the campaign goes well we have a whole list of new beautiful materials. 
And a chance for everyone to design a custom phone case using a material you pick.
A somehow mysterious flower speaks of beauty, love and calmness. Its unique scent will renew your spirit and leave you feeling relaxed and prepare your mind and body for the challenges of tomorrow.    
    To cope with our everyday lives we need plenty of energy and nothing defines it better than that first cup of coffee in the morning. The smell of freshly brewed coffee wakes us up and makes us feel alive. 
        We all find ourselves in moments when our thoughts wander into the realm of our childhood memories. All those long summers at our grandparent’s place, running barefoot through the backyard, the whiff of freshly cut grass floating in the air and not a single care in the world.
    Roses symbolize love and beauty in every aspect. The mere scent can connect us to that special someone and remembers us of all the perfect moments together.
                          The natural material is coated with an organic based resin which provides the necessary durability keeping your phone perfectly safe in every way.  
Made out of natural handpicked materials 
Durable for maximum protection

    To bring Organika cases to all of our amazing backers and develop create new designs. We want to introduce nature to the digital world with a completely new style in mind. So you won't only see and and use your case, but also feel it!    
If our campaign goes really well we'll let you design your own case from a natural materials of their choice - stone, wood, leather, crystals, flowers and more. 
  We're a group of young Slovenians and we're doing our best to introduce you with a fashionable way of protecting your smartphones. 
Žiga Lunder is the founder of Organika cases and has been making wooden phone cases for years. Our senior adviser and go-to business person is Žiga Berce. 
Tim Berce and Klemen Lorber are the backbone behind the brand and marketing of the Organika. 
Manca Šalehar finds and introduces the Cases to well established media and bloggers.  Ajda Sever takes care of our community through social media. Timotej Vitez is our resident storyteller.
Ana Štandeker realizes our visions through elegant web designs. And Katja Fortun creates our beautiful photos.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Because of the structure of the natural materials and coating we use every case is completely unique. That leaves some space for imperfections to happen. To prevent this imperfections we apply a second layer of coating. We're confident that the cases will last much longer with this added protection up to 5 years.

The scent intensity is also a factor, because it is subject to outside factors. Like humidity, heat and other environmental factors. We still believe the cases will keep their scent for at least 1 year.

We use an outside company for shipping. While we will use the best option available, there is a chance that you package might get lost. If that happens we'll resend the package A-S-A-P, but that might cause a shipping delay. We are committed to offering the best service possible and to guarantee the satisfaction of each and every backer :)
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Insert the adaptor into power socket of your device.
Adjust connector if you use a case. 
Place your phone on a drop dock. 
Drop dock is compatible with most of the smartphones, as long as it has a Micro USB or a Lightning power slot on its bottom side, you are good to go. Simply leave the adaptor inside any of your devices and you are ready to place it and charge it. 
With multiple adaptors you can charge more devices. 
      We designed the drop dock for EVERYONE, for any device, and for almost any case!  
Compatible with nearly every smartphone, the drop dock is ideal choice for keeping your devices charged, in view, and easily accessible.
 Dimensions are in millimeters.
  The adapter can also be connected to a universal magnetic cable regularly. That way, you can keep the adaptor on your device everywhere you go and be able to charge with a cable out in public.
Universal magnetic cables and the drop docks will be shipped at the same time.
                                     We have finalized the design and prototypes. There are no render photos in our campaign. We only use our working prototypes. We have selected our manufacturer, meaning we can have our first docks in less than 3 months.
The funds raised will go towards tooling, purchasing of raw materials, manufacturing, packaging, and shipping. Some of the funds will also be spent on marketing and operational expenses. And there is also 10% KS Admin Fees.
Please help us spread the word via the [Tweet] or [Share] button above and get one free additional ADAPTER (of your choise) with your pledge with the following steps:  
1. Send us the Shared Link to: share@dropdock.co
2. lnclude your Kickstarter User Name and "I have shared" in Subject
Get in touch:
      Tini Podkubovšek - Founder and product development
Special thanks to:
 Jernej Podkubovšek - Manufacturing and consultant
 Matic Bera - Social media and marketing
 Niko Klanšek - Business consultant
 Tilen Kegl - Marketing consultant
 Tomo Jeseničnik - Photography
 Davorin Pirš and Maja Pirš (Studio8) - Graphic design
 David Jelovčan, Matej Pinter and Primož Križnar (Videa) - Video production
 Dejan Kojić and Matic Zorman (AdStar) - Advertising
Innovation is about to go where no one else will, itis about creating something that does not exist. It was risky. We had no handbook, no rules, no guide, and no guarantee for success. However, we had an idea and we had a voice inside us, telling us that it matters. That it makes a difference. We put in a lot of work and sweat to bring it to life. We did our part. Now it is your turn.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
No project is without risk nor challenges.

Creating a top product and making our backers happy is our primary mission. We promise to keep our backers updated and informed about any issues that may arise.

With the creation of any new product that includes manufacturing processes, there can be a number of unforeseen risks and obstacles. The drop docks that you see above are real working prototypes with full functionality. We will do everything we can to eliminate any possible interruptions during production and delivery.

However, every project carries certain risks. The most common risks are potential delays in tooling, obtaining raw materials, packaging, and shipping. While we feel like we have reduced these variables as much as possible, they can never be completely eliminated.

If that occurs, we will always keep all backers up to date and in the loop, as we understand the importance of communication and we really want to share this entire experience with you all.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
The Woodieful chair is a multifunctional piece of wooden furniture with a timeless design that can fit into any living space or arrangement.
It is functional in adaptability, sustainable in quality and serves to inspire multiple uses to fit your personality and lifestyle.
We created this piece with the belief that furniture should never be limited to only one function. This is why the Woodieful Chair isn’t limited to the sitting function of a chair.
The Woodieful Chair - more than just a chair.
We believe in sustainable, long-lasting furniture that can be passed on for generations. Think of the Woodieful Chair as a statement of longevity in today’s world of fast consumerism. It may sound cliché, but ‘quality over quantity’ really drives the point we are trying to make.
Our challenge was to design a timeless piece of furniture that could change with trends and encourage users through its shape and design to see its continued relevance in their homes.
This is a design piece created with intention and the belief that wood is nature’s expression of elegance. Built with the highest quality materials from the hands of a highly skilled woodworker, the Woodieful Chair is a statement in every well curated home. It also suits small space living and offers a solution for those who are constantly rearranging their interiors.
The Woodieful Chair came to life as a chair but is meant to be played with. Turn it into a table, a nightstand or a shelf to display your most treasured possessions and collections. We leave it up to you to challenge your imagination and discover the best and most suitable functions to meet your needs. As you can see, the options are endless.
Perfect for your vinyl, magazine or book collection.
A perfect nightstand.
In a need for a new footstool, maybe? Give it a spin or two!
Give it a spin!
This is a design piece created with intention and the belief that wood is nature’s expression of elegance. Built with the highest quality materials from the hands of a highly skilled woodworker, the Woodieful Chair is a statement in every well curated home. It also suits small space living and offers a solution for those who are constantly rearranging their interiors.
PLAY

The basic rough square shape is softened by rounded compartments. Slots for reading material have been added to meet the expected functionality, but also to enliven our final product. The size, shape, material and use all encourage a sustainable way of living by investing in quality products created from natural materials.
PLAY

We believe wood should be present in every home, due to its naturally pleasant smell, warmth and the dash of sophistication and quality it can bring to a room. The Woodieful Chair is made from high quality beech wood, which has been selected for its durability and resistance.   
PLAY

The White Woodieful Chair is made from high quality birch plywood and oiled with white oil, which gives the product a lighter tone. To keep the natural look and quality of wood over time we chose oil, which preserves the visibility of wood’s elegance with its transparency and also protects it.
The White Woodieful Chair
Comparison: The White Woodieful Chair x The Woodieful Chair
We are a group of young design enthusiasts with three empowered women running the show.
The Woodieful story began with Klavdija, our Founder. Over time, she managed to bring together our family, which is now made up of designers, an economist, a graphic designer, a photographer, two cameramen and a woodworker. Thanks to Klavdija, we are bigger, better and more efficient together. We all believe in this product and know what we stand for.
We have already released a small batch of the first Woodieful chairs that have been shown at design fairs and exhibitions. These were well received and sold to buyers from around the world, making it clear that there is a market for the Woodieful Chair.
We are determined to make Woodieful Chairs globally accessible to everyone and we want you to join the ride. We have everything ready to begin production and now we want to find homes for our Woodiefuls.
Follow our journey, sit down on your new Woodieful Chair, drink a glass of fine wine from your Woodieful table and read a book from your new Woodieful nightstand. Help us bring this project to another level, where Woodieful can reach its full potential and bring inspiration to the homes of all design lovers!
The Woodieful Cork Coasters
The Woodieful wooden Keychain
Woodieful Special Premium
Comparison: Woodieful Special Premium & The Woodieful Chair
The Special Premium Woodieful Chair with Copper Finished Metal on the Sides
                            Drago Graf in Stojan Jaklič - the video masters
Nejc Puš - the majestic photographer
Melissa Gagne - copywriter and the lovely PR queen
Tomaž Rems - the website magic creator 
Sara Mascarin - fabolous graphic designer
Grega Trček - the one who makes the Woodieful Chairs a reality
Niko Klanšek - business consultant
And many others who made this project a reality!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our first (but not last) Kickstarter project. We are learning from scratch, so this is a big challenge for us and a bit of a risk for you, dear supporter. We are a solid team with a vision but we know things don’t always go according to plan. We have everything ready to go and are fully confident in our product, we just need you to make it a reality. 

PRODUCTION: Because we currently only have one skilled and hardworking woodworker, there is a possibility that he may not finish products in time for shipping, depending on demand. We are ready to create the batch for the goal we have set and have already extended the expected time of production in our timeline, but who knows, he only has two hands and a lot of sanding to do. 

ORACLE’S PREDICTION: One’s love for wooden gems is deep, until thy kingdom is home to every Woodieful Chair, he’ll give it no rest. There could be more supporters than ever imagined, so additional woodworkers must be found that meet our expectations. This could take some time, but worry not, we are working on it.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: The end of the Woodieful story
updates.update_content:
Dearest,  
for the past year, the Woodieful story has been put on hold. The project was carried out with a vast amount of effort, love and energy, not only coming from me, but also everyone involved either directly or indirectly. Written words can hardly express the amount of gratitude I carry for each supporter, all helping hands and anyone’s encouraging cheers. Thank you all!

Dear backers!
Here´s another update just to remind you we are still here, still rocking! To all of you who are still waiting for your Woodieful Chairs - next batch is going out next week and then we have two or three max. batches more before completing all of our Kicstarter orders (woohoooo!).
We are still aiming at the goal: ship out all of them before Christmas and hopefully we will be able to do it! But unfortunately that doesn´t also mean you´ll have your chairs at your homes till Christmas as it takes 7-10 or even more working days for the chair to arrive from Europe to another side of the Planet.

Dear backers,
remember the last update we´ve posted? We said that the production of Early Birds will kickoff in the week from 22th to 28th of August. Which means they were supposed to be ready steady for shipping by now or even better - waiting in front of your doors. Although that doesn't seem to be the reality. We owe you an explanation for the delay.

Dear backers!
Hope you are all having a lovely summer!
It´s been a while since you´ve heard from us - but worry not! We were not laying on the beach sipping cocktails :) The last month and a half was another exciting period for Woodieful team. We had spent a lot of time planning The Woodieful Eurotrip that took place from 22.7. to 31.7.2016. We did this trip to present the Woodieful Chair to people around Europe and we must say it was an amazing journey!

updates.update_userinfo: Running late. But just a bit!
updates.update_content:
Dear backers!  
Summer, relaxation, vacation and seaside… that is where our suppliers are and hopefully where you are or soon will be. Since the supply of materials is a bit slow in this time of year, bear with us running a bit late with the Goodies package, it will be in your hands in no time.

updates.update_userinfo: Just before the start of the production!
updates.update_content:
Dear supporters,
  WE DID IT! The word we includes every single one of you, dear backers. You made this story happen, you are our motivation and we will do everything to start producing your Woodieful Chairs as soon as possible so you´ll be able to enjoy using them. 
Thank you again and again and million times!
